courses.title: Memotret Itu Mudah! Menghasilkan Uang Dari Fotografi
courses.bio: Bersama Anto Prasetyo
objectives: Peserta dapat mengetahui profesi fotografer
Peserta dapat mengetahui sejarah fotografi
Peserta dapat mengetahui peralatan fotografi
Peserta dapat mengetahui sensor camera
Peserta dapat mempelajari teknik-teknik dasar fotografi exposure
Peserta dapat mempelajari teknik dasar pencahayaan dan Komposisi

Memotret Itu Mudah! Menghasilkan Uang Da: Mempelajari teknik dasar fotografi: ISO & ASA
Mempelajari teknik dasar fotografi: Depth Of Field
Mempelajari teknik dasar fotografi: Exposure Compensation
Mengenal Tata Cahaya Buatan Dalam Fotografi
Mempelajari Teknik dasar Komposisi Dalam Fotografi
Kuis Memotret Itu Mudah! Menghasilkan Uang Dari Fotografi

requirements: Pelatihan ini dapat diikuti oleh siapapun terutama untuk fotografer pemula, pekerja kantoran dan para korban PHK serta peserta yang minimal berusia 18 tahun dan memiliki  gadget yang mendukung minimal HP yang memiliki kamera. Tingkat kesulitan pelatihan ini adalah tingkat dasar/pemula.
courses.description:
Hai Sobat Ilmu! Pada era digital saat ini sosial media berkembang dengan begitu pesat, fotografi menjadi kunci dalam menarik banyak orang. Oleh karena itu bukan hanya bagi perorangan, perusahaan, instansi swasta maupun negeri, kebutuhan fotografi sangat penting sebagai pendukung citra dari personal atau suatu lembaga.
Tentunya di jaman internet saat ini yang semuanya sudah mulai serba digital, kemampuan dalam fotografi dibutuhkan oleh banyak perusahaan. Salah satu unsur keberhasilan dalam menjadi fotografer handal adalah bagaimana bisa menghasilkan foto berkualitas dan berperan penting dalam impresi karena konsumen akan menilai suatu produk mulai dari visual yang ditampilkan.
Mempelajari fotografi bukan hal yang sulit, namun kita juga harus mempelajari teknik dasar fotografi terlebih dahulu. Adanya pengetahuan dasar dalam teknik fotografi akan membantu para pemula untuk mendapatkan hasil foto yang lebih baik.
Nah untuk itu kelas ini cocok untuk kamu yang punya keinginan untuk menjadi seorang fotografer, baik dijadikan profesi maupun sekedar hobi. Fotografer adalah sebutan bagi para pekerja yang memberikan jasa fotografi untuk berbagai tujuan. Ada yang menawarkan jasa foto komersial secara langsung, yakni fotografer memotret lalu dibayar. Misalnya memotret perorangan, keluarga, acara pernikahan, ataupun produk.
Pada kelas ini akan membahas mulai dar hal mendasar hinggak praktik langsung bagaimana cara mengatur kamera untuk menghasilkan gambar yang memukau! Jadi tunggu apalagi? Yuk daftarkan diri kamu untuk mengikuti kelas ini!
target_audience: Pelatihan ini cocok untuk peserta yang ingin bekerja dibidang fotografi, atau freelancer yang memberikan jasa di bidang fotografi. Cocok juga untuk para pelaku usaha UMKM terutama dibidang usaha retail untuk dapat memfoto produk jualannya.

courses.title: Curso definitivo de creación de podcast.
courses.bio: Aprende a crear un podcast desde cero.
objectives: Crear guiones para podcast.
Grabar de manera profesional tu voz
Editar y post producir de manera profesional tu audio
Publicar tu podcast en Spotify

Empezando a producir el podcast: Cinco primeros pasos para producir tu podcast
Grabando entrevistas de manera remota con Zencastr.
Ajustes básicos de sesión en Reaper.
Importando música y efectos de sonido.
Creación de una identidad gráfica para tu Podcast en Canva.
Subiendo tu Podcast con Spotify for Podcasters.
Produciendo una versión de tu Podcast para youtube.

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa.
courses.description:
Los Podcast están de moda. El incremento de los formatos de podcast descargados y escuchados en los últimos años muestran un crecimiento exponencial solo en la plataforma Spotify. A partir de 2019 la plataforma Podimo distribuye con éxito contenido premium bajo la forma de suscripción. Producir un podcast nos puede ayudar a visibilizar nuestra marca personal, nuestros productos o servicios o si somos educadores, llegar a un mayor número de estudiantes.
En este curso aprenderás los secretos de la creación de Podcast, desde la concepción hasta la grabación, edición y publicación en Spotify. Aprenderás el uso básico de Reaper para grabar y editar. Los procesos básicos de ecualización de acuerdo al material que hayas grabado. El uso de los filtros de frecuencia para mejorar o estandarizar tus grabaciones de voces. Aprenderás el manejo de la compresión de audio, mediante ejemplos prácticos dentro de Reaper. El uso del limitador-maximizador Rea Limit, dentro de Reaper. Además aprenderás como lograr niveles estándar de audio de acuerdo a los requerimientos de la plataforma Spotify. Aprenderás el uso básico de herramientas web de diseño gráfico como Canva para la producción de la imagen gráfica de tu podcast, así como el uso Zencastr para el registro remoto de entrevistas o la grabación co host. Finalmente conocerás el panorama actual del mundo del Podcast, su crecimiento y las estadísticas y predicciones de expansión de este formato para los próximos años. También encontrarás una descripción de los elementos necesarios para la producción de un videopodcast, así como los requerimientos técnicos para la grabación de un videopodcast.
target_audience: Profesionales y entusiastas. Comunicadores y educadores.

courses.title: Fotografía Forense en la Escena del Crimen
courses.bio: El curso más completo sobre los orígenes y el uso actual de la fotografía forense en la escena del crimen.
objectives: Aprenderás de forma práctica a reconocer tu equipo para explotarlo al máximo
Te explicaremos los orígenes y evolución de la fotografía en la criminalística.
Descubrirás el rol del Perito Fotógrafo y su instrumental de trabajo.
Aprenderás a hacer tu propio informe técnico fotográfico
Adquirirás un criterio fotográfico para cada tipo de escena: Homicidios, Suicidios. Enfrentamientos, Robo, Lesiones y Accidentes de tránsito.
Conocerás los antecedentes y precursores de la técnica fotográfica. Te contaremos sus objetivos y requisitos.
Te explicaremos las ventajas y las desventajas de la Fotografía analógica vs. Fotografía Digital.
Aprenderás el funcionamiento de la cámara fotográfica, los objetivos que utiliza y los diferentes modos de disparo.
Abordaremos cada una de las etapas del trabajo forense en el lugar del hecho.
Adquirirás los conocimientos técnicos para realizar planos básicos y especiales.
Te explicaremos cuáles son los pasos para el procesamiento del material.

UNIDAD 0I - Introducción: Orígenes y evolución de la fotografía
Orígenes y antecedentes de la fotografía en la Criminalística
Apuntes y recursos - Unidad 01 Curso fotografía forense
Unidad 02 - Conocimientos ténicos: Ventajas y Desventajas de la Fotografía Digital
Funcionamiento de la cámara réflex digital
UNIDAD 03 - Escena del crimen: Etapas del trabajo forense en el lugar del hecho
La fijación fotográfica y el Perito fotógrafo
Etapa 5 Levantamiento, embalaje y rotulado de las evidencias
Etapa 7 Entrega del lugar del hecho
Apuntes y recursos - Unidad 03 Curso fotografía forense
ACTIVIDAD III OBSERVA LAS SIGUIENTES IMÁGENES Y CLASIFÍCALAS
UNIDAD 04 - Tomas fotográficas según el: Tomas fotográficas según el tipo de escena
Apuntes y recursos - Unidad 04 Curso fotografía forense

requirements: No se requieren conocimientos previos de fotografía.
Este curso está dirigido tanto a principiantes como a fotógrafos que deseen adquirir conocimientos sobre la aplicación de la fotografía en el área forense.
Se requiere una cámara fotográfica digital, cualquier modelo será útil ya que te enseñaremos a aprovecharlo.
courses.description:
En este curso de Fotografía Forense, enseñaremos los orígenes de la técnica, su desarrollo y aplicación actual en el tratamiento del lugar del hecho y la investigación criminal.
En el primer módulo abordaremos la Criminalística, su concepto y las disciplinas que la componen. Dentro de ella nos enfocaremos en la Fotografía Forense, exploraremos sus orígenes y sus antecedentes en la investigación criminal. Adentrándonos en la historia hablaremos sobre distintos precursores y en particular analizaremos la obra de Alphonse Bertillon. Definiremos los objetivos y requisitos que debe cumplir la Fotografía Forense y para concluir se propone una actividad de lectura de nuevos contenidos.
La segunda parte de este curso abordará las especificaciones técnicas de esta disciplina, desde la fotografía analógica hasta la fotografía digital. Se desarrollarán sus características para reconocer los beneficios y las dificultades que presentan ambas técnicas. Clasificaremos los diferentes tipos de cámaras fotográficas disponibles y las características de su funcionamiento. Se estudiarán los tipos de objetivos y su aplicación, como así también los modos de disparos que traen incorporadas las cámaras. Para finalizar la sección se propone una tarea práctica para identificar las características del equipo del alumno para explotar su potencial.
Llegando a la tercera parte de este curso nos sumergimos en la investigación del Lugar del Hecho. El objetivo es conocer los pasos del protocolo para el correcto manejo y gestión de la Escena del Crimen. Se analizará el rol del Fotógrafo Forense en el escenario de los hechos y el equipo necesario para desarrollar su tarea. Además se analizará la importancia de la fotografía y su carácter probatorio en el proceso judicial. Se desarrollarán las técnicas para obtener cada uno de los diferentes tipos de planos, tanto los básicos como los especiales, necesarios para retratar la escena del crimen. Este módulo incluye la realización de una tarea práctica sobre los planos fotográficos.
En el cuarto módulo se brindarán las directrices de trabajo fotográfico en diferentes tipos de escenas del hecho. Incluiremos el análisis de homicidios, suicidios, accidentes viales, enfrentamientos armados, lesiones y mucho más.
Finalizando el curso teórico-práctico de Fotografía Forense se expondrán los requisitos necesarios para confeccionar un Informe Técnico Fotográfico, donde el alumno aprenderá a volcar la labor realizada en un formato de presentación profesional.
Otorgamos material de estudio exclusivo en cada unidad del presente curso. Además brindamos recursos descargables y asistencia personalizada por parte de los instructores durante toda la formación.
target_audience: Estudiantes de criminalística, ciencias criminales o afines.
Profesionales fotógrafos que deseen adquirir conocimientos sobre la aplicación de la fotografía en el área forense.
Peritos de distintas áreas de las ciencias forenses y criminalística.
Miembros de fuerzas de seguridad.
Detectives e investigadores privados
Y todos aquellos que por su labor deseen capacitarse en la temática.

courses.title: The Matrix Film Okuması: Filmlerin Bize Anlattıkları
courses.bio: Bu analizlerden sonra daha önce hiç film izlememişsiniz hissine kapılacaksınız.
objectives: Filmleri izlerken yönetmenin görüntüyle nasıl hikaye anlattığını öğrenir
Senaryo yazmakla ilgili bilgi edinir
Sinema tarihi hakkında bilgi edinir
Sanat tarihi hakkında bilgi edinir
Bakış açısını geliştirir
İmge okumayı geliştirir
requirements: Kurs için ön çalışmaya ihtiyaç yoktur. Film okuması esnasında bilgiler kavranır.
Film okuması öncesinde film izlenmiş olursa, izleyicinin kendi anladıkları ve video anlatımından sonraki öğrendikleri arasında kıyas yapabilir.
courses.description: Filmler aslında bizlere neler anlatıyor? Tabii her film aynı şeyi anlatmaz fakat aynı şeyi anlatırken bile farklı duygulara dokunmak yönetmen başarısı diyebiliriz. Peki, yönetmenler filmlerinde bazı gerçekleri gizliyorlar mı? Aslında yönetmenler birçok şeyi herkes görsün diye kendi üsluplarınca anlatıp yapıyor fakat zaman içerisinde imge okumayı unuttuğumuz için bu detayları artık göremiyoruz ve karakterler konuşmadıkça da anlamakta zorluk çekiyoruz. İşte film okumaları ana hikâyenin altında akan derin hikâyeyi keşfetmemizi, imgeleri okumamızı ve anlamayı sağlar. Filmlerde izlediğimiz hikâyeyle yönetmenin içindeki hikâye tıpkı bakmakla görmek arasındaki fark gibi. Bu kursta bir filme baktığımızda yönetmenin iç dünyasından dünya tarihine, senaryodan sanat tarihi eğitimine, kadar derin incelemenin mümkün olabileceğini göreceğiz. Renkleri, nesneleri nerede ve nasıl kullandığımızla değişen anlamları yakalamak tıpkı gerçeği bulmak için beyaz tavşanı takip etmek gibi heyecanlı. Bu seride sinema tarihine yön vermiş, damga vurmuş ve rüştünü ispatlamış yönetmen ve filmlerini seçtim. Bu yönetmenlerin şaheserlerini anlamak hem hayata bakış açımızı geliştirecek hem de film yapmak isteyenlere güzel bir başucu rehberi olacaktır. Gelin siz de sinemanın büyülü dünyasını keşfedip 7. Sanat olmasının hakkını nasıl verdiğini görün. Çünkü sinemayı anlamak için birçok disiplini kullanmak gerekir. Bu bitmek bilmeyen bir yolculuk biliyorum ve her yolculuk biraz da insanın kendi içinedir. Önce filmleri okuyoruz sonra hayatı ve sonra da kendimizi...
target_audience: Film izlemeyi seven ve sinemaya meraklı her birey katılabilir.

courses.description:
あなたのブログやLPを、もっと魅力的に。
無料で使えるImageFXとChatGPTの力で、
画像制作の悩みから解放されましょう。

この講座では、デザイン未経験でも
サクッとおしゃれなビジュアルを手に入れる方法をお伝えします。

■ 無料で使えるAIで、“唯一無二の画像”を作り、あなたのコンテンツ＆世界観を圧倒的に際立たせる

GoogleアカウントさえあればOK！面倒な環境設定は一切不要
ブログやLPにぴったりの高品質な画像を、数秒で自動生成
AIが苦手な「構図」や「文字」も、プロンプトとツール連携でしっかり対応
オリジナルのアイコンやバナーも、無料で商用利用OKな形で作成可能
GPTとの連携で、プロンプトを自動生成→最短で理想の画像を実現

■ このコースの詳細と全体像:

ブログやSNS、LPで「いい感じの画像が見つからない…」と感じたことはありませんか？

この講座では、無料で使える
AI画像生成ツール「ImageFX」と、
プロンプトを自動で生成してくれるChatGPTを活用し、
誰でも簡単に“あなたらしい”オリジナル画像を作る方法を学びます。

コースは、操作画面を見ながら進めるステップ形式。
Googleアカウントだけで始められるので、
難しい設定やインストールは一切不要です。

アイコン・ブログ用バナー・
LP用のメインビジュアルなど、実際に使える実例を題材に、必要な操作とコツをしっかりマスターしていきます。

AIが苦手とされる「文字の扱い」や
「構図のコントロール」に関しても、プロンプトの工夫と補助ツールの活用でしっかり対応。

さらに、部分修正（インペイント）や
他ツールとの連携も学べるので、
生成した画像を“そのまま使えない”というモヤモヤも解消できます。
そしてこの講座では、単なる趣味で終わらない
「副業への展開」も意識。

商用利用のルールや著作権の考え方も
丁寧に取り上げるので、安心してお仕事にも活かせるスキルが身につきます。
あなたの世界観を画像で伝える武器、一緒に育てていきましょう。

■ コースを受講することで…

ImageFXとGPTの使い方がわかり、すぐに画像を生成できるようになる
ブログやLPで使えるオリジナルの画像が作れる
商用利用で気をつけるポイントが明確になり、副業にも活かせる
他のAI画像ツールとの違いや特徴を理解できる
自分の世界観をビジュアルで表現する力が手に入る
■ こんな方が受講に向いています

ブログやSNSを始めたけど、画像素材に困っている
MidjourneyやDALL-E3は有料で、無料で始めたい人
LPやアイキャッチの画像を自分で作れるようになりたい
「AI画像ってなんだか難しそう」と感じている初心者
副業で画像生成サービスを活用してみたい方

■ このコースは全部で8セクションです

セクション1：はじめに
セクション2：ImageFXを使う前の必須知識
セクション3：ImageFXの基本的な使い方とコツ
セクション4：部分修正・インペイントを使って画像を修正する
セクション5：ImageFXのビジネスでの活用事例
セクション6：GPTをフル活用して、AI画像を作る
セクション7：AI画像を使うための、その後の編集テクニック
セクション8：お礼とまとめ

全部で約2.5時間のコースです。
その他、必要に応じてワークが用意されています。

ワークに沿って実践していただくことで、
ブログやLP用画像の作成を自分の手で進められるようになります。
■ 最後に 本コースに興味をもっていただいた方は、
動画終了後に「コース登録」へ進んでください。

もっと検討したいという方は
プレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、
ぜひ講座を覗いてみてください。

それでは、コースのなかで
お会いできることを楽しみにしています！
target_audience: ブログやSNSをはじめたばかりで、ブログに使う画像やバナーの画像が見つからない。作ってみたいけど作り方がわからないと悩んでいる人
「無料でアイコンとか作りたい」けど、MidjourneyやDALL-E3は有料だったり制限が多くて、何を選んだらいいかわからない
アイコンを作りたいけど、イメージのようなイラストが作れない
LP（ランディングページ）の画像を自分で用意したいと思っているWeb制作者
副業で画像生成サービスを使って何かできないかなと考えている人（例：クラウドワークスで仕事を受けたい）

courses.title: Adobe Lightroom Mobile - super einfache Bildbearbeitung
courses.bio: Entdecke wie du in Sekunden alle deine Bilder massiv verbesserst - Und nutze dein (teures) Smartphone endlich voll aus!
objectives: Entdecke wie Du die meisten Deiner Bilder in weniger als 10 Sekunden extrem verbesserst.
Du kannst Fehler und störende Objekte aus Deinen Bildern kinderleicht entfernen.
Deine Bildbearbeitung erreicht das nächste Level - und dass in weniger Zeit.
Kunden und Freunde sind erstaunt, wie schnell und gut Du die Bilder bearbeitest und versendest.
Deine Bilderverwaltung ist strukturiert und sehr schnell. Alles dank Ordnern und Alben in Adobe Lightroom Mobile.
Du wirst Deine Fans und Abonnenten mit Deinen neuen Bildern begeistern.
Deine Arbeitsweise mit Adobe Lightroom Mobile wird massiv verbessern!
Und vieles mehr!

Schön, dass du hier bist!: Herzlich Willkommen - das erwartet dich in diesem Kurs!
Das ist Lightroom Mobile: So erstellst und verwaltest du Order und Alben
Wichtige Erklärung für die folgenden Bildbearbeitungsvideos!
Bearbeitung von Gebäude Bildern: Bildbearbeitung Teil 3 - Stadt bei Nacht + Gebäude bei Nacht
Extra: Bearbeitung auf Smartphone - Sonnenaufgang im regnerischen Barcelona
Bearbeitung von Landschafts- und Naturbi: Bildbearbeitung Teil 4 - Gebäude im Regen + Bergsee
Bildbearbeitung Teil 5 - Sonnenaufgänge in der Wüste
Bildbearbeitung Teil 7 - Baumstamm + Sonnenuntergang durch Baum

requirements: Du brauchst ein Gerät und Lautsprecher/Kopfhörer um den Udemy Kurs anzuschauen.
Lege dir am Besten einen Stift und Zettel für deine Notizen bereit.
Du erhältst die Bilder aus dem Kurs oder kannst mit deinen eigenen mitarbeiten.
Es hilft Dir Dein Smartphone und Lightroom Mobile bereit zu halten. Lightroom Mobile ist ein Adobe Programm und daher nicht in diesem Kurs Inklusive, aber im Kurs erhältst Du einen Discount!
courses.description:
Wenn du schon hunderte von Euros für ein Smartphone bezahlst, dann hole wenigstens das Maximum aus deinen Bildern heraus!
Dank moderner Technik kannst du in Sekunden so viel mehr aus deinen Bildern herausholen. Schau dir die Beispielvideos an und sehe selbst, was mit wenigen Klicks möglich ist!
Ich bin Justus Zeemann und seit über 7 Jahren erfolgreicher Onlinedozent mit über 60.000 zufriedenen Teilnehmern.
Deine deutsche # 1 auf Udemy.

Seit 2018 bin ich auf Weltreise und habe dabei tausende von Fotos und Videos erstellt. Ich liebe es meine Erinnerungen festzuhalten und mit anderen zu teilen.
Seit 13 Jahren benutze ich Lightroom, daher weiß ich, wie sich die Technik entwickelt hat und was heutzutage möglich ist.
Nun habe ich diesen Kurs für dich erstellt. Ich möchte, dass auch du einfach und schnell das Maximum aus deinen Erlebnissen herausholst - und dazu gehören auch die Bilder, die du täglich aufnimmst.


Erfahre in diesem Kurs wie du deine Bilder in Adobe Lightroom Mobile importierst, verwaltest und bearbeitest - und das alles in wenigen Sekunden und mit sehr wenig Aufwand - dank der Technik von 2025!
Die Bilder aus dem Kurs stehen dir natürlich auch zur Verwendung bereit! Somit kannst du jederzeit mitarbeiten und die Schritte aus dem Kurs Stück für Stück selber erleben!
(Du wirst aber schnell erkennen, dass es mit deinen eigenen Bildern genauso einfach und unkompliziert geht).

Du kannst das Geld für den Kurs innerhalb von 30 Tagen zurück erhalten, wenn dir der Kurs nicht gefällt.
Der Kurs gibt dir die Chance deine Bildver- und bearbeitung auf das nächste Level zu heben!
Nutze deine Chance und schreibe dich jetzt ein!
target_audience: Du profitierst von diesem Kurs wenn Du Deine Bilder in Lightroom Mobile (auf dem PC oder dem Smartphone) raketenschnell bearbeiten und verbessern möchtest.
Es ist egal ob Du schon Erfahrungen mit Lightroom hast oder das erste Mal dabei bist.
Auch wenn Du schon andere Programme oder Lightroom benutzt hast, wirst du etwas neues entdecken.

courses.title: Active Presenter 8 - Video, Quiz und e-learning erstellen
courses.bio: Von der Bildschirmaufnahme zur Videoproduktion bis hin zum e-learning - Ein Programm für sowohl Anfänger als auch Profis
objectives: Du kannst nach dem Kurs sicher und zielgerichtet in der Software navigieren.
Du kennst die wichtigsten Features und Werkzeuge der Software und kannst diese zur Erstelung von Videos und e-learnings anwenden.
Du kennst Quellen mittels derer Du Dein Wissen im ein oder anderen Detail weiter vertiefen kannst.

e-learning Authoring: Quiz Teil 1 - Richtig/Falsch, Multiple Choice, Mehrfachantwort
Quiz Teil 2 - Texteintrag/Texteinträge ausfüllen, Leerzeichen eintragen

requirements: Keine
courses.description:
Nicht nur Trainer brauchen leistungsstarke Software, um Arbeitsschritte am Desktop bildhaft und praxisnah zu erklären. Auch für die private Anwendung können Bildschirm-Aufnahmen interessant sein. Mit der Software ActivePresenter lassen sich Aktivitäten auf dem Desktop aufzeichnen und daraus Videos erstellen, die man beispielsweise zur Dokumentation von Vorgängen oder Schulungszwecke verwenden kann. Aber mit dem ActivePresenter ist noch viel mehr möglich! Durch das Einfügen weiterer Objekte (Textbausteine, Bilder, Audios, Videos) und deren Animation lassen sich professionelle Videos jeder Art erstellen. Darüber hinaus lässt der ActivePresenter als sogenanntes Autoren-Tool auch die Erstellung von Quizze und e-learnings zu, d.h. über Interaktionen wie z.B. Mausklick auf einer Schaltfläche oder Eingabe von Text kann der Betrachter dann im e-learning navigieren, Antworten eingeben oder Zuordnungen durchführen.
Der ActivePresenter ist also ein a) All-in-One Screen Recorder, b) Video Editor und c) eLearning Authoring Software.
Die Software kann sowohl für Microsoft Windows als auch für Mac OS X (Apple) Rechner installiert werden. Es sind drei Editionen erhältlich: Free Edition, Standard, Pro. Die Free Edition ist (wie der Name schon sagt) kostenlos, hat aber schon einen sehr großen Funktionsumfang.
Ich gehe im Kurs u.a. auf folgende Themen ein:
- Wichtige Grundeinstellungen
- Bildschirm aufnehmen
- Diese Aufnahme editieren (und mit weiteren Objekten ergänzen)
- Mit Folienmaster und Designvorlagen arbeiten
- Mit Interaktionen arbeiten
- Quizze und e-learnings erstellen
- Layout des e-learnings anpassen
- Möglichkeiten des Exportierens
target_audience: Für Alle die gerne professionelle Videos erstellen möchten und dafür eine kostenlose und einfache Software benötigen.
Für Schüler*innen die im Rahmen von Projektarbeiten entsprechende Video-Präsentationen erstellen möchten.
Für Lehrende und Trainer die Wissensinhalte auf spielerische Art und Weise, z.B. in Form von Quizfragen aller Art, abfragen möchten.
Für e-learning Autoren die e-learning Kurse erstellen und diese in ein Learning Management System (LMS) einbetten möchten.

courses.title: The Beginner's Guide to Adobe Premiere Pro: Edit Like a Pro
courses.bio: The Beginner's Guide to Adobe Premiere Pro: Edit Like a Pro, No Prior Experience Needed
objectives: The Premiere Pro Interface: Navigate the workspace with confidence and understand the essential tools.
Importing & Organizing Media: Learn how to import footage, photos, and audio files, and organize them efficiently for editing.
Editing Fundamentals: Master essential editing techniques like cutting, trimming, adding transitions, and creating smooth cuts.
Pro Editing Techniques: Unlock the power of advanced features like multicam editing, color correction, and basic sound design.
Adding Text, Graphics & Effects: Enhance your videos with titles, animations, and special effects to capture your audience's attention.
Exporting & Sharing: Learn how to export your finished video in the perfect format for sharing online or on other devices.

Introduction: Introduction to Adobe Premier Pro and it's Interface
What are Workspaces & How you can Customize them
Video Transitions 7 how to create them
How to Edit Like a Pro in Adobe Premiere Pro

requirements: No Prior Experience Needed
courses.description:
The Beginner's Guide to Adobe Premiere Pro: Edit Like a Pro
Master the industry-leading editing software and transform your videos from amateur to amazing, even if you've never edited before!
This course is your comprehensive guide to Adobe Premiere Pro, designed specifically for beginners. With easy-to-follow instructions and practical exercises, you'll learn everything you need to know to edit professional-looking videos.
What you'll learn:
The Premiere Pro Interface: Navigate the workspace with confidence and understand the essential tools.
Importing & Organizing Media: Learn how to import footage, photos, and audio files, and organize them efficiently for editing.
Editing Fundamentals: Master essential editing techniques like cutting, trimming, adding transitions, and creating smooth cuts.
Pro Editing Techniques: Unlock the power of advanced features like multicam editing, color correction, and basic sound design.
Adding Text, Graphics & Effects: Enhance your videos with titles, animations, and special effects to capture your audience's attention.
Exporting & Sharing: Learn how to export your finished video in the perfect format for sharing online or on other devices.
By the end of this course, you'll be able to:
Edit captivating videos from start to finish.
Apply professional editing techniques to elevate your projects.
Tell compelling stories through engaging video editing.
Confidently use Premiere Pro for various video editing projects.
This course is perfect for:
Complete beginners with no prior editing experience.
YouTubers, social media creators, and entrepreneurs who want to create professional-looking videos.
Educators and students who want to learn how to create engaging video lessons and presentations.
Anyone who wants to take their video editing skills to the next level.
Enroll now and start editing like a pro today!
target_audience: Complete beginners with no prior editing experience.
YouTubers, social media creators, and entrepreneurs who want to create professional-looking videos.
Educators and students who want to learn how to create engaging video lessons and presentations.
Anyone who wants to take their video editing skills to the next level.

courses.title: Otomatik 7/24 Canlı Yayın ile Pasif Gelir İnternet'ten Kazan

objectives: Sanal sunucu ile youtube twitch facebook canlı yayın açmayı öğreneceksiniz.

Anlatacağım sanal sunucu sitesinden 150 USD değerinde bir aylık bedava sanal sunucu bakiyesi kazanacaksınız.
Pasif gelir oluşturmayı öğreneceksiniz.
Dijital bahçenizden beslenerek hayatınızı idame ettirebileceksiniz.
Bu eğitim herkes içindir. 7/24 yayınlar ile müzik, canlı sohbet gibi bir çok platformu işleteceksiniz.
Uyurken bile para kazanıyor olabileceksiniz.
Anlattığım her şeyi çok açık ve profesyonelce olacak. aynı zamanda amatör ruh ile motive olacaksınız.
Eğitim sürekli olarak güncellenecek windows sunucu ile başladığım bu eğitime ubuntu centos gibi işletim sistemlerinde çalışmayı anlatacağım.
siber güvenliğe dikkat ederek güvenli bir şekilde sunucuda nasıl yayın açılır bunu öğreteceğim.
Türkçe olarak tek ve eşsiz bir kaynak olan eğitimimden sizde faydalanın ve pasif geliriniz olsun.

requirements: Programlama veya herhangi bir deneyim bilgi gerekmez yeni başlayanlar için her şey öğretilir.
Sıfırdan her şeyi öğreneceksiniz.
courses.description:
Türkçe:
7/24 canlı yayın yaparak uyurken bile para kazanabilirsiniz! Dolar, Euro, Pound gibi döviz birimlerinden gelir elde etmek için dil bilmenize gerek yok. Bu eğitimle, yayın açarak döviz kazanmayı öğreneceksiniz.
Kendi işinizin patronu olacaksınız.
Finansal özgürlüğe kavuşacaksınız.
İnsanlarla uğraşmadan fikirlerinizi paylaşarak para kazanabileceksiniz.
Zaman kazanacak ve birçok farklı yöntemi hayata geçirebileceksiniz.
Sadece bir laptop ile hayatınızı kazanabileceksiniz.
Bu eğitimi aldıktan sonra sanal sunucu kullanımı, YouTube, OBS, Twitch ve Facebook Live gibi platformlarda uzmanlaşacaksınız.
Eğer dijital pasif gelir kaynağınızı oluşturmak istiyorsanız, bu kurs sizin için kesinlikle doğru seçim!
Anlattıklarım size hayal gibi gelebilir, ancak yurtdışında bu yöntemi uygulayan birçok insan var. Ülkemizde henüz bilinmeyen bu para kazanma modelini siz de keşfedin!
Bu eğitim serisini, ülkemizdeki insanların bu alandan faydalanabilmesi için hazırladım. Artık finansal özgürlüğünüzü zahmetsizce elde edebilirsiniz.
Eğitim boyunca, farklı YouTube kanallarını analiz ederek araştırma ve geliştirme yapacağız. Daha iyisini ortaya koyarak kendi gelir kaynaklarınızı oluşturabilirsiniz.
Twitch, Facebook ve diğer platformlarda kitlenizi büyütebilir, bir taşla birkaç kuş vurabilirsiniz.
Ayrıca, %100 bonus kazanacağınız sanal sunucu adreslerini öğrenebilirsiniz.
İlerleyen süreçlerde, Ubuntu ve CentOS gibi düşük maliyetli sistemlerle yayın yapmayı öğreneceksiniz.
Açacağınız kanallardan dolar ile gelir elde ederek yüksek kazançlar sağlayabilirsiniz.
Bu eğitim düzenli olarak güncellenmektedir. Son eklenen içerik: Telif hakları hakkında kapsamlı bir video!
English Version:
You can earn money even while sleeping by streaming 24/7! You don’t need to speak any language to earn in currencies like USD, EUR, or GBP. With this course, you’ll learn how to start live streams and generate foreign income.
You’ll be your own boss.
You’ll achieve financial freedom.
You’ll earn money by sharing your ideas without dealing with people.
You’ll save time and implement various strategies.
You’ll be able to make a living with just a laptop.
After completing this course, you’ll become an expert in virtual server usage, YouTube, OBS, Twitch, and Facebook Live.
If you’re looking to build your own digital passive income source, this course is the right choice for you!
What I’m sharing may sound like a dream, but there are many people abroad successfully implementing this method. It’s still not widely known in our country, but you can discover this income model for yourself!
I created this training series to help people in our country benefit from this opportunity. Now, you can effortlessly achieve the financial freedom you’ve always wanted.
Throughout the course, we’ll analyze various YouTube channels for research and development. You can create better results and build your own income sources.
You can grow your audience on Twitch, Facebook, and other platforms, hitting multiple goals at once.
You’ll also learn about virtual server addresses where you can earn a 100% bonus.
As you progress, you’ll learn to stream using low-cost systems like Ubuntu and CentOS.
By monetizing your channels in dollars, you’ll generate significant income.
This course is regularly updated. The latest addition: A comprehensive video on copyright!

courses.title: Обработка фотографии в Photoshop.
courses.bio: Ретушь фото. Превращаем исходник в красивую фотооткрытку!
objectives: Обработка исходной фотографии до получения красивой фотооткрытки
Ретушь кожи, коррекция цвета кожи, добавление объема и контраста, тонирование, работа с фоном и др.
Подойдет начинающим пользователям Photoshop

Обработка фотографий в Camera Raw: Пакетное сохранение фотографий из Camera Raw в формате Jpg

requirements: Программа Adobe Photoshop (урок показан на русифицированной версии)
Встроенный фильтр Camera Raw
Встроенный фильтр "Портретура" (Portraiture)
courses.description:
Данный видеокурс подойдет начинающим и опытным пользователям Photoshop.
Вы научитесь обрабатывать проблемную кожу, пользоваться различными инструментами и получать отличный результат!
Мы разберем 2 разные фотографии. К одной вы получаете PSD-файл со слоями.
Включает пошаговые уроки:
Базовая обработка исходника.
Ретушь кожи. Фильтр "Портретура".
Коррекция цвета кожи. Проверка тона.
Добавление объема и контраста.
Работа с фоном.
Тонирование.
Художественная обработка.
Кадрирование без потери качества .
Сохранение для соц сетей.
Убираем зеленку и другие цветные пятна с кожи.
Дополнительные уроки по пакетной обработке в Camera Raw.
target_audience: фотограф новорожденных, детский фотограф, начинающий фотограф
ретушер, фрилансер

requirements: Nessun prerequisito necessario
courses.description:
Oggi, diventare un Wedding Videographer richiede un ventaglio di competenze sempre più ampio. Non basta più essere semplicemente un Operatore Camera: è necessario padroneggiare bene la comunicazione con fotografo, sposi e invitati.
Se vuoi trasformare la tua passione per il videomaking in una carriera, questo corso è ciò che fa per te. Con il nostro percorso, diventerai un vero Wedding Videographer, in grado di gestire tutti i tipi di matrimonio.
Noi di HPV Film siamo professionisti nel settore da oltre 10 anni e abbiamo fondato una vera e propria Produzione Video. Durante la nostra esperienza, ci siamo trovati molte volte a perdere clienti e dover rifare lavori a causa di errori banali dovuti all'inesperienza. Per questo, abbiamo progettato questo corso con l'obiettivo di fornirti tutte le competenze necessarie per iniziare la tua carriera come Wedding Videographer.


Che tu stia iniziando da solo, cercando di migliorare le tue abilità o formando qualcuno per occuparsi dell'immagine digitale della tua azienda, questo corso ti guiderà passo dopo passo. Oltre alla teoria e alla pratica, ti offriremo consigli su cosa acquistare all'inizio, quali accessori possono semplificarti il lavoro e quale attrezzatura utilizzare per essere competitivo sul mercato. Inoltre, ti forniremo suggerimenti sugli aspetti burocratici e finanziari del mestiere.


Uno dei punti chiave del corso è la nostra attenzione su come è strutturato un matrimonio e le sue fasi, fornendoti una comprensione completa di ogni momento cruciale da catturare. Inoltre, ci concentreremo sul marketing e sulle strategie commerciali per aiutarti a ottenere più date. Imparerai come promuoverti tramite social media, partecipare a fiere ed eventi e gestire i prezzi e i canali social per massimizzare la tua visibilità e attrarre clienti.


Il nostro obiettivo è semplice: vogliamo che tu raggiunga una solida base di competenze per lavorare in proprio, HPV Film cresce, e vogliamo formare professionisti come te, da inserire nel nostro team.


Non perdere l'occasione di trasformare la tua passione in una professione gratificante. Iscriviti al nostro corso e inizia il tuo viaggio per diventare un Wedding Videographer di successo!
target_audience: Chi vuole migliorare le proprie Skill di Ripresa in abito matrimoniale
Chi vuole lanciarsi nel mondo del Wedding video
Chi vuole fare del Wedding video la propria professione
Chi vuole massimizzare i profitti del Wedding video

courses.title: Curso de Cinema 4D. Iniciación
courses.bio: Domina Cinema 4D desde cero, desata tu creatividad en 3D y domina el arte de los efectos visuales.
objectives: Dominar uso efectivo de herramientas esenciales en Cinema 4D, creación y manipulación de objetos, edición de polígonos, cámaras y luces.
Comprender timing, interpolación de fotogramas clave y curvas de animación para dar vida a objetos en 3D.
Crear y aplicar materiales, texturas, ajustar brillo, reflectividad y sombreado para resultados visuales convincentes.
Configurar escena, iluminación, cámara y opciones de renderizado para obtener imágenes y animaciones de alta calidad.
Desarrollar habilidades para crear modelos 3D precisos y detallados utilizando las herramientas de modelado disponibles en Cinema 4D.
Adquirir conocimientos sobre la animación de personajes en Cinema 4D, a través de la técnica de captura de movimiento.
omentar y desarrollar la capacidad de los estudiantes para explorar y aplicar su creatividad en el diseño de escenas y objetos en 3D
Mejorar las habilidades de resolución de problemas al es técnicos y creativos durante el proceso de creación
Adquirir habilidades y conocimientos relevantes que les permitirán ingresar a la industria creativa para trabajar en áreas relacionadas.

BIENVENIDA Y CUESTIONES PREVIAS: Descarga los materiales con un solo click
Curso gratuito "Fundamentos del vídeo y la imagen digital"

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa en Cinema 4D ni en en la disciplina del 3D en general, pero es recomendable un conocimiento básico en el area de la imagen y el vídeo digital.
courses.description:
¡Bienvenido al apasionante mundo de la animación en 3D! Si alguna vez has soñado con crear efectos visuales sorprendentes y sumergirte en un universo de diseños tridimensionales, nuestro curso de iniciación a Cinema 4D es perfecto para ti.
En este programa de formación completo, te ofrezco la oportunidad de aprender Cinema 4D desde cero, sin importar tu nivel de experiencia previa. Mi enfoque paso a paso y amigable te guiará a través de los conceptos fundamentales, las herramientas y las técnicas más utilizadas en el diseño y la animación en 3D.
Desde el primer día, te sumergirás en el fascinante entorno de Cinema 4D y comenzarás a explorar sus infinitas posibilidades creativas. Aprenderás a modelar objetos en 3D con precisión, a texturizar y a iluminar escenas, y a animar tus creaciones con fluidez y realismo. Con cada lección, te adentrarás en el corazón del software, descubriendo sus múltiples funciones y optimizando tu flujo de trabajo.
Mi objetivo como instructor altamente capacitado y apasionado es guiarte en cada paso del camino, brindándote conocimientos expertos y trucos profesionales para que desarrolles tu propio estilo y lleves tus habilidades al más alto nivel. Te proporcionaré ejercicios prácticos desafiantes y proyectos emocionantes  para que puedas aplicar y consolidar lo aprendido.
Al finalizar este curso, te sorprenderás de lo lejos que has llegado. Habrás adquirido una sólida comprensión de los principios del diseño y la animación 3D, habiendo creado impresionantes trabajos visuales. Estarás preparado para embarcarte en emocionantes proyectos personales o incluso incursionar en el mundo profesional, demostrando tus habilidades a posibles empleadores o clientes.
Y una cuestión muy importante:  Este es un curso vivo, es decir, se va actualizando con las últimas novedades del software y se añaden nuevos contenidos esporádicamente para que estés siempre actualizad@ y siguas aprendiendo sin parar.
No importa si eres un estudiante de diseño, un profesional creativo o simplemente un entusiasta que busca ampliar horizontes, este curso te ofrece la oportunidad de alcanzar tus metas en el campo del diseño y la animación 3D. ¡No pierdas la oportunidad de transformar tus ideas en realidad y convertirte en un experto en Cinema 4D!
¡Inscríbete ahora y desbloquea tu potencial creativo en el apasionante mundo de la animación en 3D con Cinema 4D!


OPINIONES DE LOS ALUMNOS:
“De la gran multitud de profesores que he tenido a lo largo de mi vida, puedo asegurar que Josué se encuentra entre los mejores porque sabe equilibrar magistralmente las mejores cualidades de un gran docente: exigente y cercano, riguroso y entretenido, experimentado y humilde, respetado y respetuoso, enfocado y divertido, entre otras muchas. He tenido la grandísima suerte de ser su alumno y me ha hecho trabajar duro, lo que le agradeceré siempre por todo lo que he aprendido, y además disfutando en el proceso. Siempre poniendo en primer lugar las necesidades de sus alumnos, es una auténtica delicia aprender con él. Transmite a cada momento su pasión por este maravilloso mundo audiovisual que conoce profundamente y hace que hasta lo más árido se haga llevadero.”


Jaime Tascón Gárate, alumno de Producción Cinematográfica


“Solo puedo decir que Josue es muuuy grande! Son pocos los docentes que te marcan en la vida y él ha sido uno de ellos. Me enseñó durante un año animación y no solo te enseña bien, si no que se preocupa y si no lo entiendes te lo explica otra vez sin perder la paciencia. Aprendí muchísimo y, encima, no se deja de lado el sentido del humor, en fin, un Crack.
Tiempo después de terminar volví a encontrarme con él en un curso de vídeo, y gracias a él encontré mi primer trabajo. Hoy estoy en una gran empresa de publicidad trabajando en lo que me gusta. Solo puedo darle las gracias ?”


Juan Castillejo Gomez, alumno de After Effects.


“ Josué es un excelente docente, siempre pendiente de las dudas, de los procesos de aprendizaje, sabe transmitir los conceptos esenciales, te fuerza a ira más allá, incluso a cuestionar las cosas, a pensarlas desde otros ángulos. En ese curso vimos todo lo que es un proceso audiovisual, desde la preproducción, la producción y la posproducción. En todos los campos cuenta con amplia experiencia. En el campo de la posproducción maneja perfectamente Adobe Premiere y Adobe After Effects. Una formación con él es altamente recomendable. Fijarás conocimientos, te dará claves para avanzar, aprenderás los pasos a seguir por ti mismo, estará ahí para ayudarte y te permitirá lograr objetivos. Un gran maestro. Lo recomiendo sin ningún género de dudas. Saldrás ganando”


Andrés Castaño alumno Producción Cinematográfica y After Effects.


“He hecho el curso de Adobe Premiere en Márginal Studio y es sencillamente perfecto. Cualquiera que necesite adentrarse en la edición de vídeo tiene en Josué al mejor profe. Desde los materiales que facilita hasta el propio contenido de los vídeos está perfectamente diseñado para que el aprendizaje sea fluido y ameno. ¡Lo recomiendo del todo!”


Beba Jiménez, alumna de Premiere


“Clases con temario organizado, claro y paso a paso y josué consigue que las clases más densas sean amenas y encima con sentido de humor… Lo único malo que tengo que decir es que el curso que impartió lo terminé y ya no lo puedo tener de profesor ? “
Ángel J. García, alumno de Premiere y After Effects
target_audience: A estudiantes de diseño gráfico, profesionales de la animación y efectos visuales, artistas 3D, diseñadores de productos y cualquier persona interesada en aprender animación en 3D y efectos visuales.

courses.bio: Uçmaya hazırsanız pratik dersler ile nasıl drone uçuracağımızı öğrenelim.
objectives: Drone kullanmayı
Dronelar hakkında bilgi edinin

Uçuş Zamanı: İki farklı kalkış seçeneğine yakından bakalım.

requirements: Geçmiş deneyim gerektirmez. Bilmeniz gereken her şeyi öğreneceksiniz
courses.description:
Bu kursta Furki ile beraber a'dan z'ye bir drone u nasıl uçurabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.


- Hangi drone u tercih etmelisiniz?


- Sivil havacılık kayıt ve pilotluk sistemi


- Kumandayı tanıyalım


- Drone mobil uygulamasını tanıyalım


- Uygulamalı kalkış yapıyoruz


- Drone kumandası uygulamalı.(Kumandadaki çubukların işlevleri)


- Sinematik çekimleri uygulamalı olarak gerçekleştiriyoruz


- Çekim modlarını deneyelim.(Quickshots,heyperlapse)


Tüm bu aşamaların sonunda dronelar ile ilgili herşeyi öğrenmiş ve aktif bir şekilde drone uçurabiliyor olacaksınız.


Dilerseniz derslere başlamadan önce drone nedir ve ne gibi alanlarda kullanılır buna bakalım.


DRONE NEDİR?


Havada insansız uçabilen tüm araçlara drone olarak adlandırabiliriz. Dronlar, uzaktan kumanda ile kontrol edilebilen, komut verilebilen, video ve görüntü kaydı yapabilen insansız hava araçlarıdır.  Bir drone, pervane, motor, gövde ve uçuş kontrol kartı gibi bileşenlerin bir araya gelmesinden oluşur.

requirements: No prior experience or knowledge of AI or video creation is required—we’ll guide you step-by-step from the very basics to advanced proficiency.
courses.description:
Welcome to the ultimate course for mastering AI video creation!


Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to enhance your skills, this course will guide you step-by-step through the exciting and fast-evolving world of AI video.


Learn why AI video is the future of content creation and how it’s easier to master than you might think. Use these skills to start a new career, enhance your current job, or simply explore for fun.


We’ve structured this course for anyone to follow—no prior knowledge required. Skip to specific sections if you prefer, or follow every step for a comprehensive experience.


Students looking to learn AI video creation often face 3 key challenges—this course solves them all:


Comprehensive Learning, All-in-One: A full 22-hour course that guides you step-by-step through every aspect of AI video creation—all in one organized, easy-to-follow resource.
Always Current with Regular Updates: Stay ahead with the latest tools and trends! This course is updated monthly, covering over 30+ AI tools (and growing).
Perfect for Beginners: No prior experience? No problem! Bring your laptop and dive in with hands-on projects, real-time demonstrations, and clear guidance designed for newcomers.


What You’ll Learn:


The Fundamentals of AI Video
Understand the basics of AI video, why it’s a game-changer, and how it’s transforming industries.
AI Video Workflows
Learn structured workflows tailored to different project needs—social media, ads, short films, and more.
Generating AI Video Ideas
Master brainstorming with tools like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Copilot, and Perplexity to create innovative video concepts.
AI Scriptwriting and Structures
Craft engaging scripts and video structures using AI tools like ChatGPT, Scribbler, ChatSonic, TextCortex, and Gemini.
Mood Boards and Storyboards
Discover how these visual planning tools kickstart production and ensure consistency across your videos using tools like MidJourney, Storyboarder ai, and Photoshop.
AI Image Generation
Learn why creating images first is key to producing realistic AI videos. Master tools like MidJourney, DALL·E, Stable Diffusion, Dream Studio, Adobe Firefly, and Meta AI.
Making AI Videos
Dive into advanced video generation with Runway ML, Sora, Luma Labs, Pika, Haiper, Kling, Kaiber, and Flux. Explore specialized tools for face-swapping, lip-syncing, and more.
AI Audio Creation
Generate music, sound effects, and voiceovers with AI tools. Use text-to-speech, voice changers, and audio editing to create professional-grade soundscapes.


Follow Along with Our Course Project
I’ll guide you through every step of creating a professional 3-minute video, showing you how to use each tool while building a polished project.


Why Choose This Course?


Be First in a Growing Field: AI video is the future, and this course puts you ahead of the curve.
Hands-On Learning: Learn by doing, with clear examples and practical exercises.
Constant Updates: Stay up-to-date with the latest AI tools and techniques as the industry evolves.




Start your journey into AI video creation today and unlock endless possibilities!




What You'll Get From This Course


Master AI tools like Runway ML, MidJourney, Veo 3 and ElevenLabs for video creation.
Build professional skills for content creation with cutting-edge AI technologies.
Learn workflows to create AI videos for any purpose: social media, ads, or film.
Get hands-on experience with real-world projects and step-by-step guidance.
Save time and money by learning efficient AI techniques for video production.
Understand how to use AI to generate ideas, scripts, storyboards, and visuals.
Learn ethical and legal best practices for AI content creation.
Access exclusive resources, tools, and updates to keep up with AI trends.
Develop versatile skills to enhance or start a career in the growing AI field.
Create a polished, portfolio-worthy AI video project by the end of the course.
Note: Some tools shown in the course have free versions (such as Chat GPT), some have free trials (such as ElevenLabs) and some only have paid options to use (such as Midjourney). This course is independent of all the tools it shows and those companies may change their prices and offers, we'll do our best to show you the most up to date prices and offers from these tools. As a rule, good quality AI tools for video and images will be paid for their use, there are very few free quality AI tools for videos.
target_audience: Complete Beginners: Anyone curious about AI video creation with no prior experience—start from scratch and master the basics.
Content Creators: YouTubers, TikTokers, or social media influencers looking to elevate their videos with cutting-edge AI tools.
Aspiring Filmmakers: Individuals interested in storytelling or creating short films with AI as a powerful creative assistant.
Marketing Professionals: Those seeking to produce engaging, high-quality ads or brand content quickly and efficiently.
Freelancers: Independent professionals aiming to add AI video production to their service offerings and attract more clients.
Career Changers: Those looking to break into a growing and innovative field with high-demand skills.
Video Editors: Professionals who want to integrate AI tools into their editing workflows to save time and expand creative possibilities.
AI Enthusiasts: Individuals eager to explore practical applications of AI in a fast-evolving field.
Students: Learners aiming to build future-ready skills in AI video production for career or personal projects.

courses.bio: Estratégia de distribuição de curtas em festivais de cinema (vale um pouco para longas e médias também)
objectives: Estratégia para lançar filmes de curta-metragem (serve um pouco para longa também)
Disitribuição de curtas em festivais

Como colocar seus filme nos festivais: Guarde a premiere do seu filme

requirements: Não é necessário nenhum
courses.description:
Nesse curso rápido e dinâmico você vai aprender como funciona o mundo dos festivais de cinema e qual é a melhor maneira de lançar seu filme visando construir uma carreira como cineasta, produtor(a), realizador(a), roteirista, curta-metragista, videoartista, artista visual que faz videoarte.  Aqui você vai aprender, da forma mais realista possível, como traçar um plano para inscrever seu filme em festivais que tem mais a ver com a sua proposta de filme, além de compreender as melhores ferramentas para isso.
Aqui também vamos apresentar um pouco sobre as plataformas que existem para inscrição em festivais ShorfilmDepot, FilmFreeway...
A distribuição de um filme é um processo essencial para a vida dele. Existem várias formas de criar uma estratégia. Por isso, é importante estar atento e fazer a melhor escolha para que tudo caminhe bem na sua carreira. Os festival podem servir como uma plataforma que vai jogar a carreia de uma cineasta nas alturas.


A distribuição de filme quase sempre é um processo difícil e esse curso você vai aprender as melhores práticas para não deixar esse processo um pouco menos caro.
Vamos falar um pouco sobre esses festivais:
Festival du Court Métrage de Clermont Ferrand. Festival de Oberhausen - Festival de Cinema de Cannes - Festival de Cinema de Locarno - Festival de Cinema de Berlim. Dentre outros.
target_audience: Pessoas que desejam fazer filme e seguir uma carreira fazendo filmes

courses.description:
If you want to learn video editing process in a simplified way, then this course is the right choice for you!
We shall learn how to use OpenShot video editing software to edit our videos. OpenShot is a FREE open source video editing software with an easy to understand interface that makes editing process easy and fast. From beginners to advanced, it is one of the best options to start your video editing process.
In this course, as I teach you the how to use the different editing tools I will also be editing videos alongside to give you a clear picture of how the actual editing process takes place. Most important, I have not removed those parts where I have made some mistakes, so that you learn from them and don't repeat them.


It is a  complete video editing with OpenShot from beginners to advanced level. By the end of the course, you will be able to edit videos for YouTube or other educational purposes.
As I have worked with various editing softwares, I have used my experience to design the lectures and modules for an optimized learning experience. The headings are clear to give you an insight of what you are going to learn. From time to time, I'll keep upgrading this course by adding relevant lessons to the course.
All you need to do is ensure that you do sufficient practice of what I teach you in the lessons so as to master the art of video editing.

Temel düzeyde bilgisayar bilgisi yeterlidir
courses.description:
Merhaba! Sony Vegas eğitim kursumuz, başlangıçtan ileri seviyeye kadar video düzenleme becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen herkes için kapsamlı bir deneyim sunmaktadır. Kurs boyunca, katılımcılarımızın profesyonel düzenleme becerilerini kazanmalarını sağlamak adına detaylı bir program sunuyoruz.


Kursun başlangıcında, Sony Vegas'un temel araçlarını tanıtarak katılımcılarımıza programın kullanımını kavrama fırsatı sunuyoruz. Ardından, kesme, yapıştırma, efekt ekleme gibi temel düzenleme tekniklerini öğretiyoruz. Bu temel bilgilerin ardından, katılımcılarımızın projelerine profesyonel bir dokunuş katmalarına yardımcı olacak gelişmiş özelliklere odaklanıyoruz.


Eğitimimiz, gerçek dünya projeleri üzerinde pratik yapma fırsatları sağlayarak öğrenmeyi pekiştirmeye odaklanmaktadır. Renk düzeltme, ses düzenleme ve efekt uygulama gibi konularda detaylı pratiğe dayalı modüllerle, katılımcılarımızın becerilerini uygulamaya dönüştürmelerini destekliyoruz.


Kurs süresince, katılımcılarımıza öğrenme süreçlerini desteklemek için interaktif öğrenme materyalleri, örnek projeler ve öğrenci forumları gibi kaynaklar sağlıyoruz. Ayrıca, katılımcıların sorularını yanıtlamak ve rehberlik etmek için her zaman hazırım


Kursumuz, öğrencilere özelleştirilmiş geri bildirimler ve projeler üzerinde bireysel rehberlik sunarak, öğrenmeyi en üst düzeye çıkarmayı hedefler. Sony Vegas'un güncel özelliklerini öğrenirken, katılımcılarımız yaratıcılıklarını serbest bırakarak benzersiz ve etkileyici içerikler oluşturmanın keyfini yaşayacaklar.


Sonuç olarak, Sony Vegas eğitim kursumuz, katılımcılarımıza profesyonel düzeyde video düzenleme yetenekleri kazandırmak amacıyla tasarlanmış bir programdır. Bu kurs, öğrencilere hem temel hem de ileri düzey düzenleme tekniklerini öğrenme fırsatı sunarak, katılımcıların kendi yaratıcı potansiyellerini keşfetmelerine olanak tanır.

courses.description:
The PTZ Camera Operator Handbook online course is the essential guide to professional robotic camera operations. Paul Richards, your instructor, is the Chief Streaming Officer for the StreamGeeks. His new book and online course will help you unlock the full potential of your PTZ camera for modern video production.
PTZ cameras are the ideal tool for multimedia professionals involved with live streaming, video production, and video communications. This book outlines the essential aspects of camera operation as it applies to pan, tilt, and zoom cameras. This online course starts with the basics and walks you through everything you need to know including industry innovations such as NDI, DANTE, cloud-based productions and more.
This is an online course for anyone who owns or operates a PTZ camera for their organization and wants to take their skills to the next level. This book is written in plain English, to give any PTZ camera operator the tools they need to succeed in any video production environment. Camera operators can learn how to leverage the latest robotic camera technology to control multiple cameras, automate video productions and use industry best practices.
This online course follows The PTZ Camera Operator Handbook which is available on Amazon. If you do not have the book, you can download a free PDF copy in the resources section of this online course.

requirements: Nessun prerequisito necessario per la porzione del corso dedicata alla Ripresa video
Premiere Pro, anche nella versione Trial, per la porzione del corso dedicata all'Editing video
courses.description:
Oggi essere un Videomaker richiede un ventaglio di competenze sempre più ampio. Viene richiesto di racchiudere in una singola figura professionale quasi un' intera Troupe di una Produzione Video.
Volendo fare della passione per il Videomaking una professione non si può pensare di poter ricoprire solo più il ruolo di Operatore Camera ma è necessario avere delle competenze di Direzione della Fotografia, Post-Produzione (sia Audio che di Correzione del Colore), ma anche accortezze tecniche che in una Produzione Video sarebbero delegate ad un Elettricista. Infatti oggi, fin da subito, è possibile affittare a prezzi modici attrezzatura di altissimo livello che ha efficienze energetiche, tensioni e Potenza che devono essere sapute gestire.

Con questo corso imparerai ad utilizzare il software di editing professionale Premiere Pro, partendo da principiante fino ad Avanzato.
Noi di HPV Film siamo dei professionisti nel settore da 6 anni, tanto da essere riusciti a fondare una Produzione Video a tutti gli effetti. Durante i nostri percorsi individuali però ci siamo trovati moltissime volte a perdere della clientela, fare e rifare lavori più volte a causa di errori banali (come il semplice non scotchare i cavi!!) dettati dall'inesperienza.

In questo corso ci siamo posti l'obbiettivo di fornire tutte quelle che sono le competenze necessarie per iniziare una carriera in questo settore, ipotizzando che lo spettatore fosse qualcuno che volesse iniziare questa attività nel piccolo molto probabilmente iniziando da solo e trovandosi a dover gestire tutto con le proprie mani, oppure fossero aziende con l'intenzione di formare qualcuno che si occupasse della propria immagine digitale o persone intenzionate ad affinare le proprie skills.
All'interno del corso non ci sono solo la Teoria e Pratica ma anche consigli su che cosa comprare all'inizio; quali accessori possono semplificarti davvero il lavoro e con quale strumentazione incominciare a lavorare per essere competitivo sul mercato; suggerimenti sugli aspetti burocratici e finanziari. Imparerete ad affinare tutti quegli aspetti che generalmente vengono tralasciati e che a lungo andare fanno la differenza per il raggiungimento del risultato.
Abbiamo inserito 10 esercitazioni pratiche utili per metterti alla prova e capire effettivamente se hai assorbito tutte le nozioni teoriche offerte nel corso

Il perché di questa scelta è molto semplice: vogliamo dare la possibilità ai nostri studenti di raggiungere quella base di competenze per poter lavorare in proprio, ma anche valutare quale campo del settore sia più adatto a loro e nell'eventualità approfondirlo e cercare una posizione lavorativa all'interno del settore. HPVfilm cresce, vogliamo formare persone che sappiano lavorare come noi, da poter inserire all'interno del TEAM.

Abbiamo inserito all'interno del corso un Preset Pack di animazioni del valore di oltre 30,00 euro in forma gratuita per chiunque acquisti il nostro videocorso. Per darvi fin da subito un tool utile a velocizzare il vostro processo di editing.
target_audience: Chi vuole migliorare le proprie Skill di Ripresa
Persone che vogliono imparare ad usare Premiere Pro, seguendo un unica guida che li porti dal non aver aperto mai il programma a saper esportare un video per tutte le piattaforme
Persone che intendono iniziare la professione del Videomaker e che necessitano di acquisire competenze sia di ripresa che di montaggio sia sul lato video che audio.
Aziende che vogliono formare uno o più dipendenti per affidargli la produzione di media aziendali
Chiunque voglia entrare all'interno di una produzione video e abbia bisogno di una panoramica orizzontale delle competenze necessarie così da poter in futuro scegliere quale percorso intraprendere.
Chiunque realizzi video da autodidatta e voglia incrementare le proprie Skill e conoscenze base.

courses.title: Write Your Auteur Film with a Cannes-Featured Filmmaker
courses.bio: From Idea to Script: Learn the Art of Writing and Developing a Personal, Auteur Film from a Cannes-Featured Director
objectives: Learn how to approach screenwriting from an auteur perspective, blending personal vision with professional standards.
Learn how to develop a screenplay from a core idea, and prepare it for financing through logline, synopsis, outline, and treatment.
Explore the art of writing a personal auteur-driven screenplay — with practical tips on creativity, structure, writing habits and authorial identity.
Learn the art and craft of screenwriting and filmmaking from my lived experience, both academic and practical.
Learn to think like an auteur: personal, bold, and (un)compromising.

Script - writing steps: The Spark: How to Cultivate and Recognize a Great Film Idea
The Logline: Your Film’s Core Compass
The Art of the Synopsis: Telling Your Story in One Page
The Power of Structure: Writing Your Story Outline
Between Literature and Cinema: How to Write a Great Treatment
Finalizing the First Draft: How to Keep Your Vision While Accepting Feedback
The Final Draft Is Never Final- Adapting the Script During Pre-Production
Director’s Statement – What’s the Most Important Document After Your Script?
Director’s statement -Personal Insight- Understanding Your Own Story

Analytic vs. Synthetic Writing: Shaping Story Through World or Character
Types of narrative structures: linear and fragmented.
Types of narrative structures: Stream of Thought: Dreamlike & Associative
Finding the Rhythm of Your Film
Film Tempo: Balancing Emotion, Structure & Auteur Vision
Writing Rhythm: How Sentence Structure Sets the Film’s Pace
Scoring the Script: How Music Shapes Your Writing
Writing Habits: How to Finish Your Script
Fade out - Until the Next Course

requirements: You don't need any filmmaking experience — just the passion to make your auteur film
courses.description:
This is the first of the total four courses designed for filmmakers and storytellers who want to create personal, meaningful films. As a Cannes-featured director and scriptwriter with experience in both high-end productions and low-budget, guerrilla-style filmmaking, I will guide you through the essential early stages of auteur film development and scriptwriting — from your initial idea to a production-ready shooting draft.
In the first block, we will learn how to articulate your project through essential development materials: logline, synopsis, treatment, and the director’s statement - the key development materials you'll need to shape your project and present it to film funds and co-producers. You'll learn how to write these documents— all from the point of view of an auteur filmmaker.
The second block dives into the creative and structural process of writing the script itself. We’ll explore character, narrative arcs, themes, and the practicalities of working toward a script that’s both personal and artistically grounded, and ready for production.
By the end of this course, you’ll understand the full path from initial idea to shooting draft — and be equipped with tools to take your film, with clarity and authorship, to the next stage - Financing and Pre-Production - the topic of the next course.
--
I created these courses because 15 years ago, when I was starting out - these is the exact courses I wish I had. Something that could offer not just theory and instructions, but a sense of what directing truly feels like — the experience before the experience. That realization became the driving force behind this project.
In all four courses, we will cover all the essential aspects of filmmaking — from an auteur point of view- from theory to practical application, from visual storytelling to emotional tone. You will learn how to write a screenplay, prepare for the shoot, work with actors, lead a crew, and shape your film in post-production. But this is not just a technical course. I will also share personal experience: stories, challenges, mistakes, and breakthroughs I’ve experienced on real sets, so you can gain valuable insight into the emotional and intuitive side of directing.
Auteur filmmaking means leading the creative vision, and that requires more than knowledge — it requires self-awareness, intuition, and trust in your voice. This course is here to help you develop all three.
By the end of all four courses, you won’t just understand how films are made — you’ll feel equipped and inspired to make your own. Whether you’re just starting out or already on your path, these courses offer a deep, honest, and practical look into what it really means to be an auteur filmmaker today.
target_audience: lm students who want to complement their academic knowledge with practical experience in screenwriting, loglines, directors’ statements, and synopses—approached from an auteur perspective
An experienced scriptwriter and filmmaker who needs additional knowledge, different perspective or artistic inspiration.
For directors, screenwriters, or producers who wish to upgrade their understanding of the entire process of creating an auteur film.

requirements: You should be willing to learn and put your idea to paper/screen. Creating and coming up with new ideas is so much fun.
Computer, laptop, tablet or even your phone should be fine. You can also write with your typewriter. ;)
courses.description:
Learn to write your first AWESOME SCRIPT quickly and easily in this screenwriting course for beginners!


This course with a simple step-by-step approach will help you get the right skills to write your first script. It includes lessons for feature-length screenwriting and even a lesson that will let you know how to apply everything to your first short film too. Lessons are made in an easy to understand manner and you'll learn all the basics they teach at film schools.
You will learn how to find ideas, write a pitch page, how to structure your story, develop characters, write the script, how to use screenwriting software and how to battle creative blocks. I've also added document examples for you to see how each document and script looks like.
Because the theory is nothing without practice, there are special assignments for you to test out everything you'll learn. Practice makes perfect and you'll soon be able to write a script ready to be filmed.
I am updating and adding new videos regularly and you can also suggest me what you’d like to learn and can create a specific lesson from your request.


Join other students and advance your screenwriting skills now! You got this!

Not sure yet? Check out what other students are saying.
THIS IS YOUR TIME-SAVING WEAPON IF YOU WANT TO KNOW EVERYTHING FAST!
"Hi Ire,
I am writing you this email to thank you for this useful course. I was a beginner in video making and scriptwriting. With your course which explained in detail but at the same time, I could also understand everything without any difficulties, you helped me move on from a beginner level.
The whole course leads you with the most basic things then the knowledge spreads in all aspects. But it's really enjoyable, especially the movie lists. You are introduced to all genres and how they are used in famous movies. Then you have to eventually write your own as well. As the course continues you are pumped with the concentrated knowledge that the director, Irenej himself gained over the years... Man! This is your time-saving weapon if you want to know everything fast! Everything is organised and put in detail just for you!
Last but not least, regardless if you are a rookie of video making or a person who just wants to know this field, I guarantee you this course is your top choice and what's even better is that an experienced movie director and screenwriter, Irenej is always in line with you to tackle your problems.”- Li Wei-Zhe, Taiwan


GREAT INTRODUCTION TO THE FILMMAKING WORLD
"It was a great introduction to the filmmaking world for a total beginner. Definitely very useful knowledge, which was taught in a fine, clear and comprehensive way. Irenej is such a pure soul and always teaches with his passion and is prepared to give any additional information, advice and empower me to go further..." - Ms. Ines, Slovenia


THIS COURSE EQUIPPED ME WITH SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE
"To someone who works in the intersection of museums and heritage, experience design and Virtual Reality (VR), this course has given me an opportunity to learn more about the approach to storytelling from the film industry. I believe innovation comes from interdisciplinary collaboration and from merging knowledge and skills from both mature and emerging disciplines." - Dr. Kaja Antlej, Australia

Writers who want to turn their books in to Screenplays.

requirements: Não é necessário experiência prévia com IA ou vídeo—guiamos você do básico até um nível avançado, passo a passo.
courses.description:
Bem-vindo ao curso definitivo para dominar a criação de vídeos com IA!
Se você está começando do zero ou quer aprimorar suas habilidades, este curso vai te guiar passo a passo pelo mundo empolgante (e em rápida evolução) da criação de vídeos com inteligência artificial.
Descubra por que o vídeo com IA é o futuro da criação de conteúdo e como é mais fácil de dominar do que você imagina. Use essas habilidades para iniciar uma nova carreira, impulsionar seu trabalho atual ou simplesmente explorar por diversão.
Este curso foi estruturado para que qualquer pessoa possa acompanhar—não é necessário conhecimento prévio. Pule direto para seções específicas, se preferir, ou siga o curso completo para uma experiência completa.
Para tornar o conteúdo ainda mais acessível, este curso foi traduzido com ferramentas de IA (e vamos te mostrar como fazer isso também) do idioma original, o inglês. Todos os materiais também foram traduzidos com IA. Para páginas de sites mostradas no curso, ative a tradução automática do seu navegador para visualizá-las no idioma de sua escolha (caso isso não ocorra automaticamente).
Os slides e as ferramentas de IA mostrados nos vídeos estão em inglês. Reduzimos o preço do curso para mantê-lo acessível a todos e refletir possíveis pequenas diferenças de idioma.
Alunos que querem aprender a criar vídeos com IA normalmente enfrentam 3 grandes desafios—este curso resolve todos eles:
Aprendizado Completo, Tudo em Um Lugar:
Curso com mais de 18 horas que guia você passo a passo por todos os aspectos da criação de vídeos com IA—organizado e fácil de seguir.
Perfeito para Iniciantes:
Não tem experiência anterior? Sem problemas! Traga seu notebook e mergulhe em projetos práticos, demonstrações em tempo real e orientações claras pensadas para quem está começando.
O Que Você Vai Aprender:
Fundamentos do Vídeo com IA
Entenda os princípios básicos da criação de vídeos com IA, por que ela é uma revolução, e como está transformando diversas indústrias.
Fluxos de Trabalho com IA
Aprenda fluxos estruturados adaptados para diferentes tipos de projetos—redes sociais, anúncios, curtas-metragens e muito mais.
Gerando Ideias com IA
Domine o processo criativo com ferramentas como ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Copilot e Perplexity para desenvolver conceitos de vídeo inovadores.
Roteiros e Estruturas com IA
Crie roteiros envolventes e estruturas de vídeo com ferramentas como ChatGPT, Scribbler, ChatSonic, TextCortex e Gemini.

WHAT THEY ARE SAYING
Charlie, you are one of the best instructors I have ever had regardless of the subject. You never talk over my head and sound like you actually want me to learn and not just earn yourself a paycheck. I thank you. - Gerald S.

Learn how to be a professional outdoor and nature photographer!

Who’s the Instructor?
There are many courses on how to be an amazing photographer, but how many are taught by true professionals who have a career and worked as a photographer?
I was formally trained at Brooks Institute in the 1980s and have worked every day since. I have photographed for Fortune 500 companies, been published in countless magazines (you’ve probably heard of), and photographed in every state in the USA.
I have taught photo workshops across the USA and the Middle East. Founded two stock photo agencies, and sold thousands of stock photos. I love to teach and want to ensure you succeed and love photography like I do. You can trust me to teach you photography!

courses.description:
Eu direciono o curso nomeando cada parte que vai levar você a escrever um roteiro de audiovisual. Com exemplos, eu falo sobre os tópicos essenciais para criar uma história, falo de narradores, dou dicas, mostro sinopse, personagens, escaleta, estrutura, roteiro e formatação.
Ao fazer os exercícios fundamentados nas minhas orientações, cada aluno poderá chegar a uma ideia. Ajudo aos interessados e às interessadas a desenvolver a ideia, caso não tenha uma.
As sessões das aulas podem ser acompanhadas de acordo com a intenção, conhecimento ou interesse de cada um/a.
Na última parte, faço uma engenharia reversa em que transcrevo o roteiro de um filme. O curso é preparado com muito cuidado, e com a certeza de que este caminho te levará a escrever o seu roteiro, pois, eu conheço esse caminho, já passei por ele.
Este curso é, sobretudo, prático. Você acompanha as aulas e escreve um roteiro.
Se quem escreve um roteiro se torna roteirista, você está a um passo!
Quando eu iniciei a formatação deste curso, estava pensando em sintetizar ao máximo com o intuito de descomplicar e proporcionar a possibilidade dos alunos e alunas escreverem logo roteiros para diversos meios, TV, cinema, internet e outros. Eu mantenho esta sugestão. Por entender que o aprendizado acontece com a prática, proponho a realização de um roteiro de curta-metragem, que é o caminho para ir além. O curso é objetivo e estou considerando a fase inicial, introduzindo ao avançado, considerando os alunos que já têm algum conhecimento do assunto. Em um passo a passo, compartilho informações essenciais para escrever Roteiros. Lembre-se que é transitando por estes tópicos que você chegará ao longa-metragem. Bons estudos!

courses.description:
Are you ready to take your video editing skills to the next level? Whether you're a content creator, an aspiring filmmaker, or just looking to make your videos look more professional, this Premiere Pro course for beginners is the perfect place to start.
In this comprehensive course, you'll learn everything you need to know to start creating stunning videos that will wow your audience. We'll cover all the basics, including importing footage, organizing your project, and adding transitions and effects. You'll also learn advanced techniques such as color grading, audio mixing to take your videos to the next level.
But what really sets this course apart is the hands-on approach. We'll start with a quick overview of the software, but then we'll dive right in and start creating. You'll follow along with me step-by-step as we work through real-world projects, putting your new skills to the test as you go.
And if you ever get stuck or have questions, don't worry! You'll have access to a supportive community of fellow students, where you can ask for help, share tips and tricks, and get feedback on your projects.
But the best part? This course is designed for beginners, with clear explanations and easy-to-follow instructions. No prior experience with Premiere Pro or video editing is required. By the end of the course, you'll have the skills and confidence to create amazing videos that you can be proud of.
So what are you waiting for? Enroll in this Premiere Pro course for beginners today and start creating videos that will leave your audience speechless! With lifetime access to the course, you can learn at your own pace and refer back to the lessons whenever you need a refresher.
target_audience: Absolute beginners who have no experience with Adobe Premiere Pro or video editing.
Students who want to learn video editing as a new skill for personal or professional use.

courses.title: Become a master drone pilot in 2 weeks and start a business
courses.bio: Learn to fly a drone cinematically and get proven tips on how to start and manage an aerial filming business
objectives: This course is broken down into five major sections or modules. In the first section, you’ll learn everything about camera setup. This section will provide detailed walkthrough of different video options from best resolution to shoot at with editing infrastructure in mind to best field of view to film with from the perspective of drones to best frame rate to film at with having lighting in mind. We will also cover best time-lapse mode option to select from when taking aerial images as well as best Mega Pixel options to choose when flying for longer period of time. All of this will ensure that your drone is capturing the best quality of video or photo so you can have a professional product after post-production.

In the second section, you’ll learn about aerial cinematography. We’ll cover drone safety, basic drone flights and advance aerial cinematography, which will include correct camera positioning techniques and unique cinematic drone shots including and not limiting to: Ground Up, Tilt, Pan, Orbit Rotate, Narrow Discover, Fly to space, Fly from space, and other unique shots to empower you to bring unique cinematic shots in your overall aerial footage.

In the third section of this course, you’ll be taught on how to professionally edit videos, mainly aerial videos. We’ll cover basic editing tools overview, How to import media into the project and into the libraries, Adding Text and Transitions, Basic and advance color grading, syncing videos to the beat of the audio, 4k zoom from fix camera lens, adding watermarks to your videos to finally adding 3D Motion Graphics Fly through Text effects to your aerial videos. This section will ultimately teach you how to take your perfectly shot aerial videos to making them breathtakingly amazing!

Forth section of this course will uncover the art of photo editing. For that, we’ll use Adobe Lightroom to polish up your aerial photos. This section will teach basic editing tools overview, Importing and tagging images, Selective advance editing using Brush and gradient tools, How to remove shadow of drone from the images, Camera profiling - How to flatten out images with fish eye effect automatically and how to add watermarks to multiple photos automatically using batch export with client’s name embedded within the file name. This section will bring your aerial photos to life!

Last and the most important part of this course is how to start your own aerial filming business. We’ll discuss how to create your own logos, website, business cards and how to find, attract and acquire the right type of customers interested in aerial footage. We’ll also uncover how to create professional invoices with the right stipulations added for an aerial filming business. In addition, we’ll discuss how to set the right price for various different aerial filming jobs (Aerial Photos, Aerial Videos and Custom work) and we’ll discuss how to create a proper business plan for your business by having a goal and target in mind when operating an aerial filming business so that you can start, manage, sustain and ultimately grow your aerial filming business
requirements: None. But it would be good to have a drone to follow along. If you’re interested in purchasing a drone, but not sure how to justify the cost, this course will allow you learn everything from scratch. It would be good to have a drone to practice everything taught in this course with. Ultimately this course will allow you to start your own aerial filming business with confidence since you'll learn how to plan, properly film, professional edit and skillfully deliver content to your clients.
courses.description:
**Be sure to watch the course promo video to understand what benefits you can get from taking this course, which will be available to you for lifetime access**

*Course now has Phantom 4 videos with more to come*
