Course Description:

Over 10 hours of course videos, you’ll learn the basics camera setup, basic drone control, drone safety, advance aerial cinematography with behind the scenes walkthrough of how to position, fly and capture your subjects in the best possible manner.
After you’ve learned how to fly and capture the subject properly, you’ll be taught how to use an advance video editing software to learn how edit, colour grade and export your footage for your prospective clients. In addition, you’ll also learn how to edit aerial photos in an advance photo editing software.
Last, once you’ve learned all technical skills from flying to editing, you’ll be taught how to start your aerial filming business. We’ll cover the basics on how to create website, logos to more aerial filming focused topics like setting the right price for your aerial photo and video service. We’ll also cover how to acquire clients and what stipulations to put in your invoices to cover you for weather delays, cancellations and other interesting scenarios that might come up. If you’re serious about learn new tricks and techniques and to ultimately start a business in a hot aerial filming market, then this course is for you.
target_audience: Everyone:  If you’re looking to learn on how to edit aerial photos and video, this course is for you. If you’re looking to start an aerial filming business, this course is for you. If you’re looking to learn some new and unique cinematic aerial shots, this course is for you. If you’re looking to learn best camera setup technique when taking aerial photos and videos, this course is for you. If you're looking to learn a professional video editing software to edit and color correct your aerial videos, this course is for you. If you’re looking to add some 3D motion graphics in your aerial footage, this course is for you.

courses.description:
iPhone Filmmaking Masterclass – Film and Edit Cinematic Videos Like a Pro
Want to shoot cinematic, professional-looking videos using just your iPhone?
This class will walk you through the entire process of filming, capturing audio, and editing high-quality videos using the tools you already have.
Whether you're a beginner, content creator, YouTuber, or traveller, this class is designed to help you unlock the full filmmaking potential of your iPhone, without needing expensive gear or prior experience.
What You’ll Learn
In this masterclass, you'll gain hands-on knowledge and real-world techniques to shoot beautiful, cinematic footage with your iPhone. Here's what you'll learn step-by-step:
How to film professional-looking videos using your iPhone’s built-in camera
How to set up and use the free Blackmagic Camera App
Best video formats for mobile filming: ProRes vs HEVC (H.265)
How to shoot in Apple Log and understand color spaces
How to lock shutter speed, ISO, and white balance for stable exposure
Framing techniques: rule of thirds, leading lines, top-down shots, POV
How to record clean, professional audio using external microphones (e.g. DJI Mic 2)
Adapting your video settings for different lighting conditions (indoor, bright sun, low light)
A full walkthrough on color grading Apple Log footage using DaVinci Resolve (or your preferred software)
Gear recommendations for filming on the go: tripods, C-stands, ND filters, and more
You’ll see real-world examples and complete filming breakdowns so you can replicate everything confidently on your own.
Who is this class for?
Anyone using an iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 16 Pro, or any newer model that supports Apple Log video. No prior video experience needed.


Final Notes
This class is designed to make iPhone filmmaking feel approachable and professional. By the end of it, you’ll not only understand the technical side of mobile video, you’ll also feel confident turning everyday moments into stunning visual stories.
Ready to turn your iPhone into your most powerful camera? Let’s begin.


Class Project: Create Your Own Cinematic iPhone Video
To apply what you've learned, your class project is to:
Film and edit a 30-second to 1-minute cinematic video using your iPhone.
This can be a travel montage, a city walk, a moody indoor scene, or anything else you'd like to capture creatively.
Don’t want to shoot your own footage right away?
No problem. You can use the raw video clips provided and practice your editing and color grading skills.
You’re encouraged to:
Apply proper exposure and color balance
Use framing techniques (leading lines, rule of thirds, etc.)
Color grade your footage using a cinematic LUT or your own style
Once you're done, upload your video to the class project gallery. I'm excited to see your work and give feedback. If you have any questions while filming or editing, feel free to ask in the discussions section, I’m here to help.
target_audience: iPhone Users
Content Creators
Youtubers
Videographers

courses.title: Learn Wedding + Event Videography
courses.bio: A comprehensive look at what it takes to do wedding videography uniquely, artistically, and profitably
objectives: Have a good overview of the entire process of booking, creating, and delivering your videos to clients
Learn many of the crucial aspects, tips, and things to focus on in filming and editing
Demystify what it takes to make high end wedding films from start to finish
Learn the power of finding your 'why' and building your brand on that
Be inspired to tell story and enjoy the work you do

At the Event + Filmmaking: Showing Up and Getting Ready Coverage
Post Production: Review Process and Finalizing Your Project

requirements: No prior experience necessary, just a desire to learn
courses.description:
So you want to be a wedding and event filmmaker but you're not sure where to begin?
This course offers a comprehensive look at what it takes and comes from my experience of doing more than 500 events.
Yes, you heard that right!
And I want to pass on what I've learned.


I've condensed nearly 20 years of pro filmmaking into a course that will inform and inspire you.
You'll learn the details that make all the difference in what can be a very intimidating world for many.


From how to start your brand to getting clients, on to how to capture, edit, and deliver your final film.
The entire process and things you didn't even think about but need to know. How to take an idea and turn it into a creation unique to your style.


This course is made for anyone interested in wedding videography, from a true beginner to someone who's been at it for a while but wants to take their craft to new levels.


Included in this course are 20 video lessons and an accompanying pdf so you can follow along as we engage on each major front of the business.
In the end you will know what is required to make a great story out of a wedding event.
And one that makes money! So you can continue to do the work that inspires both you and your clients.


So start today and begin your journey!
target_audience: Those interested or just beginning in the event video world and video pros looking to further their skills

courses.title: Lights, Camera, Hired! Landing Your First Job In TV & Film
courses.bio: A step-by-step guide to landing your first job in TV or film with no experience or connections needed.
objectives: Learn how to create a standout résumé, cover letter, and demo reel that grab attention and get callbacks in the competitive TV/film job market.
Discover where to find real, entry-level TV and film jobs beyond the traditional job boards—plus how to spot red flags.
Master the art of networking and self-promotion to build valuable industry connections, even without prior experience or contacts.
Gain insider strategies to ace interviews, follow up the right way, and stay employed by becoming the kind of crew member people rehire.
requirements: There are no prerequisites to take this course—it's designed for beginners! Whether you're a college student, recent grad, or career-changer, you're welcome here.  All you need is:  -A strong interest in working in TV or film -Basic computer skills -Access to the internet -A willingness to learn and take action  No prior industry experience required!
courses.description:
Are you ready to land your first job in the TV or film industry—but feel stuck on where to start?
Whether you’re a college student, recent graduate, or career-changer, this course gives you a step-by-step roadmap to break into the industry—even if you have no experience or connections.
In this course, you'll learn exactly how to:
Craft a standout résumé and cover letter tailored to production roles
Create a demo reel that grabs attention in the first 10 seconds
Market yourself like a pro and build a strong personal brand
Find real job openings in both TV and film, including where professionals actually look
Network effectively and make industry connections, even if you're starting from scratch
Ace interviews and follow up professionally to land the job and stay employed
You'll also get access to downloadable resources, job search strategies, and a curated list of free tools to help you succeed.
By the end of the course, you’ll have the tools, confidence, and game plan to land your first job—and begin building a lasting career in the entertainment industry.
If you’re serious about working in TV or film, this course will save you time, frustration, and missed opportunities.
Enroll today and take the first step toward your dream job in entertainment!
target_audience: This course is for college juniors, seniors, recent graduates, and early-career professionals who want to break into the TV and film industry but aren’t sure where to start. It’s perfect for anyone pursuing a role behind the scenes—like production, editing, cinematography, or directing—and looking for a step-by-step guide to land their first job.  Whether you have a film degree or not, if you're passionate about working in TV or film and want insider strategies to stand out and get hired, this course is for you.

courses.description:
Welcome to our Photography For Beginners Complete Guide: Master Photography course!
This course was designed and produced over several months in partnership with a Toronto based professional video production company.
In this photography for beginners course, you will learn:
Photography fundamentals (iso, shutter speed, aperture, composition, rule of thirds, light meter, white balance, )
Exposure: auto vs manual
Focus: auto vs manual modes
Mobile vs DSLR Cameras

Raw photos vs JPG
3 photography scenario lessons in the field (portrait, landscape and long exposure)
Photography editing in Adobe Lightroom (3 complete photo editing lessons)
Photography tips
Finding inspiration in photography
and more!
This course will walk you through everything you need to know to get started in Photography and much more! By the end of this course, you'll have a strong understanding of how to capture great photos and then edit them professionally.

You will be provided with RAW photo files to follow along in the editing section of this course! (If you don't have Adobe Lightroom, you can download a free 30 day trial off of Adobe's website.)
The instructor for this course is David Paul. He is a Toronto based Professional Photographer that is often featured across several social media platforms. He has established himself as an urban landscape photographer with a focus on unique street scenes. David has been asked hundreds of times how he captured his photos and through partnering with a video production company, he was able to create a complete guide to photography for beginners!
Enrol today to take your photography game to the next level!

requirements: This course is created for aspiring models who have the drive, willingness, & motivation to follow each step towards finally turning their passion into their profession. There is no specific requirements to become a model and there is literally a market for ANYONE and EVERYONE willing to work for it.
courses.description:
What is the Model Training Agency? The Model Training Agency - a.k.a: MTA - consists of professionally represented Models who were just like you at the beginning of their careers. This course was created because we thoroughly understand the struggles that newer Models are subjected to.
These days, many of the top agencies specifically look for “developed” or “educated” Models that have an understanding of the industry and how it works. Why? Signing an educated model saves the agency's time and effort in having to assist in the developmental process. When we begin booking jobs, we, the Models, reflect the agency's reputation. They must feel confident in sending their Models out on jobs and castings. But wait, what exactly defines a developed model? Simply put, a Model who has a keen understanding of the industry and composes themselves as a PROFESSIONAL. This is key.
Education will not only put you in the top percentage of an agency's roster, but with consistent persistence, it will place you in the top percentage of the industry altogether. This course will equip each aspiring model with the tools, knowledge, and empowerment to play the game smarter not necessarily harder. Reach your full potential and run with it towards your professional dreams!
target_audience: Aspiring models who are ready, eager, excited, and motivated to live the life of a professional Model.

requirements: An iPhone
The desire to improve your iPhone photography
courses.description:
Don’t settle for “just average” to “good” photos when you and your iPhone are capable of creating truly outstanding photos. You just need to learn the techniques and with my crash course style training you’ll learn them very quickly!
It won’t take you years or even months to learn how to shoot great photos. You’ll be able to completely master your iPhone camera including its hidden features in a little over an hour. Then you’ll learn my easy composition techniques that you’ll be able to put in to practice immediately.
Most people find it difficult to learn photographic composition. In fact, it took me years to learn these techniques from books, classes, research and experience, but you’ll learn these techniques in a fraction of the time that it took me.
That’s because over the years, I’ve found a way to simplify the concepts into easy to understand and follow guidelines. No technical talk or overwhelm here. Just practice my fun and easy techniques and you could see great improvement in your iPhone photography in just a couple of weeks.
Some additional things you will learn:
How to take very sharp and clear photos even when viewed on larger screens. Most photos look sharp on the small iPhone screen, but when you view them on a larger screen, such as an iPad, computer monitor or a TV screen they often look fuzzy and pixelated.

How to take amazing low-light shots regardless of which model iPhone you use.

The difference between quick snapshots and a well-composed photograph. Good composition is the key to great photos regardless of the type of camera you're using.

How to recognize a good photo opportunity when you see it. Most people are blind to the photo opportunities all around them. I hear so many people say, "There is nothing to shoot where I live". Well, after going through this course you'll begin to “see” photo opportunities everywhere.

You’ll know exactly what to look for when you go out to shoot photos. With my specific guidelines to follow you'll immediately know if a subject or scene has good potential to be a great photo.

How to use angles and perspective to add interest and impact to your photos.

How to take better photos while vacationing or traveling. Who wants the same old average photos that everyone else is taking at popular locations?

Plus, much more!
This course covers all model iPhones including the latest iPhone 15 models.
target_audience: iPhone photography beginners who want to dramatically improve their iPhone photography.
Anyone who wants to learn how to take professional looking photos quickly, without overwhelm.
Anyone who wants to learn how to use their iPhone camera to its full potential, including the hidden features.
People who want to develop their "photographer's eye" through easy-to-learn composition techniques.

Dive into the exciting world of video editing and transform your passion into a profitable business with this comprehensive course! This course is tailored for beginners and unfolds the seamless journey from mastering Adobe Premiere Pro to freelancing success on Upwork.

Budding video editors, freelancers, and anyone aspiring to turn their creative knack into a thriving business. This course is beginner-friendly, crafted for individuals ready to learn new technology and skills.

requirements: Eine Drohne mit Kamera. Im Kurs werden zur Demonstration Drohnen von DJI verwendet, allerdings sind die meisten Prinzipien universell.
courses.description:
In diesem Kurs bringe ich Dir bei, wie Du mit Deiner Drohne professionelle Luftaufnahmen erstellen kannst.
Hast Du Dich schon einmal gefragt, wieso viele Deiner Aufnahmen auf dem Vorschaubild toll, am Computer dann aber langweilig aussehen?Hast Du Dich schon einmal gefragt, ob es überhaupt möglich ist, mit Consumer-Drohnen professionelle Luftaufnahmen zu drehen?
Und bist Du dann zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass die Videos der anderen besser aussehen, weil sie mehr um die Welt jetten und exotischere Orte ablichten können?
All diese Gedanken kenne ich aus eigener Erfahrung. Sie können Ambitionen in Enttäuschung verwandeln.
Aber nach mehr als zehn hauptberuflichen Jahren im Film- und sechs Jahren im Drohnenbusiness habe ich endlich herausgefunden, wie Profis Luftaufnahmen erstellen.
Und all dieses Wissen teile ich mit Dir in diesem Kurs: Filmen mit Drohnen.
Aber wer bin ich überhaupt? Ein Anfänger? Drohnenenthusiast? Vielleicht ein Profi?
Ich heiße Tom David Frey und habe Filmemachen im Blut. Meine erste Kamera bekam ich mit nur sechs Jahren. Filmpreise in Deutschland, der Schweiz, in Frankreich, Dänemark und sogar in den USA zeichneten einige meiner Kurzfilme und Dokumentationen aus.
Hauptberuflich arbeite ich seit mehr als 10 Jahren in der Medienbranche - und seit nunmehr sechs Jahren mit dem Schwerpunkt Drohnen.
Bereits jetzt folgen mir mehr als 200.000 Zuschauer bei YouTube (hauptsächlich meinem englischsprachigen Kanal; Allerdings wächst auch das deutschsprachige Pendant und erreicht derzeit etwa 40.000 Abonnenten).
Von und mit meinen Zuschauern habe ich gelernt, komplexe Themen einfach und verständlich aufzubereiten.
Du wirst vom Kurs weder überrumpelt werden, noch gelangweilt sein.
Denn den Weg, den Du jetzt vor Dir hast, bin ich schon gegangen. Und er bringt Dich nicht nur weiter, sondern macht mega viel Spaß!
Diesen Kurs zusammenzustellen hat fast exakt ein Jahr lang gedauert. Noch nie habe ich derart viel Wissen zum Thema Luftaufnahmen geteilt. Noch nie so lange an einem Einzelprojekt gearbeitet. Und die Arbeit hat sich gelohnt:
Der Kurs ist in sieben Kapitel unterteilt:

Einleitung
(2 Videos)

Grundlagenwissen
(4 Videos)

Werde kreativ!
(2 Videos)

Planung und Vorbereitung
(5 Videos)

Wetter, Licht, Tages- und Jahreszeiten
(5 Videos)

Luftaufnahmen erstellen
(19 Videos)

Nachbearbeitung
(7 Videos)

In diesem Kurs erhältst Du das Wissen und die kreativen Mittel, um Luftaufnahmen auf einem professionellen Level zu drehen.
Denn viel wichtiger als die neueste Drohne oder ein exotischer Drehort sind Deine Fähigkeiten! Und die bringe ich jetzt gemeinsam mit Dir auf Vordermann! Schau den Kurs, lerne fleißig und übe mit Deiner Drohne - und Du wirst Dich schon bald meilenweit von der Konkurrenz absetzen!


Schreib Dich jetzt ein und sei dabei,
Dein Tom David Frey
target_audience: Der Kurs richtet sich hauptsächlich an Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene im Drohnenbereich, die ihre Kenntnisse auf- und ausbauen und professionelle Luftaufnahmen erstellen wollen

courses.description:
Welcome to the DJI Mini 2 course! DJI Mini 2 is a safe, easy-to-fly DJI drone built for anyone who wants to experience the joy of flight.
In the course of the lessons we will analyze in detail all the features and functionality of the DJI Mini 2.
We will focus on the configuration properties, the features that distinguish it, and then find out how to fly it in the best way with total safety.
How does the Course work? The course will last about 3 hours and can be followed several times.
No special knowledge is required to follow it; however, owning a DJI Mini 2 is recommended, so you can put the knowledge contained in the course directly into practice.
Introduction. In this chapter will show all the components of the DJI Mini2, its features and the various steps in order to prepare your drone to fly.
Aircraft Control. In this chapter you will learn to know and use the Remote Controller: the essential device for piloting your drone.
We will begin to perform the first flight maneuvers by providing you some useful tips to get the most out of your performance, especially in terms of signal transmission.
DJI Fly App. The DJI Fly is the powerful application, developed from DJI and dedicated to all "Mini" pilots, that allows you to manage all the features and information coming from the drone. Knowing it thoroughly is the first step to having total control of the Mini2.
Camera Settings and Flight Modes. We will analyze the features of the camera and we will focus on the settings related to aerial shooting control. We will go into further detail by focusing on the various flight modes available.
Advanced Aircraft Control. We'll dedicate a short chapter to show you some advanced flight maneuvers, both manual and automatic: like the intelligent flight modes Quickshots, which in just a few taps allow you to create fantastic videos.
Editing video. Thanks to DJI Fly App, you can create fantastic videos to share on social media with just one tap. We will show you how to create audiovisual creations with a professional look.
Restrictions and Flight Rules - In this chapter we will give you some useful tips on how to best prepare, in order to always carry out flight operations safely, respecting flight limits and rules.
Maintenance. In this chapter, we will look at the steps and tricks to keep your new Mini 2 at its best and up-to-date with the latest features.
We will give you some tips for a good maintenance regarding Intelligent Flight Battery and Propellers and we will discover the DJI Care Refresh.
We thank you for your attention and wish you a good continuation.
target_audience: Drone pilots
Videographers
Photographers
Journalist
Bloggers

requirements: Have overflowing passion for filmmaking / wedding videography
courses.description:
Hi, I am Jubert Michael Valmores and I am a filmmaker based in the Philippines. I have been making videos, or storytelling as I call it, for 4 years.
What we’re going to learn here is the art of SAME DAY EDIT wedding videography, everything from my gears to organizing files and maximizing time for fast editing. In the first part, I will tell you about my style of storytelling, that is what I call my way of videography, and we will slowly progress to the parts of the wedding until you can develop your own format for your SDE video. Once you have made your own format, you can apply this to your SDE or in any kind of wedding video outputs that you will be making, and with this, it’ll be easier for you to make them. And of course, the main topic in this course is how we do Same Day Edit or what we call SDE. A quick way to edit.


What is the Same Day Edit or SDE?


It is a film that is edited on the same day as the wedding that will be shown at the end of the reception program showing the highlights of the celebration. The usual length of every SDE that I do is 5-8 minutes. Although it may sound difficult, once you will learn the basics of how to tell a story and edit fast, it’ll be easier than you thought it would be.
target_audience: Wedding Videographers
Filmmaker
Videographers

courses.title: How To Shoot Photos That Sell

Submit to stock agencies, avoid rejections and maximize your sales
requirements: Basic Photography Knowledge
Digital Camera or Smartphone

courses.description:
SELL YOUR PHOTOS ONLINE
If you're interested in selling your photos online, this is the right course for you. We'll cover EVERYTHING you need to know to successfully upload and sell your photos online. In this course you'll learn how to plan, shoot, retouch, keyword and upload your photos and sell them online.
I'll share with you all my knowledge and secrets acquired through 10 years of uploading more than 40,000 photos and selling more than 1,000,000 photo licenses worldwide!
This course is for you whether you're just looking to make some extra bucks with photos you have lying around in a hard drive or if you're an experienced photographer looking to become a full-time photographer and make a living out of it.


What's so great about being a stock photographer you ask?
1. Be your own boss - You decide what to shoot, who to shoot, when to shoot. Just make sure you DO shoot and work, this is not an easy money scheme. More on that below!
2. Manage your time - Work whenever you can, at your own pace. If you have another job, you're a student or anything else and you just have a few hours a day or weekends free, that's fine, that's enough to get you started. That's how I started anyway, and now I'm a full-time stock photographer. I work when I want, I have spare time to spend with my family, friends, I decide when to work and what to work on.
3. Do what you love - If you love to travel, you love food, love pets, love people, anything's fine. You can shoot what you love and still make some money from it. No dealing with clients or bosses, just follow your passion.


You won't get rich overnight
Don't get me wrong, getting paid for your photos feels great. Finding some of your photos being used across the world is also really great. However, like all good things in life, you have to put some work in it. Stock photography is NOT about taking photos of things you have lying around your house, it's about finding your passion and giving it value by creating a photograph. And sometimes, if you get lucky, you may get that one photo or shoot that becomes viral and gets sold thousands of times!
Becoming a successful stock photographer takes time and a lot of work, but you're already ahead of so many people just by taking this course. I'll give you a head start, I'll share with you everything I've learned over the years.
target_audience: People interested in photography and looking to make some extra money
Photographers already selling stock photos who are looking to make a living out of stock photography
Amateur and Pro Photographers looking to earn an extra income by selling stock photos
Filmmakers and Illustrators interested in selling their content online

courses.description:
Uno degli ostacoli più comuni nell'ambito del videomaking è l'abilità di selezionare la colonna sonora perfetta che sappia sposarsi alla perfezione con le tue immagini. Non serve altro che una rapida navigazione online per constatare l'abbondanza di video in cui la musica sembra strana rispetto alle immagini presentate, se non addirittura fuori luogo. In questo videocorso, la nostra missione sarà quella di immergerci nell'arte di scegliere accuratamente la musica, stabilendo criteri oggettivi per selezionare e abbinare il suono all'immagine. Con questo videocorso intensivo, avrai l'opportunità di accrescere la tua sensibilità musicale, arrivando a scegliere tracce musicali che si adattino perfettamente al tuo lavoro, indipendentemente dalle tue preferenze personali.
In questo viaggio sonoro, esploreremo insieme diverse tematiche tra le quali:
Decifrare i generi musicali: Comprendere le caratteristiche distintive dei vari generi musicali e come sfruttarle al meglio nel tuo videomaking.
Identificare il mood sonoro: Imparare a catturare e a riflettere l'atmosfera del tuo video attraverso la scelta musicale.
Stabilire un legame sinergico tra suono e immagine: Tecniche e strategie per creare un'armonia perfetta tra la tua musica e le tue immagini.
Elementi chiave nella selezione della musica: Dalle nozioni di titolo, genere e tempo, fino alla comprensione delle forme d'onda, ti guiderò attraverso tutti gli aspetti importanti nella scelta della tua colonna sonora.
Questo è più di un semplice vidocorso. È un'opportunità per arricchire le tue competenze musicali e portare il tuo videomaking a un livello superiore. Non lasciarti sfuggire questa occasione per affinare la tua capacità di scegliere la colonna sonora perfetta per i tuoi video

courses.title: History of Photography: 1930s to 2010
courses.bio: How photography has been used to capture and transform the world, its inhabitants, conflicts, triumphs, and histories.
objectives: Develop skills in formal and visual analysis

The West & the Cold War (1940s to 1960s): The West & the Cold War (1940s to 1960s)

requirements: No experience necessary
courses.description:
This course is a study of photography from the 1930s to 2010 and will focus on the historical developments, trends, styles, and movements that have shaped our understanding of photography. This course consists of chronological and thematic examinations of the role of photography in relation to artistic production, art movements, social history, landscape, politics, identity, culture, postmodernism, conceptualism, and appropriation.


We will investigate the vast array of styles, artistic practices, and movements in the medium throughout the period. We will also examine how the photograph has been positioned as a documentary tool and a form of objective truth and look at how this approach has been questioned and re-envisioned. In addition, we will explore the question of how our relationship with the photograph has changed with digital technology, and how this technological influence has affected our attitudes towards the photograph. Through this course you will learn how photography has been used to capture and transform the world, its inhabitants, conflicts, triumphs,  and histories.


Slide lists with information about the images in the lectures and lists of optional short videos about the topic are provided for each lecture.  I also have a History of Photography: 1839 to the 1930s course that covers the first part of photography’s history posted on Udemy.
target_audience: Learners interested in knowing more about the history of photography and photographic processes
Photographers

courses.title: Master the Art of Colouring Black and White Photographs
courses.bio: Add emotional value to your images with toning techniques in Photoshop CC & speed up your workflow with Actions
objectives: Principles behind effective black and white toning processes
How to evaluate black and white images in terms of tonal palette
Creating and adding a monotone colorisation effect to your images

Working in a non-destructive way with the use of most powerful Photoshop techniques and tools

Introduction: Welcome to the "Master the Art of Colouring Black and White Photographs"
B&W Toning Processes overview - when to: When do we apply Toning Processes
Digital Toning Techniques: Speed up your workflow with Actions!
Digital Toning - Fun Project: Create Tinted B&W image with Colour Passepartout in a Few Steps

requirements: Ideally Photoshop CC, trial free version is more than enough.
No prior knowledge of Photoshop is necessary, I will explain all the techniques in a fun & simple way
We will work with high quality images provided as supplementary materials to help you move on even faster!
We will use prerecorded Actions - you cannot go faster than that ;)
courses.description:
Back in the day, toning black and white images involved experimenting in a darkroom with hazardous chemicals — which was worth it for the mood-enhancing, emotion-evoking results. Today, we have Photoshop to achieve the same effects faster, easier and without the need to inhale toxins. In this hands-on course, you’ll start with a neutral monochrome image and discover the endless possibilities available with skilful digital colouring, You’ll apply stunning toning effects using 10 handcrafted Photoshop Actions that also allow you to roll out complex colourisation across multiple images. Make your images nostalgic and dreamy with creamy sepia tones or create cool, ambient vibes by injecting blue tones. Get the washed-out look or go for deep, saturated tones. It’s your image… your story… and your creative freedom when you master the art of colouring your black and white photos.


Sharpen Your Skills
Powerful Toning With The Curves Tool
Take advantage of the precision and flexibility offered by the Curves tool, including introducing subtle color cast to selected luminosity ranges in your black and artwork and combining it with Layers and Masks to bring to life your most complex creative visions. It also works fits perfectly as the last stage of any non-destructive workflow.


Hue & Saturation Method
This technique allows you to effortlessly engage in monotone colorisation. It’s straightforward, quick and simple to learn, and a powerful skill to have as part of your Photoshop toolkit.


Color Balance Method
The possibilities of the color toning process is endless, and this sophisticated technique helps you achieve eye-grabbing results and uniquely crafted imagery.


The Duo Tone Photoshop Method
Explore the wide selection of ready-to-use presets available in Photoshop. This technique allows you to create images of varying complexities: one-color (monotone), two-color (duotone), three-color (tritone) and four-color (quadratone).


Color Fill Adjustment Layer Method
Play around with this super easy toning technique to turn your black and white photos into gorgeous monotone artwork.


The Gradient Map Toning Method
The Gradient Map Adjustment Layer is a terrific secret weapon in the toning process. This effective shortcut allows you to create interesting duotone artwork variations in seconds.
target_audience: Take this course if you love photography
Take this course if you want to experiment with new techniques
Take this course if you just want to relax in a creative way
Take this course to have fun, even if you don't take photos
Take this course if you work in the Design Industry
Take this course if you are an artist and would like to introduce digital techniques in your creative process
Take this course if you want to learn in detail powerful and flexible Photoshop techniques to improve your photos
Take this course if you want to color your b&w images like a pro!
Take this course if you want to develop artistic skills in fields of creative photo processing

courses.title: Feature Film Producing Course
courses.bio: Learn how to fund and distribute an independent feature film
objectives: Create a marketable feature film idea and plan
Find funding or investment for your film project
Put together and execute and full marketing strategy
Successfully distribute your film through a variety of mediums
requirements: Basic knowledge of producing films
courses.description:
Through this intensive course Michelle will teach you how to develop, fund and distribute an independent feature film.
Join her for a series of lectures as she discusses the journey from script to screen - detailing her experiences of producing her first 4 feature films with an independent production company after working for the BBC for 7 years. Her features had budgets ranging from £80,000 to £500,000 and all acquired distribution in multiple territories worldwide.
Development & Funding
We will discuss crucial aspects of development such as timing, the importance of working on multiple projects at once, getting distributor / agent's input, attracting cast and identifying an audience.
She will then dive into the different funding routes available including:
BFI development funding (approach to this sort of funding compared to private investment)
Private investment (what to offer investors and how to handle them.
Film Investment companies (the pro’s and con’s)
Tax credit
Product placement
Marketing & Distribution
You’ve made a feature film, now how do you get it distributed, seen and profitable?
Here Michelle will discuss how to create a buzz around your film and this topics such as:
Getting on set visits by media
Self promotion
Utilising BTS materials and footage
Making the most of any USP’s
She will then cover working with Agent / distributors. Ideally you’ve already built this connection in phase 1, but if not we'll discuss how to you find someone suitable. She will also discuss the pros and cons of taking it on yourself vs using an agent
We'll also discuss festivals and how useful the festival run really is. You will also receive some tips and strategies on building relationships with festivals.
Finally we will discuss whether you can truly make money from independent films?
target_audience: Filmmakers looking to produce one of their first feature films.

courses.description:
Welcome to "From 0 to 1 Million YouTube Views with Viral AI Filmmaking" – A Real Case Study of Explosive Growth Using AI Tools!


This is not your typical course—this is a real-world case study that shows you exactly how we turned AI filmmaking into explosive YouTube success. In just 10 days, we achieved 1 million views on our videos—and monetized the channel—without spending a single dollar on ads! Now, we’re getting 150k views every 24 hours and expect that to grow at least 5 times more in the near future.


And here’s the kicker: this isn’t a theory, it’s all on video. Everything we did to reach these numbers is documented and shared in this course, so you can replicate our success for yourself.


What Makes This Course So Different?


A Real Case Study: Watch as we take a faceless channel from zero to over a million views, documenting every step along the way.
Proven AI Filmmaking Strategy: We used cutting-edge AI tools like DALL-E 3, Runway ML, Sora AI, Midjourney, CapCut, Canva, ChatGPT, and Eleven Labs to create viral YouTube Shorts that broke through the noise. This is the future of filmmaking, and we’ll show you how it’s done.
Unprecedented Access: This is the rare opportunity to learn from real-world success, with everything recorded on video—no fluff, no filler. This is a chance to see how to create viral content in real-time.
No Overhyped Promises: We’re not claiming to have “discovered” some secret formula. Instead, we show you exactly how we achieved 1 million views with a fresh, new way to go viral on YouTube. And we know these numbers will grow exponentially—we're sharing this because it's working right now.
Fresh and Innovative Content Creation: The videos we’re teaching you to create aren’t just regular YouTube content. These are the next big thing in viral videos—totally new, innovative, and designed for success on YouTube.


This Isn’t Just Another Course—It’s Your Opportunity to Learn from a Live, Documented Success Story.


Case studies are rare, and even rarer is the opportunity to see one unfold on camera. What we teach here isn’t just theory—it’s everything we used to achieve viral YouTube success. If you’ve been struggling to crack the YouTube code, this course is your chance to skip the guesswork and learn from what’s already working.


We’re getting real results, and it’s all right here in this course. The growth we’ve achieved is just the beginning—the next wave of viral success is waiting for you, and it’s all documented for you to follow.


Grab this opportunity while it’s still hot—because when you see how fast things grow, you’ll realize this is a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn from the pioneers of a new era of viral content creation.

Unlock the power of Adobe Premiere Pro and start creating professional-quality videos with this step-by-step course! Whether you’re a beginner looking to break into video editing or a content creator wanting to refine your skills, this course will provide you with the essential techniques to edit faster, smarter, and more creatively.

This course is designed for anyone who wants to edit videos like a pro—whether for social media, filmmaking, marketing, or freelance projects. No prior experience is required, just Adobe Premiere Pro, a creative mindset, and a passion for storytelling!
By the end of this course, you’ll have the confidence and skills to edit high-quality videos, structure your projects like a professional, and create engaging content that stands out. En este curso de narrativa aprenderás a contar historias para distintos medios como, comic, animación, cine, televisión y videojuegos. El programa está separado en 5 unidades con ejercicios y bibliografía para tu crecimiento acelerado.


Unidad 1: Teoría narrativa, donde aprenderás los fundamentos de toda historia, como lidiar con el bloqueo creativo, fundamentos de una historia y los elementos de una narrativa.
Unidad 2: Psicología de personajes, donde aprenderás los diferentes tipos de personajes, como construirlos y que funciones tienen. dimensiones de personajes y espinas dorasales.
Unidad 3: Estrucuturas narrativas donde aprenderás las distintas estructuras que puedes usar para organizar tu historia y como contarla de manera eficiente para distintos medios y una introdución a la ludificación y narrativa para juegos
Unidad 4: Narrativa avanzada, donde aprenderás a manejar el ritmo y tono de tu historia además de dominar los diálogos y escenas.
y por último producción para escritores donde aprenderás a dar los primeros pasos de tu carrera como escritor y storyteller.


Este curso está diseñado para escritores, artistas de comic, animadores, estudiantes de cine, ilustradores y cualquier persona interesada en el mundo de la narrativa, apto para cualquier persona que quiera contar su historia sin importar su nivel de experiencia o perfil.
target_audience: Estudiantes de cine
Animadores
Artistas de comic
Aspirantes a escritor
guionistas
desarrolladores de juegos

courses.title: After Effects (English)
courses.bio: Tutorials on AE
objectives: Learn the fundamentals of editing software, familiarize yourself with essential tools, and advance towards advanced techniques.
Explore audio editing, sound synchronization, and the integration of music and effects.
Learn about the implementation of effects and their combination.
Conclude the course with a comprehensive set of skills to create visually impactful content for personal or professional projects.
requirements: Tutorial on After Effects
courses.description:
Welcome to the Video Editing Course: From Basics to Advanced Techniques! This course serves as a gateway to the exciting world of video editing, designed to take you from fundamentals to advanced skills that will enable you to create visually stunning content.


We'll start from scratch, ensuring you grasp the basic concepts of editing software. You'll learn to navigate the interface, import and organize footage, and become familiar with essential tools for effective video editing.


As you progress through the course, we'll delve into more advanced techniques. You'll explore color correction to ensure your videos have a professional and cohesive look. You'll also learn about visual effects, from simple adjustments to creating complex compositions that will elevate your projects to the next level.


Audio editing is another crucial aspect we'll cover. You'll learn to synchronize sound, enhance audio quality, and mix music and effects to create an immersive auditory experience that complements your visual work.


Furthermore, we'll delve into visual storytelling, exploring how to convey narratives through video editing. You'll learn techniques to enhance narrative flow, create tension and emotion, and keep your audience engaged from start to finish.


By the end of this course, you'll have a comprehensive set of skills that will enable you to create visually impactful content for both personal and professional projects. Whether you aspire to produce your own short films, promote your brand online, or work in the film and television industry, this course will equip you with the tools and knowledge needed to achieve your goals. Get ready to unleash your creativity and take your video editing skills to the next level!
target_audience: People that want to learn editing

courses.title: DJI OSMO & OSMO Mobile - Time to create Amazing Footage
courses.bio: Learn how to create amazing stable videos & photos for the DJI Osmo & Osmo Mobile
objectives: shoot great stable video, slow motion, panos, time lapse and more
Understand the capabilities of the DJI Osmo & Osmo Mobile
Understand if the Osmo or Osmo Mobile are the right camera for you
Learn how to create great talking head videos with the Osmo
requirements: This is a beginners course designed to teach beginners or people interested in a DJI Osmo
This course also includes an extensive section dedicated to DJI Osmo Mobile
courses.description:
The DJI Osmo and Osmo mobile are amazing next level camera's that are an evolution of the action camera's such as Gopro's. The DJI Osmo is an all in one camera and stabilization system. The Osmo Mobile provides the stabilization system for your smartphone.
These systems are mobile and allow you to shoot smooth and stabilized videos and photos. The Osmo will even allow you to begin filming cinematic 4k video. The Osmo Mobile is the ideal camera for today's Vlogger or Youtuber allowing great shots and quick sharing on social media. It's developed by the known leader for drones and innovative products (DJI). This course will teach you how to unlock your potential for both the Dji Osmo and Osmo Mobile.
I'll also teach you the business model I use to build an online income to monetize your footage with this camera.
I've taken the DJI Osmo worldwide from Thailand, Vietnam, Singapore, Malaysia, and South Africa to film 4k footage and got amazing results without the use of a tripod. During the course you will see some example of the footage taken with Osmo during our travel.
You can do cool things with these camera's like facial active tracking, talking head videos, motion time-lapses, selfies, 360 panoramas, time lapses, and new filming techniques. These will be taught in the course.
Once you have learned how to take amazing footage I'm going to introduce you how you can monetize the footage from this camera to earn an online passive income.
target_audience: an osmo student who wants to get the most out of their Osmo
A vlogger/freelancer that is interested in vlogging and is looking for a next level camera
Anyone interested in filming easier talking head video

courses.title: Beginner Car Rigging & Animation in Blender
courses.bio: Crash course to get you started from scratch
objectives: How to rig a car using free addon "Rigacar"
How to quickly setup an environment using free addon "BlenderKit"
How to light the scene and add Fog
Learn Car animation from Scratch

How to Use the Procedural Road: How to Use the Procedural Road
Camera: Finalizing the Truck and Camera Animation

requirements: No experience needed, as I will take everyone from Scratch
courses.description:
In this comprehensive and beginner-friendly course, we will take a structured, step-by-step approach to ensure you don’t miss a single detail. Whether you’re new to 3D or looking to refine your skills, this course will guide you through the entire process—from environment creation to advanced animation techniques.
We’ll start by building a fully procedural road system (yes, completely free!) before moving on to creating a rich and immersive environment. You’ll learn how to scatter props efficiently, add realistic lighting, and incorporate atmospheric effects like fog to enhance the depth and mood of your scene. Plus, we’ll dive into the powerful concept of instancing to optimize performance and keep your project running smoothly.
Next, you’ll rig and animate a car, setting it on a dynamic path for lifelike motion. We’ll also explore cinematic camera movements, helping you achieve professional-quality renders that feel immersive and realistic. By the end of the course, you’ll have the skills to create a stunning 3D animation that tells a visual story.
The best part? You won’t need expensive assets! Everything we use comes from free plugins like BlenderKit, and I’ll guide you step by step in setting up additional free tools for car rigging and camera shake to elevate your final render.
If you’re excited to learn from scratch with clear, hands-on explanations, this course is for you! Sign up now and start creating breathtaking 3D scenes today!
target_audience: Beginners, enthusiasts wanting to enter automotive animation industry.

courses.title: Cinematic AI: Directing Camera Shots with Nano Banana
courses.bio: Master AI Cinematography. Master Cinematic Shots, Angles, and Composition with Nano Banana. Learn to Direct AI.
objectives: Generate the full range of cinematic shot sizes, from epic Wide Shots to emotional Close-Ups.
Direct camera angles (High, Low, Dutch) to manipulate emotion and control the story's power dynamics.
Write descriptive prompts like a director to generate high-quality, cinematic AI images.
Master cinematic framing techniques like the Two Shot and Over-the-Shoulder to direct conversational scenes.
Simulate professional focus effects like Shallow Focus (Bokeh) and Deep Focus to guide the viewer's eye.
Use conversational editing in Google AI Studio to refine images by changing angles, lighting, and composition.
Confidently navigate Google AI Studio to generate images with the Nano Banana (Gemini 2.5 Flash) model.
Apply a full range of cinematic techniques to transform a simple portrait into a dynamic character study.
Produce a multi-image storyboard from a script, applying various cinematic techniques to tell a visual story.
Create immersive Point-of-View (POV) shots that place the audience directly into the action of a scene.
Translate a creative vision into a complete, photorealistic visual sequence using AI.
requirements: No prior experience in filmmaking, photography, or AI is required
courses.description:
Unlock the secrets of professional filmmaking and photography without ever touching a camera.
Have you ever been frustrated by generic, lifeless AI images? Do you have a clear cinematic vision in your head but struggle to bring it to life with simple keywords? This course is the solution. Welcome to Cinematic AI, the first-ever hands-on workshop that teaches you the art of cinematography by directing one of the world's most powerful AI image models: Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash, famously known as Nano Banana.
This is not a traditional film theory course. This is a practical, step-by-step masterclass where you will learn to think, act, and create like a professional director. We will work directly inside Google AI Studio, and for every single professional camera shot, angle, and composition, you will get a live, practical demonstration. You will learn to move beyond being a simple "prompter" and become a true AI Creative Director, capable of generating stunning, story-driven, and emotionally resonant images on command.
We will start with the fundamentals, introducing you to the revolutionary conversational editing power of the Nano Banana model. You'll learn where to find and use this tool, including free methods, before diving into the core of the course.
Throughout this journey, you will master the complete language of visual storytelling:
Foundation of Cinematic Shots: Go beyond "a picture of a person" and learn to direct the full spectrum of shot sizes. You'll generate epic Wide Shots to establish your world, conversational Medium Shots (including the classic Cowboy Shot) to capture the heart of the scene, and powerful Close-Up Shots to direct emotion with precision.
The Art of Cinematic Framing: Learn to compose your scenes like a pro. You'll master the Single Shot to build focus, the Two Shot to create character dynamics, and advanced techniques like the immersive Over-the-Shoulder and thrilling Point-of-View (POV) shots to pull your audience directly into the story.
Camera Angles & Perception: Discover how a simple change in perspective can completely alter the psychology of your image. You will direct Neutral & Grounded Angles for stability, create power dynamics with High-Angle and Low-Angle shots, and inject creative tension with stylistic choices like the Dutch Angle.
Mastering Focus to Guide Attention: Learn to control the most crucial element for directing the viewer's eye. You will simulate professional focus techniques, creating beautiful portraits with Shallow Focus (Bokeh) and vast, detailed landscapes with Deep Focus.
The AI Portrait Director's Workshop: In a special bonus section, you will put everything you've learned into practice. We will take a single, neutral portrait and, through a series of conversational edits, transform it by applying different shot sizes, angles, and narrative framing, proving you can direct a complete character study from a single starting point.
By the end of this course, you won't just understand the theory of cinematography—you will have a portfolio of beautifully directed, AI-generated images and the skills to create any visual story you can imagine.
Enroll now and learn to stop prompting and start directing!


What you'll learn


Master the "Director's Mindset" to write descriptive, narrative prompts that produce superior, cinematic AI images.
Generate over 15 distinct, professional camera shots and sizes, from the Extreme Wide Shot to the Extreme Close-Up.
Control and direct camera angles to shape audience perception, creating feelings of power, vulnerability, or unease.
Learn the art of cinematic framing and composition, including the Two Shot, Over-the-Shoulder, and Point-of-View (POV) shots.
Simulate professional focus techniques like Shallow Focus (Bokeh) and Deep Focus to guide the viewer's attention.
Gain hands-on experience using Google AI Studio with the Gemini 2.5 Flash (Nano Banana) model.
Understand the power of conversational editing to refine and perfect your images through simple, natural language.
Apply all learned techniques in a practical workshop to transform a simple portrait into a dynamic, story-rich character study.
Enroll now and learn to start directing with Nano Banana
target_audience: Aspiring Filmmakers and Directors who want to storyboard and pre-visualize their scenes.
Photographers looking to explore new creative styles and compositions.
Content Creators, YouTubers, and Social Media Managers who need high-quality, custom visuals.
Marketers and Advertisers who want to create compelling, on-brand campaign imagery
Graphic Designers and Artists looking to integrate powerful AI tools into their workflow.
Anyone curious about the future of AI image generation and visual storytelling.

courses.title: Screenplay Writing - Basic

objectives: Story development and screenplay structure

Formatting a screenplay
Writing methods
requirements: No Prerequisites
courses.description:
This is an introductory course in writing for the screen  in which you will learn and develop your craft as a visual screenwriter. You will learn to draw on your experiences, observation and imagination to create compelling characters and stories for the screen.
The objective of this course is to learn a systematic approach to writing a screenplay from conception of the idea through the outlining process and onto a finished short script. The focus will be on learning how to break a story, develop an idea, create great characters, and mould your idea into a three act structure. Learn to also develop good writing habits while setting out to write.
The course will also give insights into writing great characters and dialogue. You will also get to know the screenwriter's role and responsibility.
There will be a fun quiz at the end of the course and an assignment to complete. At the end of this course you will apply your skills to writing an outline and then a screenplay for a short film or the first act of a feature film ( about 20 to 25 pages). The focus will be on creating original characters while developing a strong story and scene structure.
target_audience: Students of filmmaking
Students of other streams entering the industry as a Screenwriter
Cast & Key Crew that need to read & understand Script to discharge their roles
Other jobseekers looking to enter the industry in the role of a Screenwriter
Writers, Print Journalists and other writing enthusiasts trying their hand at Screenwriting

requirements: Du brauchst ein ChatGPT Plus Abo
courses.description:
In diesem Kurs führe ich dich Schritt für Schritt in die spannende Welt von DALLE und ChatGPT ein. Egal, ob du ein Anfänger oder ein erfahrener Nutzer bist, wir werden gemeinsam tief in die Funktionalitäten und Anwendungen von DALLE und ChatGPT eintauchen. Du wirst nicht nur verstehen, wie DALLE und ChatGPT funktionieren, sondern auch lernen, sie effektiv in verschiedenen Szenarien einzusetzen.


Bereit, in die Welt von DALLE und ChatGPT einzutauchen und die Kunst der KI-unterstützten Bild- und Texterstellung zu beherrschen?
Möchtest du die Geheimnisse erfolgreicher Befehlseingabe bei DALLE enthüllen und lernen, wie du diese mit einer einfachen Methode umsetzen kannst?
Möchtest du erfahren, wie du deine Arbeitsprozesse so optimieren kannst, dass du mit DALLE und ChatGPT deine Kreativität und Produktivität ins Unermessliche steigern kannst?


Dann ist dieser Kurs perfekt für dich!

Hier hast du einen kurzen Einblick, was dich in diesem Kurs erwartet!

____________________________________________________________________________


1. Einführung
In diesem einleitenden Abschnitt wirst du herzlich willkommen geheißen und erfährst, was dich in diesem Kurs erwartet. Ich erkläre dir die Idee und Struktur des Kurses und warum ChatGPT Plus für optimale Ergebnisse empfohlen wird. Ich gebe dir Einblicke in die verschiedenen Versionen von DALLE und Tipps, wie du den Kurs am effektivsten nutzen kannst, um maximal davon zu profitieren.


2. Grundlagen DALLE & ChatGPT
Hier beginnt deine Reise mit einer detaillierten Einführung in ChatGPT und DALLE. Du lernst, wie du dich anmeldest, die Plattformen nutzt und DALLE in ChatGPT aktivierst. Dieser Abschnitt deckt verschiedene Wege ab, um Bilder zu generieren, und erklärt die Funktionen, die dir nach der Bildgenerierung zur Verfügung stehen. Es ist ein umfassender Guide, der dir hilft, die Grundfunktionen beider Plattformen zu verstehen und effektiv zu nutzen.


3. Grundlagen der Befehlseingabe
In diesem wichtigen Abschnitt erfährst du, wie du Befehle sowohl strukturiert als auch unstrukturiert eingibst. Du lernst, warum Adjektive bei der Bildgenerierung eine große Rolle spielen, wie du Formate änderst und Zusammenhänge erkennst. Ich zeige dir auch, wie du Bilder und Dateien hochladen und bearbeiten kannst, um aus deinen eigenen Ressourcen Bilder zu generieren.


4. Benutzerdefinierte Anweisungen
Lerne die Kunst der benutzerdefinierten Anweisungen. Von den Grundlagen bis zum Testen – dieser Abschnitt führt dich durch verschiedene Phasen der Erstellung und Anwendung benutzerdefinierter Anweisungen. Du erfährst, wie du diese Anweisungen effektiv für deine spezifischen Bedürfnisse einsetzt und damit deine Kreativität und Effizienz steigerst.


5. GPT erstellen für DALLE
Entdecke, wie du ein spezialisiertes GPT für DALLE erstellst. Du lernst, wie du übergeordnete Ziele definierst, deinen Fokus setzt und verschiedene Befehlsstrukturen entwickelst. Dieser Abschnitt bietet dir praktische Beispiele und Regeln, um dein eigenes GPT effektiv zu gestalten und zu personalisieren.


6. Weitere Funktionen mit DALLE
Erkunde fortgeschrittene Funktionen von DALLE. Du lernst, wie du Bilder Geschichten fortsetzen kannst, wie ein Bild in ein Rezept umgewandelt wird und ob ein neuer Chat einen Reset bedeutet. Außerdem erfährst du, wie du Prompts bearbeiten und zwischen ihnen wechseln kannst, und erhältst einen Vergleich von DALLE mit anderen Plattformen wie Midjourney.


7. Abschluss
Zum Abschluss des Kurses bedanke ich mich bei dir für deine Teilnahme und gebe dir konkrete Handlungsempfehlungen für deine nächsten Schritte. Du erhältst wertvolle Tipps, was du als Nächstes tun kannst, um das Gelernte anzuwenden und weiterzuentwickeln.


8. Updates
Bleibe auf dem Laufenden mit den neuesten Entwicklungen und Updates in der Welt von DALLE und ChatGPT. Dieser Abschnitt informiert dich über zukünftige Neuerungen und wie sie deine Nutzung von DALLE und ChatGPT beeinflussen können.
____________________________________________________________________________


Bereit, deine Reise in die Welt von DALLE und ChatGPT zu starten? Dann zögere nicht und melde dich jetzt für diesen aufregenden Kurs an, um zu erfahren, wie du mit DALLE und ChatGPT beeindruckende Content-Erstellung erreichst!


Ich freue mich auf dich!


Danke für dein Vertrauen & Beste Grüße,


Sascha
target_audience: An alle, die sich perfekt mit DALLE auskennen wollen und nicht den Anschluss verlieren wollen

courses.title: Cinematography Simplified

Composition & Visual Storytelling - Simple information to inform the viewer on composition and coverage
The Industry - Simple information to inform the viewer on how to navigate the film/media industry
requirements: No experience necessary, some experience recommended
courses.description:
In "Cinematography Simplified", you will gain the basic knowledge to give you the groundwork to become a working cinematographer in the film/media industry. This course is geared for students with a 1-4 out of 10 knowledge base in cinematography. This course focuses more on the basics, so that in the future, you can expand creatively.


We will go over:
Camera basics (resolutions, sensor sizes, bit rates, etc.)
Lighting basics (getting proper exposure, where to place your lights, etc.)
Composition (standard camera compositions as well as general rules for how to cover a scene)
The Industry (how to get hired and stay relevant)


This course features video lectures, as well as active demonstrations, and lighting breakdowns. This course is taught by a working professional in the film industry. It is important to learn from somebody with real-life, practical experiences. In an age where resources and how-to videos are so readily available, what separates this course from so many others is that it is taught by somebody with real hours put into working in film, fashion, commercials, high-end union productions, and more. By taking this course you will absorb that knowledge and jump start your journey!
Everybody is welcome here; I'm excited for you to get started!
target_audience: This course is for beginner to intermediate learners with an interest in cinematography

Master Storytelling – Craft Engaging Nar: Course Overview: Structure, Content & Key Learning Goals
Storytelling Icebreaker: Connect & Engage Through Creative Narratives
Course Learning Objectives: Key Outcomes & Skills You'll Gain
Baic Elements Of Story Structure: What is Story Structure? Key Elements & Importance in Storytelling

The Three-Act Structure: Key Components & How to Apply It in Storytelling

requirements: English proficiency
Basic reading/watching habits
Interest in writing or filmmaking

courses.description:
Mastering Story Structure: Create Captivating Narratives with Self-Assurance
Do you have brilliant ideas but find it difficult to turn them into gripping narratives? Understanding story structure is essential for developing captivating and impactful tales, regardless of your career goals as a writer, screenwriter, or content producer.
From comprehending traditional forms like the Three-Act and Five-Act frameworks to investigating more complex strategies like nonlinear narratives and multi-point-of-view storytelling, this course is intended to assist you in dissecting the foundations of storytelling. You will learn how to organize your tales with impact, emotional depth, and clarity via interactive activities, case studies, and real-world applications.
What You'll Learn:
1. The fundamentals of narrative construction and their significance.
2. Methods for creating interesting people with deep storylines.
3. The function of subplots, rhythm, and tension in narrative.
4. How to try out episodic and nonlinear structures.
5. The application of AI technologies to improve narrative construction.
6. Techniques for integrating different viewpoints and voices.
After the course, you will be able to confidently outline and arrange your narrative.
1. Create compelling storylines and characters to keep readers interested.
2. Use sophisticated narrative strategies to distinguish your work.
3. Improve your story flow and avoid typical structural mistakes.
4. Develop a narrative structure that suits your own approach.
You will have a thorough grasp of story structure by the conclusion of the course, which will enable you to realize your creative ideas with more impact, clarity, and purpose. This course will provide you with the skills to transform ideas into captivating narratives, whether you're writing books, screenplays, or material for digital platforms.

Esempi di montaggio di interviste professionali

Il corso: Risolvere i problemi di dizione e parlato
Esempi di Interviste: Interviste multiple per un video di promozione
Intervista con 2 soggetti a due camere

requirements: Questo videocorso é adatto a chi giá ha competenza anche basilari di video ripresa e di montaggio video
courses.description:
Tra i vari prodotti audiovisivi che chi si occupa di video affronta nel suo lavoro ce n'é uno che richiede doti aggiuntive rispetto a quelle classiche (capacitá di inquadrare, gestire la luce, ecc.). Si tratta della video intervista, che molti giornalisti ormai si ritrovano a dover spesso creare autonomamente, con mezzi propri.
Ogni qualvolta mettiamo al centro dell'attenzione (del nostro obiettivo) un "umano" infatti, le reazioniche questo può avere sono spesso molto diverseda quel che ci aspettavamo. Talvolta gli intervistati asseriscono di sapere parlare tranquillamente davanti ad una camera, salvo poi scoprire che perdono costanemente il filo del discorso, o peggio fanno scena muta.
C'é poi l'aspetto estetico da non sottovalutare. Poiché spesso, appunto, si tratta di riprendere"semplicemente" una persona, elementi come ottica usata, diaframma, sfondo dell'inquadratura, illuminazione e altri, diventano fondamentali per la buona composizione di un'immagine convincente.
Last but not least, come si dice in inglese, la cattura dell'audio, ricopre un ruolo fondamentalenell'intervista. Quale microfono scegliere infatti sará determinante sia per la buona resa della voce, ma anche per le condizioni di ripresa nelle quali ci troveremo. Saper decidere subito se "microfonare" il soggetto con una capsula audio di tipo "Lavalier", o se sussitono le condizioni per utilizzare un microfono esterno, ci aiuterá molto anche ad ottimizzare il tempo.
E dopo il lavoro di ripresa dobbiamo dedicarci al montaggio. Saper selezionare le parti di un discorso che funzionano, saper tagliare lo "sporco"del parlato come gli "ehmm.", i "ppp..." determina in grandissima parte come il risultato dell'intervistapossa essere molto più fluido e armonico rispetto al girato nudo e crudo.
Ultima cosa da considerare: le immagini di copertura. Chiamate anche comunemente fegatelli, é molto importante girare alcune clip esterne alla ripresa da utilizzare nel montaggio con il fine di renderlo meno "noioso" (in fondo c'é solo una persona che parla...) e più ritmato.
target_audience: Gli studenti di questo corso apprenderanno un metodo di lavoro ottimizzato per poter costruire delle interviste professionali, dalla ripresa al montaggio

courses.title: Video For Stills Photographers | Shoot Cinematic Video
courses.bio: Learn how to shoot professional looking cinematic video using a photo camera.
objectives: In this course I will teach you how to shoot video on your stills camera. From basic settings all the way to important techniques and compositional rules
You will understand the importance of shutter speed to the look of your film
I will teach you the importance and relevance of frame rates.
At the end, I will give you a basic introduction to editing your videos.

Section 2: The Technical Aspects Of Shoo: Shutter Speed and the 180 Degree Rule
File Formats, Video Codecs, Bitrate and Color.

requirements: You will need a video enabled DSLR or Mirrorless Camera. A tripod and Neutral Density filters will be useful but not vital
The course expects a basic knowledge of photography and photographic composition
courses.description:
Modern stills cameras are capable of stunning cinematic video quality. Indeed there have been successful independent movies that have been shot solely with DSLR or Mirrorless cameras. A lot of photographers, however are a little daunted by shooting video. They often see video as a very different medium to stills photography. The fact is, that whilst there are indeed many differences, those differences are not as great as you might think. Many of the techniques and compositional rules we know in photography are quite similar when shooting video footage.
Let me unravel the mysteries of shooting video with your stills camera.


In this course I will teach you how to shoot professional looking, cinematic video footage using your stills camera. This course will take you from the basics of setting up your camera for video,  through the many technical aspects of video and on to the creative concepts. From there you will learn how to make a basic edit using a free but powerful editing suite.
Techniques that you will learn on this course include:
The Basic Camera Settings
The 180 Degree Shutter Rule
Frame Rates vs Shutter Speed
The Important and Less Important Equipment Required
Resolution, Codecs and Aspect Ratios
The Creative Concepts of Shooting Video
The Differences and Similarities Of Shooting Video vs Stills
How To Create A Basic First Edit
The course is designed for photographers of a beginner through intermediate level that wish to improve their video shooting knowledge and skills. You will require a video enabled stills camera and preferably a tripod.
target_audience: This course is designed for new or intermediate photographers struggling with, or wanting to learn more about shooting video

courses.title: Creare un videoclip low cost

objectives: La genesi dell'idea di un videoclip: il testo della canzone

requirements: Per questo corso sono necessarie competenze pregresse (amche base) di ripresa e montaggio
courses.description: Il videoclip é uno di quei prodotti audiovisivi nel quale la creativitá deve essere utilizzata come elemento distintivo del progetto. La qualitá delle riprese é ovviamente il cuore pulsante di questa tipologia di video, e dovremmo sempre ricercare un estetica avvincente, qualunque sia l'inquadratura che stiamo realizzando, anche laddove non sembra apparentemente possibile crearla. Oggigiorno  il mercato dei videoclip é diventato ricco di offerte, per la maggior parte low cost. Con la crescita esponenziale di band amatoriali e cantautori in erba infatti, sempre più videomaker si dedicano a questo ambito. Ma come é possibile inserirsi in questo contesto, realizzando videoclip avvincenti ma che siano in grado di competere economicamente con gli altri? Sicuramente non é la creativitá l'elementro da sacrificare... anzi questo deve semmai essere potenziato. Molto meglio un videoclip girato con mezzi economici ma che si regge su inquadrature e storia potente, che uno girato con una super macchina da presa, ma che non ha una vera e propria anima. In questo videocorso analizzeremo alcuni videoclip realizzati dal tuo istruttore, e comprenderai appieno le varie fasi che devi affrontare, dall'idea iniziale al prodotto finito. Vedremo anche come si scelgono le location e come si crea uno script di supporto all'opera.
target_audience: Apprendisti VideoMaker

Apprendisti nella produzione di videoclip

courses.description:
Thank you for your interest in Strategic Marketing for Photographers
Strategic Marketing for Photographers is a course that gives you all the information that you need to set up a foundation for marketing your photography business.
This course isn't just a few specific marketing tactics that will get you a few clients really quickly.
It goes beyond the typical “Do this and you'll get this" type of advice.
What this program covers goes much deeper than the traditional marketing programs offered out there.
It teaches you how to THINK about marketing so that you can make quality decisions and develop quality ideas that you can implement in your marketing plan.
Now this course isn't for everyone.
If you're content being a 'shoot-and-burn' photographer and you want to give away all the rights to your photos at a low cost while trying to please people who don't care about your craft, then this program isn't for you.
If you're content with your current marketing plan and it's working well for you, then this program isn't for you.
If you don't have an open mind and are just looking for someone to validate what you're already doing, this program isn't for you.
You have to be willing to try what this program offers and apply it.
Once you do this, you'll realize that it doesn't require a bunch of complicated work; it doesn't require a tremendous amount of skill.
All it takes is simply understanding and applying the principles.
This course is perfect for anyone just now building their photography business and doesn't know very much about marketing.
This course is great for established, yet struggling photographers needing to get more business or better quality business.
Consider this:
What if you could get the clients that you want?
They want to pay you what you're worth;
What if you didn't need to chase after new customers because they come to you effortlessly?
Wouldn't you want that?
Of course you do!
This course gives you just over 2.5 hours of condensed content over 29 lectures. You also get 2 ebooks to help you get started on planning your marketing.
What are you waiting for?
Go ahead and enroll now!
