requirements: Computer oder Laptop
Interesse an der Bildbearbeitung :)
courses.description:
Egal ob Instagram-, Urlaub- oder Portraitbilder, wenn du deine Fotos verschönern und generell professioneller aussehen machen willst, dann bist du hier genau richtig!
Mein Name ist Hannah und ich habe vor kurzem meine 5-jährige Ausbildung in einer höheren technischen Schule absolviert und habe über 6 Jahre Erfahrungen in der Fotografie. Ich weiß noch ganz genau, wie überfordert ich am Anfang war, als ich meine Fotos auf das nächste Level bringen und meine Urlaubsfotos und Landschaftsfotos bearbeiten und verschönern wollte. Genau das will ich dir in diesem Kurs zeigen!
Egal ob die Fotos von einer Kamera oder deinem Smartphone stammen!
Professionelle Bildbearbeitung komplett gratis!
Das kostenlose Bildbearbeitungsprogramm GIMP ist eine super Alternative für Adobe Photoshop und Lightroom. Ich kann mit Überzeugung behaupten, dass GIMP so ziemlich alle Möglichkeiten bietet, wie die anderen zwei zuvor genannten Programme. Der Workflow ist zwar ein wenig anders, aber genau diesen werde ich dir zeigen.
Der Videokurs ist ein Crashkurs, der dich in weniger als 4 Stunden vom Anfänger zum Profi in der Bildbearbeitung macht. Ich werde dir die Werkzeuge, Techniken und Vorgehensweisen mit so manch technischem Hintergrund (wenn er notwendig ist) erklären.
Für einen Anfänger der genau richtige Kurs!
Wenn du ein kompletter Beginner in dem Bereich der Bildbearbeitung bist und das Programm GIMP noch nie geöffnet hast, bist du hier genau richtig. Ich erkläre dir alle Werkzeuge, Techniken, Tipps und Tricks langsam und verständlich Schritt für Schritt.
Außerdem zeige ich dir, wie du deine Portraits bearbeitest, eine professionelle Retusche anwendest und deinen Instagram-Fotos einen eigenen Farblook geben kannst.
target_audience: Du bist bei mir richtig, wenn du deine Urlaubsfotos schöner nachbearbeiten möchtest
Du bist bei mir richtig, wenn du deine Instagram Fotos deinen eigenen Farblook geben möchtest

効率的な編集ワークフローを習得し、プロジェクトの作成から書き出しまでの全工程を迅速に実行できるようになる
カット編集の基本技術を駆使して、視聴者を引き込む洗練された動画ストーリーを構築できるようになる
習得した実践的なスキルを応用して、様々な目的や長さの動画を自信を持って制作できるようになる
DaVinci Resolveのインターフェースを自在に操作し、編集作業の効率を大幅に向上させる

はじめに: 学習リソースの入手方法

requirements: DaVinci Resolveの無料版がインストールできるパソコン（Windows/Mac）を所有していること
基本的なパソコン操作スキル
courses.description:
動画編集に興味があるけれど、こんな悩みをお持ちではありませんか？
有料の動画編集ソフトは高額で手が出ない...
動画編集の基礎から学びたいけど、どこから始めればいいかわからない
YouTube用の動画を作りたいけど、編集の仕方がわからない
まずは無料で使えるソフトから始めてみたいけど、無料ソフトって使い物にならなそう
これはそんなあなたのためのコースです。
コース本編の内容は以下の通りです：
DaVinci Resolveの基本設定とインターフェース解説
プロジェクトの作成と基本的な編集操作
カット編集とトリミングの実践テクニック
トランジションとエフェクトの活用法
テキストとタイトルの挿入・編集
音声編集の基礎
動画書き出しとシェア方法
■コースを受講するとできること
このコースを受講すると、以下のことができるようになります：
DaVinci Resolveの無料版を使って、基本的な動画編集作業が行えます
効率的な編集ワークフローを実践し、スピーディーな動画制作ができます
プロフェッショナルな印象を与えるトランジション効果を適切に使用できます
視聴者を引き込む魅力的な動画ストーリーを構築できます
YouTubeやSNS向けの動画を自信を持って制作できます
テキストやタイトルを効果的に挿入し、情報を明確に伝えられます
音声編集の基礎を理解し、クリアな音質の動画を作成できます
■こんな方が受講に向いています
動画編集を基礎から学びたい初心者の方
YouTubeチャンネルやSNSで動画発信を始めたい方
無料で本格的な動画編集スキルを習得したい方
効率的な動画編集のワークフローを身につけたい方
趣味や仕事で動画制作に携わりたい方
■必要なツールや要件
Windows10以降 または macOS 10.15以降のPC/Mac
DaVinci Resolve無料版（コース内でインストール方法を解説）
最低8GB以上のメモリ（16GB以上推奨）
インターネット接続環境（ソフトウェアのダウンロード用）
皆さまのご参加を心よりお待ちしております。
target_audience: 動画編集に興味はあるものの、高価なソフトウェアや複雑な操作に躊躇している初心者の方

courses.title: Corso certificato DaVinci Resolve 17 (compatibile 20).
courses.bio: Montaggio, color correction, effetti e audio. Chiaro e semplice. Tutto in uno.
objectives: Tutti gli strumenti fondamentali dell'editing in DaVinci Resolve 17, dall'importazione dei media fino alla loro finalizzazione e pubblicazione
Gli strumenti fondamentali della Color Correction in DaVinci Resolve 17 usati anche per i feature hollywoodiani
Le basi del compositing e degli effetti visuali.
Titolazione, missaggio e registrazione audio
Sarai in grado di superare l'esame gratuito on-line per la end user certificazion ufficiale di DaVinci Resolve 17 (lingua inglese e spagnolo)
Da zero a conoscitore di tutti di tutto il workflow di post-produzione video

Editing veloce nella Cut Page: Lezione bonus - Installazione DaVinci Resolve 17 (Freeware) e Download materiale
Lezione bonus - Risoluzione, FPS e Codec
Da Zero al montaggio di un video in 4 minuti
Navigazione nei media - Source Tape, Source Clip
Creare una timeline e editare (inserire clip)
In e Out Point più precisi
Trimming - Rifinitura del montaggio in timeline
Rifinitura dell'editing Multitraccia e Multicamera (Synch Bin)
Organizzare le clip nella Media Page: Panoramica di tutte le pagine di Resolve
Importare i Media (video, audio e grafica)
Trimming - Rifinitura in Timeline: Trimming con con lo strumento Selection (Selezione)
Missaggio Audio nella Edit Page: Gestione dei Livelli Audio e Dissolvenze
Color Grading e Correzioni Primarie: Interfaccia Color Page e Waveform Monitor
Strumenti di Controllo e Schermi Calibrati
Aggiustamenti Secondari: Tracciamento Power Windows E Resolve FX

requirements: Nessuna. Ti guido dall'installazione del software gratuito fino alla conoscenza di montaggio, effetti visuali, color correctione e missaggio audio.
courses.description:
Benvenuto, sono Massimo Mercurio, trainer certificato Blackmagic Design per Davinci Resolve 17.


Immagina di poter imparare montaggio, color correction, effetti e audio con un unico corso sicuro, semplice, chiaro e certificato dal leader nel settore della produzione e post-produzione video Blackmagic Design.


Ci potrai riuscire con il mio corso generale di DaVinci Resolve 17 (compatibile 20), basato sulla “Beginners Guide to DaVinci Resolve 17”, il libro di formazione e certificazione ufficiale di Blackmagic Design. Sarà un corso pratico, basato su progetti reali, che ti introdurrà all’editing, compositing, effetti visuali, color correction e missaggio audio in DaVinci Resolve.
Il corso è al momento in sconto da 94,99€ a 69,99€!


Inoltre è perfettamente compatibile con la nuova versione 20 del software.


Tutto quello di cui hai bisogno è un Mac o un PC Windows, la versione freeware scaricabile gratuitamente, pienamente funzionante e senza limitazioni, di DaVinci Resolve 20 e il materiale video professionale per seguire le lezioni pratiche, fornito anch'esso gratuitamente.
Racconta la tua storia. Ti accompagno, passo dopo passo dall'installazione del software.
Il corso è per i neofiti che vogliono raggiungere subito un buon livello, come per gli esperti che hanno deciso di passare al miglior software di post-produzione video attualmente disponibile e ti preparerà per l’esame ufficiale a cui puoi accedere gratuitamente on-line per ottenere la end user certification di Blackmagic Design. L’esame è in spagnolo e inglese.
Un viaggio emozionante, dalle definizioni fondamentali necessarie per comprendere i video e manipolarli, alla finalizzazione di editing complessi con effetti sonori, colonna sonora ed effetti visuali.
Alla fine di questo corso saprai destreggiarti in tutte le pagine di Resolve, utilizzandone le funzioni più importanti. Inoltre questo corso, se non lo hai già, ti darà un metodo per procedere con ordine nel lavoro di post-produzione.
Il corso è aggiornato con nuove lezioni bonus avanzate che vanno oltre la certificazione end user di DaVinci Resolve. Guarda la lista completa delle lezioni per scoprire questi step avanzati.


Cosa aspetti, iscriviti, non è mai troppo tardi per imparare, ne troppo presto per intraprendere una nuova avventura di formazione.
target_audience: neofiti che si avvicinano per la prima volta al videomaking e partono davvero da zero

professionisti che vogliono passare a DaVinci Resolve 17, l'unico software in grado di offrire strumenti di editing, motion graphic, vfx, color correction e missaggio audio tutti nello stesso programma

courses.title: Creating 360 Virtual Tours Jawla - Affinity - Teliportme
courses.bio: Build a successful 360 virtual tours business

Introduction: 1. Introduction to Virtual Tours minicourse - Teliportme & Hossmaudin Hasan
3. (4-Step) process for Creating 360 Interactive Virtual Tours (Jawla360)
4. Step 1 - Plan your Virtual Tour Real.mp4
7. Before Editing - Organize and Render HDR Panoramas
8. Step 3 - Editing your panoramas on Affinity Photo.mp4
9. Step 4 - Create the Virtual Tour with: 9.1 Create your Virtual Tour on TeliportME (Part1)
9.2 Share your 360 Virtual Tour to the World
9.3 Create your Virtual Tour on TeliportME (Part2)
9.4 Add Voice to your V.Tour (Fliki AI).mov

requirements: A computer with Affinity Photo installed, and a free teliportme account.
Having a 360 camera or a 360-dslr setup will be great so you can shoot 360 panoramas
courses.description:
Are you interested in venturing into the world of virtual tours? Look no further! This course is designed to equip you with the necessary skills to create immersive 360 virtual tours using Teliportme.
In this introductory minicourse, we will delve into the fundamentals of virtual tours, exploring how this innovative technology enables users to travel virtually and experience captivating environments from the comfort of their own homes.
Key topics covered in this course include:
Understanding Virtual Tours: Gain a solid foundation by comprehending the concept, purpose, and benefits of virtual tours. Discover how they have revolutionized various industries, including real estate, tourism, and education.
Introduction to Teliportme: Familiarize yourself with the Teliportme platform, a powerful tool used for creating and sharing interactive 360 virtual tours. Learn how to navigate the interface and access its key features.
Capturing 360 Images: Master the art of capturing stunning 360 photos using Teliportme. Discover tips and techniques to create visually appealing and seamless images that captivate your audience.
Enhancing Virtual Tours: Learn how to enhance your virtual tours by incorporating interactive elements such as hotspots, audio, video, and text descriptions. Explore different customization options to make your tours truly immersive and engaging.
By the end of this course, you will have a solid understanding of virtual tours and the ability to create captivating 360 experiences using Teliportme. Whether you are a real estate agent looking to showcase properties or a creative individual interested in virtual storytelling, this course is the gateway to your success in the virtual tour industry.
Enroll now and unlock the potential of creating impactful virtual tours with Teliportme!


Notes, software that will be used:
1) Affinity photo
2) Teliportme
3) Insta360 Studio (for the insta360 One x2)


Hardware used in this course:
1) Insta360 One x2 360 Camera


About the content Creator: Hossamudin Hassan (حسام الدين حسن)
Founder of Jawla360 which is a virtual tours (360 photography) service provider based in Egypt.
Virtual tours trainer with collaboration with teliportme's team.


Summary of the steps explained:
Step 1: Plan your Virtual Tour In. you will learn how to effectively plan and design your virtual tour. You'll explore strategies for selecting the right locations and creating a cohesive narrative for your tour.
Step 2: Shooting the 360 Panoramas This step focuses on the art of capturing high-resolution 360 panoramas. You'll learn best practices for achieving optimal lighting, composition, and image quality.
Step 3: Editing your Panoramas on Affinity Photo Once you've captured your panoramas, it's time to enhance them through the editing process. Using Affinity Photo, you'll learn how to edit and enhance your 360 panoramas.
Step4: Create your virtual tour using Teliportme.
Additionally, the course provides important preliminary information in the form of an introduction to virtual tours, important notes, and guidance on organizing and rendering HDR panoramas. These sections ensure that you have a solid foundation before diving into the core steps of creating 360 virtual tours.
target_audience: Beginner photographers in the 360 virtual tours space

courses.bio: La guida definitiva per utilizzare al meglio la GoPro Hero 12 Black
objectives: Come sfruttare al massimo le funzioni della GoPro Hero 12 per realizzare video di viaggi ed esperienze all'aperto
Utilizzare al meglio le funzioni avanzate della GoPro Hero 12, come la stabilizzazione dell'immagine ed i valori Protune

Configurazione e Informazioni di base: Funzioni di base di GoPro Quik

Video con poca luce: Introduzione ai video con poca luce (Hero 11/ Hero 12)
Le migliori impostazioni con poca luce (Hero 11/ Hero 12)
Fotografia: Modalità Foto Notturna test sul campo (Hero 11/ Hero 12)
Temporizzato: Luci di Veicoli, Light Paitning e Star Trail - Test sul campo (Hero 11/ Hero 12)
Star Trail, Light Painting e Scie di veicoli
GoPro Quik (App per Smartphone): Da febbraio GoPro Quik è disponibile anche per Mac

requirements: GoPro Hero 12
Non è necessaria alcuna esperienza
courses.description:
Ti piace il videomaking e vuoi sfruttare al massimo la tua GoPro Hero 12 Black? Allora questo corso è quello che fa per te! In questo corso completo sulla GoPro Hero 12, scoprirai come realizzare video e foto di qualità professionale con la tua action camera.
Nel capitolo introduttivo, ti guiderò attraverso le funzionalità avanzate della Hero 12 e le differenze chiave rispetto al modello precedente. Cominceremo con la configurazione di base vedendo la struttura della Hero 12 e come connetterla al tuo smartphone per massimizzare l'esperienza di ripresa.
I controlli rapidi e il menù preferenze saranno esplorati in dettaglio nel secondo capitolo, permettendoti di padroneggiare ogni aspetto della tua GoPro.
Nel cuore del corso, il capitolo dedicato alle modalità video ti condurrà attraverso tutte le impostazioni disponibili sulla Hero 12. Dall'introduzione ai profili video (HDR e LOG), al controllo totale della risoluzione, framerate, e stabilizzazione. Approfondiremo anche le impostazioni cinematografiche per aiutarti a creare video unici e coinvolgenti.
Nel corso non trascureremo la fotografia e le modalità temporizzate che appunto hanno dei capitoli dedicati.
Inoltre, scoprirai come sfruttare appieno l'app GoPro Quik sul tuo smartphone per controllare la tua Hero 12 da remoto, scaricare i tuoi filmati e modificarli con facilità.
Il corso si conclude con una panoramica sugli accessori per la Hero 12 e soluzioni a comuni problemi come la durata della batteria e video a scatti.

Questo corso sulla Hero 12 include degli esempi e lezioni del mio precedente corso sulla Hero 11, in quanto le due fotocamere sono molto simili in molte funzionalità, per non dire identiche. Ho fatto questa scelta per migliorare il tuo apprendimento senza compromettere la qualità del corso. Le intere lezioni prese dal corso sulla Hero 11 riporteranno nel titolo la dicitura Hero 11 / Hero 12.
Iscriviti ora al corso dedicato alla GoPro Hero 12 e preparati a sfruttare al massimo la tua action cam per catturare momenti indimenticabili!
target_audience: Viaggiatori, creatori di contenuti digitali, videomaker professionisti nonché per gli appassionati di fotografia e videografia che utilizzano la GoPro Hero 12 per hobby e vogliono imparare a sfruttare al meglio le funzioni dell'action cam per creare contenuti coinvolgenti e di alta qualità.

courses.title: Screenwriting for Filmmakers
courses.bio: Write scripts that are made into movies.
objectives: How to write a screenplay that audiences will love when it becomes a movie.
How to overcome writer's block and keep moving forward.
How to have fun writing a screenplay that tells your story.
How and when to pace your screenplay action to keep your audience engaged.
Explanation of all the major film genres and what is required to satisfy audience expectations.
Detailed analysis of the main characters in the film to make your screenplay soar.
Step-by-step method for writing your screenplay from beginning to conclusion.
requirements: No screenwriting software needed to take this course and write an amazing script. You will need a word processing program, such as OpenOffice or Word. I actually discourage using any of the screenwriting software.
courses.description:
We are going to write THE script for the movie. The real script. The script that will become the movie, that everyone on the cast and crew will use to film the movie. We're not writing a speculative script.
Speculative scripts are what I call wannabes. People write speculative scripts because they wannabe screenwriters. They want someone to recognize them and hire them to write other movies. They use a lot of colorful language to describe the scenery and they create an easy to read fantasy movie. But they have to be rewritten in order to actually be made into movies. We're skipping the wannabe movie and going straight to the real thing.
This course was requested by many students on Udemy who enrolled in the Udemy course Filmmaking: Write, Direct and Distribute Your Feature Film.
My forty years of experience writing and producing films taught me how to write movies people love. In this course I'm sharing what I've learned with you. I approach screenwriting with a lot of joy and excitement for adventure.
This is a fun course.
I walk you through the entire screenwriting process, from development to finished production script. This course also provides many tools to overcome writer's block.
At the end of the course, if you do all the exercises, you will have a finished screenplay that you and your team will turn into a feature film.
target_audience: Filmmakers who are writing their own scripts.
Beginners who want to make a movie and just need the right information to get it done.
Experienced film directors and actors who want to write a better screenplay for their next project.

requirements: There are no prerequisites for taking this course. Access to a computer with internet connectivity are recommended. While not required, a basic understanding of video production and an interest in storytelling is recommended.
courses.description:
Discover the future of video production with "AI for Video Production", a hands-on course designed to transform how you create, plan, and produce video content. Whether you're a small business owner, content creator, marketer, or aspiring filmmaker, this course will teach you how to leverage AI tools to enhance creativity, streamline workflows, and produce high-quality videos with ease.
Learn how to use AI for every stage of the video production process. From brainstorming creative ideas to writing compelling scripts, planning detailed shot lists, and even optimizing post-production editing, AI can be your ultimate creative assistant. We’ll demystify the technology and show you how to integrate it seamlessly into your workflow, saving you time, money, and effort.
Through engaging lessons and real-world examples, you’ll master essential skills like creating visually appealing and audience-tailored content, managing projects more efficiently, and staying ahead of industry trends. You’ll discover how AI tools can simplify processes and elevate the overall quality of your video content
By the end of this course, you’ll have the tools, confidence, and knowledge to produce professional-grade video content that captivates audiences and delivers outstanding results—whether for personal projects, social media, or business growth.
No prerequisites, just your creativity and curiosity!
target_audience: Individuals and professionals who are interested in leveraging AI technology to enhance their video production skills.

requirements: There are no pre-requisites. This course is perfect even if you have never used creative AI tools before.
courses.description:
Welcome to AI Editing Projects for Beginners – Image & Video Use-Cases, your practical entry point into the exciting world of AI-powered image and video generation. This course is designed especially for beginners who want to see real, useful applications of the latest AI tools—not just theory.
Whether you’re a content creator, marketer, social media manager, or simply someone fascinated by the potential of AI, this course will show you how to leverage cutting-edge tools to create visually stunning content with ease.
What You’ll Learn
Instead of giving you a generic tour of AI tools, this course focuses on real-world projects that walk you step-by-step through different creative challenges—just like how a pro would work.
In the introduction, you’ll understand the who, what, how, and why of this unique project-based format. You’ll also get a full list of tools we'll be using, along with downloadable resources to follow along.
Then, we dive right into five high-impact use-cases:


PROJECT #1 – Create an Ad for a Deodorant Brand
You’ll learn how to generate beautiful promotional visuals using Flux Kontext AI and do advanced product editing with Higgsfield AI Canvas. You’ll also discover why some tools like ChatGPT 4o might not always be the right fit for every project.


PROJECT #2 – Make a Video Commercial for an Energy Drink
Explore what "all-in-one" AI tools really mean. You’ll use OpenArt AI for inpainting and Higgsfield AI for mind-blowing visual effects. This section shows you how to blend multiple tools into a cohesive workflow.


PROJECT #3 – Build a Talking AI Avatar for a Multivitamin Brand
Combine four different reference images into one perfect avatar using OpenArt AI, and then bring it to life using HeyGen AI—creating a talking character with realistic facial expressions and emotions.


PROJECT #4 – Enhance an AI Image & Turn It Into a Video
Go a step further and make your AI-generated photos look more human-like using Enhancor AI, then animate them seamlessly with Kling AI.


PROJECT #5 – Conduct a Virtual Outdoor Photoshoot for a Lifestyle Coach
Learn how to use Higgsfield AI’s Character and Soul features to create incredibly realistic images, and then turn them into lifelike videos using VEO 3—without ever touching a camera.


Why This Course Stands Out


Beginner-friendly, no technical jargon
Real projects with clearly defined goals
Tool links, image downloads, and resources provided
Focus on storytelling and visual appeal


Finally, the course wraps up with extra tips, including how to access tools like VEO 3 for free, and where to go next in your AI editing journey.
If you’re curious about how AI is reshaping creativity—and you want to learn by doing—this is the perfect course to start with.
Let the robot take your hand, and step into the world of AI creation today.
target_audience: This course is for people who want to learn how to use the latest AI image and video tools in a fun and practical way by doing some amazing projects

courses.description:
Drone video and photography has changed the game when it comes to the types of angles and movements you can capture. Aerial drones have become the most popular tool for beginner to expert film makers to capture stunning content that will "wow" your viewers.
In this course I will take you on a complete guide to mastering aerial drone flying, filming and photography. This includes a recipe that will allow you to be confident flying your drone and walk away from each flight with incredible content. No prior flying, film, or photography skills are required to excel in this course. I have been a drone pilot and running a media company (Moves Media) specializing in cinematic aerial video and photos, for over 4 years. There have been a ton of things I've learned along the way that I wish I had learned sooner. The content that I will discuss in this course will fast track you from through the learning process to becoming a competent aerial pilot who can create content that stands out from the competition.
Before you rush out to buy a drone I will cover recommendations on what drone to buy and the key factors to think about before making your purchase decision. No matter what drone you have or end up buying all the flight training in this course will be of great use to you.
Not only will I share the key flying, filming and photography secrets, but I will also go through a step by step guide on how to edit your video and photos into compelling sequences and works of art.
Whether your a hobbyist wanting to capture incredible perspectives or you are interested in starting your own aerial drone company, this course is for you.
After taking this course you will:
Understand key safety and regulations around drone flying to avoid fines and fly within the rules
Know which drones are the best for your purposes
Have a simple recipe outline to make great content that is easy to capture and edit
Be a confident drone pilot with an arsenal of aerial maneuvers and skills
Understand different drone settings and when to use them
Have the skills to make money flying drones and filming things your passionate about
Learn how to edit videos from the most basic edits to complex techniques
Learn a complete guide to making professionally edited photos

About Us:
Helping those who brave the storm to improve our world
Storm Warriors International (SWI) is dedicated to helping nonprofits and companies in need by helping tell stories that focus ideas, mobilize resources, elevate discussions, inspire planning. We support organizations and companies with missions in the Arts, Sciences, and Humanities.
We are in a time of intense stress… environment, financial, cultural, and humanitarian. With everyone’s belts being tightened, many organizations do not have the capacity or budget to create content to expand the reach of their mission in such a media hungry world.
Funds raised by this course will help cover for production service gifts to nonprofits.
Every year SWI gifts a limited number of nonprofit organizations with free media production services to help further their mission. Other nonprofits are offered discounted production services based on a sliding scale. We also offer online educational courses, workshops, and consultation services.
We have aided organizations in New England, India, Vietnam, and Uganda in the following sectors:


Addiction Recovery
Childhood Hunger
Child Services
Community Services
Domestic Abuse
Emergency Medical Supplies
Environment
Homelessness
Human Trafficking
Immigration
Veterans

farti conoscere il mondo del videomaking a 360 gradi

mostrarti come gestire ed illuminare un set e come sfruttare la luce naturale
insegnarti quali riprese video siano fondamentali o quali errori evitare
Questo corso è adatto a te se...
Parti da zero e non hai ancora nessuna conoscenza.
Non parti proprio da zero e conosci già alcuni concetti ma vuoi mettere un po' di ordine nella tua testa.
Hai già iniziato a sperimentare ma vorresti passare da un approccio amatoriale ad uno più professionale.
Il mondo del videomaking ti incuriosisce e vuoi acquisire nuove nozioni.

vuoi diventare videomaker e cerchi un corso per acquisire le nozioni base.

Per diventare videomaker un corso non basta.
Dovrai seguire questo e/o altri corsi, acquistare l'attrezzatura base, iniziare a sperimentare, realizzare qualche video, crearti un portfolio o un Reel, proporti a clienti ed aziende e avere molta testardaggine.

This course will give you a solid foundation on Adobe Premiere Pro and the exact step-by-step blueprint I follow to edit all my documentary projects.

Everything that I will teach you is a lessons I’ve learned as a filmmaker over the past 20 years. All the lessons are broken down into bite-size information to follow with ease.
Class Overview
First, we learn the steps to follow to set up properly all our footage, folders, Premiere project, and sequences. We will establish a timeline and lay our footage and audio, and you will have a blueprint to follow each time, saving you confusion and frustration.
Second, when we have synchronized our audio and the main interview, we will start cutting that up and adding our broll, background music, lower thirds, graphics, images, audio, and video transitions to tell a cohesive story.
And finally, I will end by adding our music and exporting our complete documentary.
I will explain all of this using as a case study one of the short documentaries I worked on so you can follow up with editing your footage and posting it in the class project. I will be able to answer any questions you might have and give you feedback through the process.

Learn AI Art Generation from a portrait and travel photographer with 10 years of experience in the art sphere!

Introduction to Green Screen Video Produ: Introduction to the Course and Equipment Document

requirements: There are no requirements. It's perfect even for complete beginners.
courses.description:
Have you always wanted to learn Green Screen or Chroma Key Video Production?
Then you've come to the right place!
This course will teach you Green Screen Video Production in a very budget-friendly manner.
Also, this course only focuses on things that are actually and practically needed, thereby making your learning process extremely quick.
Using this course, you can literally get started making Green Screen videos on the same day itself.
Let's see what you will be learning in this course:
Why Green Screen Video Production is so important?
In this section I will be talking about the advantages of learning Green Screen video production and how it takes your video production flexibility and skills to the next level.
What are the equipment and accessories you will be needing for Green Screen videos (budget-friendly manner)?
In this section I will going through each and every piece of equipment that you will be needing in order to produce Green Screen videos, right from the backdrops to the different types of lights.
The best part is that I will be showing the cheapest possible solutions so you can do this on a low budget also.
What are the different lighting set-ups for Green Screen video production?
In this section I will be teaching you the different lighting set ups that are used in Green Screen video production. My main emphasis here will be to teach you the set-up that works the best for beginners and can be executed very quickly. You will truly be surprised to see how simple this set up can be.
How to shoot Green Screen videos?
In this section I will be actually showing you how I shoot my own videos by giving you a complete practical walk-through on each step I take when I shoot my own videos. We will be doing this in a small studio room so you know that you don't need a lot of space for Green Screen video production.
How to edit Green Screen videos?
This is probably the most important part of this course. Here I will be teaching you how to edit your Green Screen footage in the fastest way possible inside Adobe Premiere Pro.
The best part about this unique editing technique that I will be teaching you is that even if you have made some mistakes during the shooting part, like having improper lighting on the Green Screen Backdrop, you will still be able to get amazing results.
I have been teaching photography and videography since 2013 and have taught over 40,000 students in over 160 countries.
I can assure you this course will be worth the time.
I'm genuinely excited to teach you this amazing art of Green Screen or Chroma Key video production because I feel learning this skill can really level the playing field when it comes to videography because even those with a small budget can develop beautiful backgrounds in their videos.
It really is a game changing skill and I hope I will get a chance to teach you this.
So what are you waiting for? Sign up and let's start! :)
target_audience: This course is for people who want to learn Green Screen video production in a budget-friendly and quick manner.

courses.title: Feature Film Funding and Distribution Course
courses.bio: Learn How to Fund and Distribute an Independent Feature Film
objectives: Film Development and Funding
Low and High Budget Film Crowdfunding
Film Marketing & PR Strategies
Online and Offline Distribution

Online Film Distribution: Where can you find your audience

requirements: General Knowledge of Filmmaking
courses.description:
If you're looking to learn how to fund and distribute your indie feature film then this is the course for you. Whether you are looking for private investors, government funding or crowdfunding backers we will show you all the different in depth strategies to raising funds for your film. Once the film is complete whether you are looking to distribute your film in cinemas, DVD or online we will give you all the tools necessary to promote and successfully release your film!


FEATURE FILM DEVELOPMENT & FUNDING
We will discuss crucial aspects of development such as timing, the importance of working on multiple projects at once, getting distributor / agent's input, attracting cast and identifying an audience.
She will then dive into the different funding routes available including:
BFI development funding (approach to this sort of funding compared to private investment)
Private investment (what to offer investors and how to handle them.
Film Investment companies (the pro’s and con’s)
Tax credit
Product placement
LOW BUDGET FILM CROWDFUNDING
When we first started out as film producers we were completely lost as to where we can find funding for short films and micro budget features. We'd apply for every grant, investor scheme and screenplay competition we could find and we would never hear back. So we decided to take matters into our own hands and green light our own projects through crowdfunding.
But it's not that easy... if you've ever tried crowdfunding you know. Where do you find hundreds of backers and thousands of pounds? Who would give money to your campaign except for maybe immediate friends and family? What steps do you need to take to make the campaign A SUCCESS?
We want to show you exactly how we funded multiple films through crowdfunding, one of which was a short that raised over £30,000. We've advised and coached on countless campaigns and held many workshops, online courses and webinars but here we want to give you absolutely everything we know and have in one ultimate package.
This part includes the campaign preparation and strategies for growing your audience
We will then move on to a successful outreach strategy and how to promote the campaign itself once its live.
HIGHER BUDGET CROWDFUNDING
Learn how Lawrie successfully crowdfunded multiple feature films and raised over £300k on Kickstarter
Learn how Philip crowdfunded his documentary film on kickstarter and raised over $250k
FILM MARKETING & DISTRIBUTION
You’ve made a feature film, now how do you get it distributed, seen and profitable?
Here we will discuss how to create a buzz around your film and this topics such as:
Getting on set visits by media
Self promotion
Utilising BTS materials and footage
Making the most of any USP’s
Agent / distributors. Ideally you’ve already built this connection in phase 1, but if not we'll discuss how to you find someone suitable.
Film Festivals and how useful the festival run really is.
Finally we will discuss whether you can truly make money from independent films?
ONLINE FILM INDIE DISTRIBUTION
This course compiles the most successful and up to date strategies for releasing a profitable indie film online, gathered from film distributors, PR consultants, marketing experts and indie film producers.
Build Your Audience and Release your Film
Audience research: who is your target audience and where can you find them
How to become part of pre-existing communities and groups efficiently
How to build a social media following and expand your reach
How to get your followers engaged and excited about the release
How to build an email list and how useful is it
How to approach and build relationships with bloggers and journalists
The key to getting more reviews, more press and more exposure
Once you have your audience the next step is to decide where and when you should release your film. We'll discuss all the topics including:
How and when to work with aggregators and distribution platforms
Which streaming platforms should you submit your film to?
AVOD vs SVOD vs TVOD
SEO is key to getting views and sales - we'll teach you how to optimise it
How to optimise posters and key art - what really works?
Market and Promote Your Film
Your film is released! Now what? How can you promote it to get as many viewers or sales as possible? In this section you will learn:
Advanced social media marketing and promotion
How to self-promote within groups and communities
How to use journalist and blogger contacts from day 1 to maximise exposure
Should you work with PR agencies and which ones are best?
How to acquiring reviews and why are they so important?
Paid FB Ads - do they work and how to utilise them step by step
Using youtube channels and influencers to increase traffic
At the end of this course you will have all the tools and strategies to self-distribute your indie feature film online.
target_audience: Filmmakers looking to produce one of their first feature films

courses.title: Funcionamiento de las cámaras profesionales de video
courses.bio: Historia, antecedentes y evolución de las videocámaras
objectives: Conocer el desarrollo histórico de las videocámaras
Aplicar los distintos elementos del lenguaje audiovisual en la grabación de contenido audiovisual
Conocer la tecnologías detrás de los sensores de luz en las cámaras de video
Desarrollar habilidades para la correcta postura corporal en la grabación usando cámaras de video
requirements: No
courses.description:
Si quieres dedicarte al mundo del cine o la televisión, o tu profesión está relacionado con este sector, seguramente sepas del funcionamiento de una cámara. Si no es el caso, y te preguntas cómo funciona una cámara de vídeo, en este eMEDIAX contestamos a tu duda. ¡Y no solo eso! A través de este curso te convertirás en todo un experto en este ámbito. ¿Te interesa?


Este curso tiene como objetivo describir el funcionamiento de las cámaras profesionales del video a través del conocimiento de sus componentes.


Como ya sabes, la tecnología ha avanzado muchísimo en estos últimos años, y es precisamente por eso por lo que actualmente existen cámaras que graban vídeo al alcance de cualquiera sea ya tanto por precio como por complejidad de la misma.


Una videocámara o cámara de video es un dispositivo, generalmente portátil, que permite registrar imágenes y sonidos. Convirtiéndolos en señales eléctricas que pueden ser reproducidos por un aparato determinado. En otras palabras, una cámara de vídeo es un traductor óptico.


En este primer apartado les hablaremos de algo relativamente sencillo de comprender y que podrías pasar por alto y luego arrepentirte.
Si quieres saber mas sobre este curso, no te pierdas este eMEDIAX.
target_audience: Cualquier persona interesada en sacar provecho de sus cámaras de video

courses.description:
Wedding Photography & Videography Business Masterclass


Are you interested in starting your own wedding photography or videography business?
Or maybe you’ve already started — but you're struggling to book clients, make consistent income, or even get responses to your inquiries.


If that sounds familiar, this course is for you.


This is a Business Masterclass — Not a Camera Tutorial:


This course focuses primarily on the business side of wedding photography and videography, because that’s where most creatives get stuck. From pricing to sales, branding, marketing, vendor networking, and client experience… this class walks you through everything you need to build a profitable, sustainable wedding business.


We also include one detailed lesson on how to shoot a wedding day and how to structure your timeline, but this is not a technical or editing course.

This is a roadmap for making money doing what you love.


Who This Class Is For:
Wedding photographers, videographers, or hybrid shooters are ready to take their business seriously
Beginners who want to start a legitimate wedding business without wasting years figuring it out
Struggling pros stuck with low bookings, poor pricing, or inconsistent income
Anyone tired of vague tutorials and ready for clear, strategic action


If you're looking for a quick overview or bite-sized tips, this course may not be for you.
But if you're ready for the deep dive that changes your business, welcome.


Why You Should Take This Class:
After 13 years in the industry, I’ve turned my passion into a highly profitable photography and videography business — and I’m here to help you do the same.


I’ve filmed and photographed over 450 weddings across the U.S., Central and South America, and Europe
My work has been featured in 30+ wedding blogs and magazines
I’ve been named Best Photographer in Georgia three years in a row
I’m honored to have a 17-foot permanent photography art installation at the Savannah Convention Center— a testament to how far this journey can take you
But none of it came easily.


I’ve made all the mistakes. I’ve been ghosted, underbooked, underpriced, and burned out.
That’s exactly why I built this class — so you don’t have to learn the hard way.


What Makes This Course Different
This isn’t another fluff-filled course with generic advice.
This is the exact strategy, structure, and system I use in my own business — taught in over 24 hours of in-depth, step-by-step video content.


Yes, the videos are long — and that’s intentional.
They’re dense, detailed, and worth watching in 45-minute increments. You’re not getting surface-level tips here — you’re getting my full wedding photography and videography business blueprint.


What You’ll Learn:
How to price your services to reflect your value
How to attract and book high-paying clients
How to write emails and build systems that convert leads
How to build a brand that aligns with your ideal couple
How to market without wasting time on what doesn’t work
How to manage your business without burnout
How to shoot a wedding day with structure and confidence
How to upsell albums and products — even passively


What You Get Inside the Course:


Over 24 hours of video training, plus 40+ downloadable tools and templates:
Contract Templates (Photo, Video, Engagements)
Sample Client Questionnaires
Lead Management & Booking Workflows
Wedding Day Emergency Checklist & Shot List
12 Positioning Statement Formulas
Styled Shoot Planning Guide
Customizable Studio Magazine Templates
Sales Scripts, Email Templates & SEO Tips
Vendor Networking Strategies
Mental Hacks for Sales Confidence
Engagement Posing Guide
EXTRA: My Signature B&W Presets (.xmp format)


Ongoing Support Available:


You’re not alone on this journey.
I offer 1:1 coaching calls for students who want personalized help — just message me after enrolling or email me directly
We also host photography retreats and destination workshops for creatives who want a custom, adventurous learning experience
My contact information is included — I’m here to help you every step of the way


This Is Your Next Step:
If you’ve been searching for wedding photography courses online that actually dive into pricing, branding, vendor relationships, sales, client psychology, and long-term growth, not just gear and posing, this is it.


No gatekeeping. No fluff.
Just everything I’ve learned in over a decade — passed on to you.


Let’s build the business you’ve been dreaming of.
target_audience: This course is for aspiring and professional wedding Photographers and Videographers who are ready to take their skills—and their business—to the next level. Whether you’re just starting out and overwhelmed by all the moving parts, or you’ve shot dozens of weddings but still struggle to stand out in a saturated market, this course will give you the roadmap, tools, and confidence you need to thrive.

First steps into filmmaking. Become mast: The camera tells it's own story
The power of the visual story
Cinematography in Film: Create a cinemat: What are compositions and visual storytelling?
Make any set or location cinematic: Tools you need to create cinematic shots.

requirements: You don't need to know anything about filmmaking. Just have the willing to practice the skills you learned with a camera that could be just your smartphone.
courses.description:
The film is the visual art to tell a story, and it's the way narratives are transformed into true stories, but the true master of this art is the person behind the camera. Learn the basics of filmmaking and be a pro at operating the camera.
Learn how to create depth to get cinematic shots into your sets. It doesn't matter if you're creating tutorials, interviews, a film, or even more important video calls, you always need a set. In this class, you're going to learn to create your own film set in your home.
The most important part of filmmaking is cinematography and sometimes it's hard to achieve these nice shots.


What will I learn?
In this class, we’re going to start the filmmaking journey by creating a cinematic shot with the right framing. Then we’re going to understand the importance of camera angles and movement. The next step in filmmaking will be telling a story because the film is the visual art to tell a story. The story is the most important part of filmmaking, and it will be the longest part of this class. We’re going to see how different framing, angles, and movements can tell different emotions and feelings. And to give our videos the last final touch to look professional, we’re going to dive a little bit also into lighting.
In this class, we're also going to learn what depth is, create depth with the main light, play around with practical lights and the background to create a more cinematic shot. After this class, you're going to know how to light up your set for film or talking-head shot and get a cinematic shot.
Also, this class will cover:
Identify what makes a video cinematic
Train the eye to find nice shots (angle, movement, framing, composition)
Find the right tools to create cinematic shots
Go into a new place and find the right way of filming to achieve cinematic shots
Light up the set just with sunlight.
Working with reflectors and negative fill
Moving the camera to create depth
Understanding the program
Keep a clean editing
create better 2D animations
editing with music correctly
Color correction
Transferring footage to other Adobe Apps


For who is the class intended for?
This class is for everyone who is just starting the journey of becoming a filmmaker and want to tell their stories through film. This class is also for every beginner videographer or even a professional who didn't understand how to create depth using lighting.


What do I need for this class?
For this class youțre just going to need a camera. It could be a smartphone, a camcorder, or even a professional DSLR. The focus in this class is not on video quality, like resolution, but what the camera operator did.
If you have any softboxes or film lights (even cheap ones) you can follow this class along, but if not, also a window can do the job. If you have any other lights (like decorative lights, led band, ...) you can simply use them as practical lights to create depth.
target_audience: Beginner filmmakers who want to become a pro in this domain.

courses.bio: Conoscere tutto il processo produttivo di un audiovisivo a partire dall'idea cinematografica fino al montaggio finale.
objectives: Conoscenza del processo produttivo cinematografico

I ruoli nella lavorazione: i reparti Scenografia, Costumi, Trucco e Parrucco
I ruoli nella lavorazione: I reparti Macchinisti ed Elettricisti
La Post produzione: I raccordi nel découpage classico o montaggio invisibile

requirements: Non sono necessari prerequisiti per partecipare al corso, è un percorso base adatto a tutti gli studenti
courses.description:
Il video corso "Dall'idea al film", condotto dall'attore e videomaker Alessandro Pani, attraverso lo studio e l’analisi delle varie fasi di realizzazione di un prodotto audiovisivo, vuole mettere gli utenti a conoscenza del funzionamento della macchina-cinema e aiutare studenti, content creator o videomaker in erba a realizzare il loro primo prodotto audiovisivo in ogni suo aspetto.
Inoltre si prefigge anche lo scopo di creare, se possibile, spettatori sempre più consapevoli del potere e della forza delle immagini. Soprattutto oggi, in una società sempre più condizionata dalle immagini, e dai suoi “mezzi di trasporto”: cinema, tv, computer o smartphone.
La conoscenza del processo produttivo in tutte le sue fasi rappresenta uno stimolo concreto affinché l'utente principiante possa mettersi all'opera e dedicarsi alla creazione del suo primo prodotto video curandone tutti gli aspetti (ideazione, scrittura, inquadrature, casting, riprese e montaggio video).
Il videocorso è incentrato soprattutto sull'acquisizione del linguaggio cinematografico, linguaggio che tutti noi fruiamo quotidianamente nei mezzi di comunicazione in maniera non consapevole e, per questo motivo, difficilmente sappiamo come usarlo nel caso in cui volessimo "parlare" ad uno spettatore tramite il mezzo cinematografico.
Il corso si compone inoltre di diverse risore e materiali che saranno utili allo studente al fine di esercitare le competenze apprese durante le lezioni didattiche.
target_audience: Persone che desiderano lavorare nel mondo del cinema come registi, sceneggiatori, montatori, operatori, etc.

courses.title: Macro Photography & Focus Stacking Made Easy
courses.bio: The photographer's guide to close-up, macro and focus stacking that will have you shooting great macro photos in no time

requirements: A DSLR or mirrorless camera.
A Windows or Mac computer with Adobe Photoshop loaded (a free trial version is available)
courses.description:
Explore the amazing world of Close-up and Macro Photography and Focus Stacking with an internationally published and multi-awards winning photographer. Learn the techniques and equipment (optical, lighting and support) needed to achieve sharply focused, well-exposed photographs of flowers, insects and much more.
This intensive course will show you how to get the most from your DSLR and mirrorless camera and how to enhance its macro capabilities in very affordable ways. Find out, for instance, how to turn your ordinary lens into a superb macro lens for only a few dollars. Or how to turn your on-board flash into a macro flash for small change.
The course covers every type of close-up shot, all the way to extreme macro, and equipment ranging from macro and reversed lenses to close-up attachments and bellows. It also covers focus stacking techniques (including processing through Photoshop and Helicon Focus) as well as software and equipment for extreme macro.
Nic van Oudtshoorn's macro photography skills won him the award of Abstract  Professional Photographer of the Year in the prestigious international 2024 reFocus World Photo Annual competition, competing against photographers from more than 60 countries.

courses.title: Craft of Documentary Filmmaking
courses.bio: Empowering The Next Generation of Filmmakers
objectives: Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the documentary filmmaking process, from concept development to distribution and marketing.
You will learn various techniques for developing a concept, conducting research, shooting and editing a documentary film, and working with subjects.
The course will also provide opportunities for students to engage in critical analysis of documentary films, and to develop their own artistic vision and voice
You will learn about distribution and marketing, and how to develop a plan for getting their film seen by audiences.
Students will be able to critically analyze documentary films, evaluating their storytelling techniques and impact on society.

Developing Concept & Story: Finding a subject and angle for documentary film
Pre-Production: Creating a Shot List and Shot Division
Production - Part 02: Collaborating with Crew & Making Creative Decisions

requirements: No filmmaking experience needed. You will learn everything you need to know.
courses.description:
This course will provide a comprehensive education in documentary filmmaking, covering all aspects of the art and craft from concept to distribution. Students will learn how to develop a story, plan and execute a production, and edit and finish their film. They will also gain an understanding of distribution and marketing, and the ethics and responsibilities of documentary filmmaking. By the end of this course, you will have the knowledge and skills you need to succeed as a documentary filmmaker.


Some potential careers in documentary filmmaking that students may be interested in pursuing after completing this course could include:
Documentary filmmaker
This career involves creating and directing documentary films, including developing concepts and stories, conducting research, planning and executing productions, editing and finishing films, and distributing and promoting the finished product. This course could provide students with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed as documentary filmmakers, including technical and artistic skills, as well as an understanding of the ethics and responsibilities of the craft.
Documentary producer
This career involves overseeing the production of documentary films, including managing budgets, schedules, and crew, coordinating logistics and resources, and ensuring that the final product meets the artistic and technical standards of the filmmaker and the audience. This course could provide students with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed as documentary producers, including project management, communication, and leadership skills.
Documentary editor
This career involves working with the director and producer to shape the raw footage of a documentary film into a coherent and effective final product, including selecting and arranging shots, adding music and sound effects, and creating a visual and narrative structure that tells the story effectively. This course could provide students with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed as documentary editors, including technical proficiency with editing software, and an understanding of storytelling and pacing.
Documentary researcher
This career involves conducting research and gathering information for documentary films, including interviewing sources, collecting and organizing data, and verifying the accuracy and credibility of the information. This course could provide students with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed as documentary researchers, including research methods, data analysis, and fact-checking.
Documentary distributor
This career involves acquiring and releasing documentary films to audiences, including securing distribution deals, promoting the films, and ensuring that they reach the right audience. This course could provide students with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed as documentary distributors, including an understanding of distribution channels, marketing strategies
target_audience: Beginner Filmmakers
Beginner Film Directors
New Film Producers
Film Students
Journalism & Mass Communication Students

courses.description:
As a film director, you will be faced with a unique set of challenges that require a strong work ethic, determination, and resilience. From managing high stakes and constant pressure to navigating creative and logistical challenges, this course is designed to prepare you for the demands of the film industry.
Throughout the course, we will delve into the specific difficulties directors encounter and provide strategies for overcoming them. You will learn how to bring your vision to life on the big screen and develop the skills and confidence needed to succeed in this competitive field.
Whether you are just starting out in your career or looking to take your skills to the next level, this course has something to offer. The film industry can be demanding, but with the right knowledge and approach, you can turn your passion for film into a rewarding and successful career. Enroll in this course and get ready to take on the challenges of being a film director with confidence and determination.
As a director with many years of experience, I've learned a lot from my past films, including the mistakes I made along the way. In this course, I want to share my perspective and the tips that have helped me overcome challenges and obstacles through my own experiences.

courses.bio: Come scrivere, girare e montare video per ottenere grandi numeri sul web
objectives: Realizzare video dai grandi numeri sul web

CAPITOLO 1: IL VIDEOMAKER: La rivoluzione digitale - dalla pellicola al video - gli investimenti
I contenuti - nuove carriere - nuovi mercati - product placement
CAPITOLO 2: ADVERTISING VS VIRAL MARKETI: La mia storia - interruption marketing - viral marketing - paid vs earned
spot vs video virale - tutti i modi del Product Placement
CAPITOLO 3: LA SCRITTURA DELL'AUDIOVISIV: La sceneggiatura come struttura del palazzo - il modello in 3 atti
Il cortometraggio e le sue regole - mostra, non dire !
CAPITOLO 6: MECCANISMI PER VIDEO DI SUCC: Il "caso" Tana del Coniglio - altri video di Karma istantaneo
CAPITOLO 7: ARGOMENTI DIVISIVI: Flames - personaggi - pubblicità con argomenti divisivi - politically correct
Medicine alternative - Tifo calcistico - valori aziendali in pericolo

requirements: Il corso è destinato ai videomakers e content creators di tutti i livelli, anche principianti
courses.description:
Il tuo obiettivo è realizzare video di grande successo sul web?
Sì. Chi produce video per YouTube, Facebook o Instagram ha un obiettivo: la sua grandissima diffusione, fino alla viralità.
Molti manuali insegnano tecniche per spingere i contenuti attraverso strategie e sponsorizzazioni a pagamento, ma questo videocorso si occupa di altro
Un video è realmente virale quando è capace di auto-propagarsi, attraverso un meccanismo di passaparola, o word of mouth
Ciò che conta è come viene scritto e realizzato. Un video di successo è capace di incontrare i sogni, i desideri, le le ansie e i valori della gente, colpendone l’emotività con le armi dello storytelling e della potenza delle immagini
Nel corso, tante riflessioni e consigli, presi da studi di psicologia, neuroscienze, narratologia, comunicazione e marketing, ma soprattutto dall’esperienza sul campo, che hanno portato l’autore ad ottenere risultati eccezionali: video fortemente virali, con punte di 20 milioni di visualizzazioni.
Vedrai molti video a supporto della teoria. Il corso si sofferma sui video di finzione: brevissimi cortometraggi, in funzione pubblicitaria, attraverso il product placement. Tuttavia, le considerazioni valgono anche per vlog di viaggio, documentari, montaggi di immagini, divertenti o toccanti.
In questo videocorso scoprirai:
- Le strutture della scrittura: sceneggiatura in tre atti, viaggio dell’eroe, i meccanismi specifici per il web, l’importanza del finale
- La durata, il ritmo, le tecniche di montaggio, la scelta e direzione degli attori.
- I social network: le sponsorizzazioni, il copy, come creare un post intrigante e farlo partire bene.
target_audience: Videomakers pubblicitari, creatori di video di personal branding, filmmakers indipendenti, youtubers, realizzatori di web series e video divertenti

Are you new to drones? Or do you want to improve your flight skills? Or maybe you want to get the most out of the DJI Go app.

courses.description:
Want to learn how to make action scenes that look like Hollywood blockbusters from leading stunt professionals in the industry.
This tutorial ISN'T it.


But if you want to learn from indie filmmakers who have been creating martial arts action scenes every week for many years with a long list of short films, web series and features... Then you have come to the right place!
With the demand of creating content every week for YouTube, we have developed a work flow that allows us to produce content efficiently and quickly on an extremely low budget and small crew size.


That’s why we created the Do As ASDO Do Fight Scene 101 Tutorial.


We'd like to introduce to you a safe, efficient, and budget-friendly approach on making exciting and explosive action scenes for independent filmmaking.
By utilizing some of the core concepts of our workflow, you and your production can create spectacular action scenes from hand to hand to gunfights with as less of a headache on set as possible! Use some of our ideas and merge it with your own style to create something unique to your vision and execution. This would definitely help speed up production and make it easier to understand for your talent so they don't burn out on set, filming take after take after take.


So, we'll walk you through, starting from the conception of a basic fight scene all the way to editing because what's the use of an awesome action packed scene if it isn't shot and edited well?


Here is how we’re different.
With the Do As ASDO Do Fight Scene 101, it's made by us, fellow indie filmmakers, that make action films, shorts, and web series every week on our Youtube channel. We know the struggles and problems that often arise in small productions and these are our tested workflows that allow us to produce quality content safely, cheaply, AND consistently.


This is a perfect tool for any indie filmmaker because:
You can create entertaining fight and action scenes for your project of ANY budget size


You shorten your production time on set SAVING you time and money


Your performers are able to perform at 110% with safety in mind with minimum amount of takes to have a quality, end product


Inside you’ll get:
Access to 10 videos with concise information breaking down how we plan and shoot fight scenes. Providing you with our trade secrets on how to plan, choreograph, execute and edit a fight scene - ASDO style!


Unlimited access to all current and future updates to the course. Yes! We will update and add more here and there!


Learn our special process of filmmaking from conception to completion within your budget with no stress at all.

Sounds too good to be true? I offer you a 30 day full money back guarantee - no questions asked. That’s how much I believe in this course.
Here’s what you get with the course:
You’ll get access to the 10 sections of the course that will teach you the fundamentals of Photoshop compositing from the ground up. The course is supported with over 11 hours of clear content that I walk you through each step of the way.

Next you’ll learn how to use and manipulate layers, layer masks, and blend modes to compose realistic scenes and images from your own photos. Whatever you can imagine, you can create in Photoshop.

Then you’ll master the art of manipulating color, lighting, and filters to make your artwork stand out as professional, high-end work.

At this point, you’ll know the tools to create your masterpieces from scratch. The last section will teach you how to apply the skills you’ve learned from the course to make yourself visible as a true artist and professional.
Lastly, we’ll discuss specific tools, resources, and best practices you can use to develop your own unique creative style.

Precise placement of elements from different images to create one seamless work of art.
The principles of retouching, including realistically retouching skin.

How to stand out with your own distinct creative style.
What else will you get?

This all comes under one convenient easy to use platform. Plus you will get fast, friendly, responsive support from me on the Udemy Q&A section of the course or through direct message.
Photoshop can seem overwhelming, but I will be here for you every single step of the way!
So what are you waiting for? Sign up now and step up your photography today!

requirements: Non è necessaria alcuna esperienza. Idealmente però devi avere un modello di GoPro a partire dalla Hero 9
courses.description:
Benvenuto/a nel corso sulla GoPro Hero 11 Black, il corso perfetto per tutti gli appassionati di videomaking che desiderano imparare a utilizzare al meglio questa incredibile action camera!

Questo corso completo sulla GoPro Hero 11 è perfetto per tutti coloro che desiderano imparare a creare video e foto di alta qualità con la loro GoPro. Anche se il corso è specifico per la Hero 11, molte impostazioni e funzionalità sono simili o identiche alla Hero 9 e Hero 10, rendendo questo corso comunque utile per chi possiede uno di questi modelli.
Infatti il menù delle Hero 9, Hero 10 e Hero 11 è molto simile per non dire quasi uguale. Inoltre fra la Hero 10 e Hero 11 cambia il tipo di sensore che sulla Hero 11 è in 8:7, il campo visivo HyperView e la possibilità di registrare in 10 bit. Con la Hero 9 invece cambiano anche le risoluzioni/fps massimi. Infatti mentre con le Hero 10 e Hero 11 si arriva a registrare in 5.3k a 60fps, con la Hero 9 si arriva al 5k a 30fps o al 4k 60fps e così via.
Ma i consigli generali sui campi visivi, risoluzioni, framerate, valori ISO, colore, nitidezza e così via sono sempre gli stessi anche per i modelli precedenti di GoPro (Hero 9/Hero 10).

La Hero 11 Black è l'ultimo modello di casa GoPro, che offre una qualità delle immagini e dei video senza precedenti. Con questa videocamera potrai catturare i momenti più emozionanti e avventurosi della tua vita, sia in acqua che sulla terra ferma.
In questo corso, imparerai tutto quello che c'è da sapere sulla GoPro Hero 11 Black, dalle impostazioni di base ai trucchi più avanzati per creare video spettacolari. Imparerai come impostare la videocamera, come utilizzare le diverse modalità di ripresa, come creare time-lapse e slow motion, come stabilizzare i video, come utilizzare il controllo vocale e molto altro ancora.
Il corso è strutturato in modo semplice e intuitivo, con lezioni brevi e supportate da tutorial video dettagliati.
Il focus principale è sulla modalità video, infatti ti mostrerò tantissimi esempi e ti farò capire che variando ogni singola impostazione puoi ottenere dei risultati differenti. In ogni caso affronteremo in modo più breve anche le impostazioni dedicate alla fotografia e ai video temporizzati come ad esempio i time-lapse (Temporizzati), hyper-lapse (TimeWarp), Light Painting, Luci di veicoli e Star Trail.
Al termine del corso, sarai in grado di utilizzare la GoPro Hero 11 Black al meglio delle sue potenzialità e creare video e immagini spettacolari da condividere con i tuoi amici e familiari, oppure per realizzare dei lavori professionali.
Che cosa aspetti? Iscriviti subito al corso sulla GoPro Hero 11 Black e scoprirai tutto quello che c'è da sapere su questa fantastica action camera!
target_audience: Creatori di contenuti digitali, videomaker professionisti, viaggiatori nonché per gli appassionati di fotografia e videografia che utilizzano la GoPro Hero 11 per hobby e vogliono imparare a sfruttare al meglio le funzioni dell'action cam per creare contenuti coinvolgenti e di alta qualità.

courses.title: Cyanotypie Workshop - Fotografie mit der Sonne
courses.bio: Eisenblaudruck mit Denis und Anna
objectives: Geschichte und Grundlagen der Cyanotypie.
Cyanotypie-Papier selbst herstellen.
Auswahl und Vorbereitung der richtigen Materialien und Werkzeuge.
Belichtungs- und Entwicklungstechniken mithilfe der Sonne.
Moderne Anwendungen und Experimente mit Cyanotypie.
requirements: Keine Vorkenntnisse nötig, in diesem Kurs lernst du alles was du für die Erstellung von Cyanotypie Prints wissen musst.
Für Anfänger und Unerfahrene geeignet
courses.description:
Willkommen zum Cyanotypie Workshop mit Denis und Anna! In diesem Kurs nehmen wir dich mit auf eine Reise durch die vielseitige Welt der Cyanotypie, auch als Eisenblaudruck bekannt.


Erster Abschnitt: Einführung in die Cyanotypie
Im ersten Abschnitt des Kurses werfen wir einen Blick auf den Ursprung der Cyanotypie, der wahrscheinlich auch den Ursprung der Fotografie darstellt. Dieses alte fotografische Edeldruckverfahren wurde 1842 entwickelt und fasziniert auch heute noch.


Zweiter Abschnitt: Vorbereitung der Cyanotypie Papiere
Im zweiten Abschnitt unseres Cyanotypie Workshops beschäftigen wir uns mit der Chemie der Cyanotypie. Du lernst, wie du mit einfachen Zutaten deine eigene Cyanotypie-Emulsion herstellen kannst. Außerdem schauen wir uns an welceh Papiere und Untergründe am besten geeignet sind und wie man dann Papier für den Cyanotypie-Druck beschichtet. Zudem geben wir Tipps, wie du mit verschiedenen Materialien und Chemikalien experimentieren kannst.


Dritter Abschnitt: Belichten und Entwickeln
Der dritte Abschnitt fokussiert sich auf die Belichtung und Entwicklung im Rahmen des Cyanotypie Workshops. Du lernst unterschiedliche Papiere für verschiedene Effekte zu belichten und wie du die entwickelten Papiere optimal behandelst. Außerdem erfährst du, wie jedes digitale Bild einfach und mit minimalem Softwareeinsatz als Cyanotypie-Druck umgesetzt werden kann.
Tauche mit uns in die Welt der alternativen fotografischen Verfahren ein und entdecke das "Fotografieren ohne Kamera"! Wir haben jede Menge Tipps und Tricks für dich auf Lager. Wir freuen uns darauf, dich im Kurs begrüßen zu dürfen!
target_audience: Fotografen, die mit analogen Verfahren experimentieren möchten.
Lehrer und Dozenten, die ihren Unterricht um ein spannendes Thema erweitern möchten.
Pädagogen, die Cyanotypie in ihr Programm einbauen möchten.
Künstler und Kunststudenten, die experimentelle Methoden erkunden möchten.
DIY-Enthusiasten, die neue Fertigkeiten erlernen wollen.

courses.description:
Курс по программе Adobe Premier Pro. Научись зарабатывать деньги на видео монтаже!
Не нужно знать абсолютно каждую кнопку этой программы для того чтобы стать успешным видеомонтажером эта программа создана для профессионалов и имеет огромный функционал который тяжело постичь начинающему специалисту.
Но мы на курсе будет изучать только те инструменты которые нужны для выполнения заказов с фриланс бирж.
Это дает возможность учиться и сразу зарабатывать деньги.

Привет!
Меня зовут Евгений Курилов, в 2013 году открыл свой видеопродакшн и делал видео для внутренних зарубежных заказчиков. Точно знаю чего хотят клиенты и как с ними работать в сфере видеопроизводства.

Я здесь, чтобы помочь тебе изучить Adobe Premiere Pro и показать  инструменты, необходимые для того, чтобы стать успешным видеоредактором.

Этот курс создан для абсолютных новичков! которые совершенно не знакомы с Premiere Pro.

На протяжении всего курса мы будем работать над проектами с фриланс бирж, выполняя которые вы научитесь монтировать.
Что будет внутри уроков?
Чтобы было понятнее, я специально подготовил рубрику уроков. Таким образом, вы можете получить доступ к тому, что вы хотите найти гораздо проще.
Вам будет легче учиться на четких и конкретных уроках.
Вы будете получать частные уроки для таких платформ, как Youtube и Instagram .
Вы найдете возможные проблемы и решения в списках.
Вы узнаете, что делают инструменты, с приложениями и конкретными советами.
Вы научитесь не только сборке, но и редактированию.
Для того, чтобы предоставить вам качественную услугу, я уделил особое внимание качеству звука и использовал профессиональное оборудование.
Начните обучение Premiere Pro прямо сейчас и быстро начните карьеру видеоредактора.

courses.description: In this course, we will learn how to edit a stunning landscape and cityscape images during different times using Photoshop. We will learn how to edit sunrise, sunset, day time, blue hour and night shots as well as astrophotography. courses.title: Tek Plan (One-Shot) Videolar Yapmanın Tüm Sırlarını Öğrenin!
courses.bio: Drone’unuzu FCC Moduna Geçirin, Uzak Mesafelere Uçun, Harika Videolar Hazırlayın, Paylaşın ve Sosyal Medyada Viral Olun!
objectives: Drone'u kilometrelerce uzun mesafelere gönderebilmek için sinyal gücünü ve menzili artıran, daha kararlı bağlantı sağlayan FCC modunu kullanabilmeyi öğren.
Tek plan (one-shot) çekim tekniğini, bu teknikle drone çekimleri yapabilmeyi ve nelere dikkat etmen gerektiğini öğren.
Tek plan çekimler için hangi drone’un en uygun olduğunu öğren.
Drone uçuş rotanı en iyi şekilde planlamayı ve sinyal gücünü doğru ve verimli kullanabilmeyi öğren.
Shutter, ISO, ND filtre kullanımı, codec formatları, hafıza kartı seçimleri ve FPS (kare hızları) hakkında derinlemesine bilgi edin.
Drone kumandasındaki tuşlara neleri nasıl atayabileceğini, kamera ayarlarını optimize etmeyi, gimbal hızını nasıl ayarlayabileceğini öğren.
Ham görüntüleri Final Cut Pro programına nasıl yükleyeceğini ve timeline oluşturmayı öğren.
İnternetten müzik indirip programa nasıl import edeceğini öğren.
Müzik ritmine uygun fader (geçiş kontrolü) ile hızlandırma ve yavaşlatma tekniklerini mükemmel uygulamayı öğren.
LUT paketlerini Final Cut Pro'ya nasıl yükleyeceğini öğren.
LOG görüntülere LUT kullanarak harika renkler kazandırmayı öğren.
Videonu daha canlı hale getirmek için ses efektlerini nasıl entegre edebileceğini öğren.
BULANIKLAŞTIRMA (BLUR) efekt paketlerini Final Cut Pro'ya nasıl yükleyeceğini öğren.
BLUR efektlerini kullanarak videolarına inanılmaz görünümler kazandırmayı öğren.
Yüksek video kalitesi için gereken export ayarlarını öğren.
Videolarını sosyal medya için uygun formatta nasıl export edebileceğini öğren.
Videona uygun kapak fotoğrafını nasıl hazırlayacağını öğren.
FCC uygulamasını telefonuna nereden ve nasıl yükleyeceğini öğren.
