requirements: No podcasting skills required
courses.description:
If you’re reading this, that means you’re about to start a podcast, so take a second to congratulate yourself, because you’ve already taken the first step on an exciting and fulfilling journey. If you have a great idea, but aren’t sure where to start, or need some help elevating your production quality to that next level, then you’ve come to the right place.


Here’s a brief outline of what we’ll cover in this course:


Lesson 1 is about planning your podcast, from the topic and content covered to the format and structure.


Lesson 2 will go over what equipment you need to get the best possible video and audio for your preferred setup and budget.


Lesson 3 covers everything you need to do to prepare for your recording session, from vocal practice to interview tips and tricks.


Lesson 4 is all about the big day - the recording itself. You’ll learn everything from scheduling, microphone technique, and the easily overlooked things you can do to elevate your presentation and quality.


Lesson 5 is an editing crash course, and will teach you the fundamentals of editing audio and video on any editing software. You’ll learn how to enhance your audio quality, make your podcast flow, add intros and outros, as well as fix many of the common mistakes that can happen during a recording.


Lesson 6 will show you how to upload your podcast for the world to see, and how to use an RSS feed, blurbs and keywords to elevate your show to the top of people’s lists. We’ll also touch on some different ways you can market your podcast, and how you can turn your podcast into engaging social media clips.
target_audience: This podcast course is for the new podcast with no experience or a current podcaster looking to sharpen their skills!

courses.description:
Experienced stock footage contributor? Complete beginner?
If you want to level up your sales with professional metadata, then you're in the right place.


There are TONS of articles, blog posts, and forums out there on how to keyword for stock footage and it's a huge pain in the neck to discover that most of them contain conflicting information and outdated best practices. That rabbit hole can be disorienting and you're left still wondering if your keywords will help you get sales.


I've synthesized all that information from the agencies into a straightforward, 43-minute digital course so you don't have to wade through the mud. I read every article I could find, watched every agency webinar out there, and wrote to customer service to ask any questions that were still unanswered or had conflicting advice.


Skip past all that noise and get down to writing killer keywords for your stock footage!


In this course, we'll cover how to write SEO-optimized titles and keywords for commercial clips following agency best practices from Shutterstock, Adobe Stock, and Pond5.


KEY SKILLS:
You'll learn how to:
Write compelling, SEO-optimized titles
Brainstorm a solid list of keywords
Review and refine those keywords
Differentiate your writing on similar clips


BONUS!!!
Get my second course, Brainstorm Killer Keywords from Start to Finish for your Stock Footage included for FREE!


Say goodbye to writers' block with my 11-Step Brainstorming Method using my favorite websites, tools, checklists, and review techniques.


We'll go through four clips together from start to finish: a landscape clip, two similar wildlife clips, and a model clip.


By the end of this class, you’ll have plenty of brainstorming strategies to add to your toolkit so you'll never have to stare at a blank screen again.

courses.description:
Mi chiamo Davide Vasta e mi occupo di formazione e produzione nel campo del video. In Umbria ho un campus formativo dove videomakers professionisti ma anche apprendisti vengono da tutta Italia per partecipare ai miei corsi.
Ho deciso di creare questo nuovo percorso perché sempre più spesso vedo che chi si occupa di videomaking fatica molto a comprendere appieno le dinamiche del proprio lavoro. Che valore dare al proprio operato… come gestire un set video… come comunicare al meglio le proprie specificitá per attrarre clienti… come usare i social sia come vetrina, sia come luogo dove chiedere consigli… ecc.
Quello che vedo é appunto che i videomaker oggi hanno grandi difficoltá ad orientarsi nel mercato e spesso si muovono in modo casuale, senza definire un strategia di lavoro ben precisa.
Questo videocorso, che in realtá é più un percorso formativo da fare insieme, vuole prenderti per mano e guidarti attraverso le varie fasi essenziali della costruzione di una professione solida nel mondo del videomaking.
Gli argomenti che andremo ad affrontare insieme sono tutti quelli che nei miei 30 anni di carriera ho dovuto affrontare e risolvere, sia con gli occhi del videomaker, sia con quelli del formatore.
Oggi condivido questo sapere con te, affinché tu possa migliorare la tua attivitá, usare meglio il tuo tempo e comprendere anche il valore economico che si cela dietro le tue mani e la tua testa.
target_audience: Il coaching si rivolge a: VideoMaker Junior e Professionisti, appasionati di videomaking in generale.

objectives: A PDF of Tips to Create Your Best Orb Photography
Walk away with a full understanding of energy and orbs. Learn how easy it is to capture your own orb and energy photographs.

courses.description:
The Science & Spirit of Orbs: You’ve been told they are everything from dust to ghost, lens flares to consciousness, spots to spirits. Some people are excited about their existence, while others might say they don’t exist at all. You may have already seen them in your pictures or you may just be wondering what everyone else is talking about.
The topic of ORBS used to be fun, hippie talk among those who had an appreciation and understanding of other worldly things. However, science is now helping to explain something so out of the ordinary, as just part of the Universal experience. NASA scientist Dr. Karl Heinemann tells us that the largest collection of ORB photography is housed in the Vatican. Yes, everyone is getting in on the incredible experience of discovering what we can’t see around us.
What is even more exciting is that anyone can play using some simple techniques and inexpensive equipment that you probably already have around the house.You will peak into our world of orb photography and we will teach you how to create your own authentic orb pictures.
Here's Our Course Overview:
Introduction: Who Are We and Why Should You Care?
What is an Orb? No Seriously...What Are Orbs?
Who Says So?

Show and Tell: Real and Original Orb Pictures

What Kind of Camera Do I Need to Take Orb Pictures
Hint: you’re gonna be surprised

Video: Interacting with Orbs
Orb Groups and Social Media

Light Beings in Panama
Energy and Plasma

Heart Energy
Biophotons, Energy Waves and YOU

Electro-Magnetic Magicical Moments

Spirit Science
Suggestions for Taking Your Own Orb Photos
Time for a Field Trip
Now What? Discovering Orbs In Your Own Pictures
Getting the Best Out Of Your Orb Photography

Upon completion of this course, enjoy an invitation to our Private Orb Group

courses.title: Curso de fotografia: Desvendando o Flash Externo
courses.bio: Descubra os segredos do Speedlight
objectives: Fotografar com seu flash externo, usando a luz de forma adequada e artística para enriquecer suas imagens
requirements: Ser estudante de fotografia
courses.description:
Já ficou na mão devido a má iluminação de algum ambiente? Quer fotos diferentes e que nenhum celular é capaz de fazer? Quer dar vida e beleza as suas fotos?
Se a sua resposta for "sim" para alguma dessas perguntas, então você está no lugar certo!
Fotografia significa "Foto"= luz e "grafia"=escrever, ou seja, pra ter foto, precisa ter LUZ. De dia você pode até tirar onda e trabalhar bem com a luz do sol, mas para quem gosta de evento e/ou busca resultados mais sofisticados de iluminação, você precisa aprender a usar a luz do flash.
Muita gente diz que não gosta do flash porque brilha o rosto ou deixa olhos vermelhos, mas isso é porque está usando errado.
Vem comigo que vou te mostrar todo funcionamento não só do flash mas da luz em geral, e quando você entender a luz, sua fotografia vai pra outro nível.
O que você vai aprender:
* Direção e potência da luz
* Esquemas de iluminação
* Sincronismo Flash / Câmera
* Modelos e uso de flash
* Rádio flash e modificadores de luz
* Montagem de set de luz e configuração
target_audience: Fotógrafos, estudantes de fotografia

If you're ready to take your filmmaking dreams to the next level, then this is the course for YOU!
This course is going to demystify the process of making professional, broadcast quality documentary content, and then show you what most instructors don't - how to actually sell that content to broadcasters.
I will walk you through the entire process, step-by step. This covers pre-production, production, post-production, and selling!
How do I know all this? Because I did it all myself, with two friends and hardly any money. And our series ended up on television in Australia and Europe, as well as Netflix internationally and Amazon Prime.
We didn't have a coach to walk us through the entire process, but you will. I'm going to walk you through it all. Whether it's figuring out how to prepare for your shoot and what equipment you might need, to filming it all then putting it together in post-production, how to export it to broadcast standards and the different ways shows are sold, as well as what the selling process looks like. I'll even cover some psychological aspects of undertaking a project like this.
If you thought it wasn't possible to get your documentary film or series onto a platform like Netflix, then think again! This course is for any filmmaker who has a shoestring budget and a can-do attitude!

courses.description:
Join over 70,000 students learning from our courses!
So you made a feature film, now what? Most filmmakers don't even think about film distribution but it is, by far, one of the most important parts of the filmmaking process. Film distribution lives in shark infested waters where the system is designed to screw the filmmaker. In this course we will arm you with the knowledge to help you make a smart choice when choosing a film distributor and how to prepare your film for world-wide film distribution.
Whether you have a feature film or documentary we have you covered. Knowledge is power and this course will add more tools to your filmmaker toolbox.
Here is what you will learn in the course:

What is a Film Distributor and the Standard Deal
Carving Out Your Film's Rights
Gross vs Net Profits
Distribution Expenses - Film Markets
Distribution Expenses - Marketing & Materials
Distribution Expenses - Cost Saving Techniques
Increasing Your Leverage with Distributors
What is a Film Market?
Pros and Cons of Attending a Film Market
Getting the Most Out of a Film Marketing
What are film deliverables?
What is a Film Aggregator?
Distribber Debacle
When to Use an Aggregator?
Things to Do Before You Choose a Film Aggregator
Learn how and when to work with sales agents, as well as how to avoid sharks
We discuss the reality of the VOD streaming landscape and how you can profit
Don't get taken advantage of by predatory film distributors. Arm yourself with the knowledge you need to get your feature film out to the world.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What people are saying about this course:
This is a really informative course. It's obvious that the teachers have a lot of passion behind what they do and a ton experience. I look forward to making my next film with some of the tips and ideas shared here in the course. - Laura Swartz
This a great course. It has very practical advise for indie filmmakers, and a step by step process to make a micro-budget feature in a few months. I'm going to apply it to my first feature. - Jared Evans
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Your instructor:
Alex Ferrari has been working in the film industry for over 25 years and is the founder of Indie Film Hustle. He became a whistleblower and exposed Distribber, a film aggregator who owed film producers millions of dollars. Since their closure they also left thousands of filmmaker's without access to their films.
He kept hearing story after story of how filmmakers were being taken advantage of by predatory film distributors so he decided to put together a course explaining the pitfalls filmmakers face when trying to get their films distributed through the legacy distribution model. It is his mission to help filmmakers survive and thrive in the film business.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So what are you waiting for? Join over 70,000 students that have already taken IFH filmmaking and screenwriting courses.
If you've got the dream.
If you've got the drive.
If you've got the passion - but you're missing the knowledge and experience...this course will help you make your feature film into a reality.
Enroll NOW and learn the in and outs of film distribution! Let's get started!

courses.description:
صُمم هذا البرنامج التدريبي ليكون خطوة أولى لكل من يود دخول عالم الأداء الصوتي، كما أنه يكشف في الوقت ذاته لمحترفي هذا العمل أسرار التميز والسبق، في صناعة لم يعد فيها مكان إلا لمن كانت لديه موهبة حقيقية، وميزة تنافسية تجعله متفردًا في موقعه
هذا البرنامج يتناول صناعة الأداء الصوتي من محاور عدة، اللغة، الصوت وطبيعته، بناء النصوص ومعالجتها وفنون الأداء والتأثير
صمم هذا البرنامج ابتداءً كدورة كاملة تتألف ٢٤ ساعة تدريبية، تؤسس لعلوم الأداء وتقنياته وتمنح المشارك فيها كل أدوات الاحتراف، وتكشف له معالم الطريق نحو السوق العالمي، وقد قام بإعداد هذه المادة وقدمها أحمد القطب، محترف ومخرج الأداء الصوتي، وأول المحكمين العربي في جوائز فنون الصوت Voice Arts Awards بالولايات المتحدة، والحاصل عام ٢٠٢٢ على جائزة أفضل معلق صوتي عربي عن فئة الكتاب الصوتي.
استعمل صوت أحمد القطب في إنتاج عدد هائل من برامج التعليم الإلكتروني، والأدلة الصوتية، وتعليمات الأمن والسلامة للطائرات والناهج التعليمية للجامعات وأنظمة الرد الآلي والتفاعل الصوتي لطافة من أبرز الشركات والعلامات التجارية فضلًا عن الحكومات الهيئات الأممية، التي كان من بينها: مرسيدس بنز، أبل، وسترن يونيو، مجموعة فنادق إنتركونتننتال، الإنتربول، هارلي ديفيدسون، المتحف الأولمبي، معرض باريس للسيارات، وغيرها الكثير


كما أسس أحمد القطب قناة: كتابي التي تقدم باقة من روائع أعمال الأدب العالمي في دراما صوتية، ومنصة ArabicIVR الأولى من نوعها في العالم التي تتخصص في تقديم تسجيلات الأداء الصوتي لأنظة الرد الآلي والتفاعل الصوتي المباشر
target_audience: لكل من كانت لديه الموهبة، ويود أن يخطو خطواته الأولى في عالم الأداء والتعليق الصوتي على الطريق نحو الاحتراف

courses.title: How to make Professional Music Videos - Secret Tips & Tricks
courses.bio: Learn the full creative Music Video process from a director who’s worked with The Spice Girls and Robbie Williams
objectives: How to plan and direct a professional-quality music video—from concept to shoot day. Learn how to develop strong creative ideas and write a visual treatment.
Learn how to manage your crew, gear, and schedule to stay on track and stress-free during the shoot
Discover how to capture high-quality visuals using smart techniques with budget-friendly cameras, smartphones, and free light sources like the sun.
Learn to turn everyday spaces—parks, beaches, empty halls—into powerful backdrops that enhance your storytelling.
Learn how to capture a variety of camera angles and framings to create visually rich and dynamic edits.
Master the post-production process: performance edits, cutaways, pacing to music, syncing audio, and storytelling through visuals.
Understand how wardrobe, art direction, and colour grading impact the mood and message of your video—and how to design them from day one.
Cut your footage like a pro by aligning movement, transitions, and emotional beats with the song’s structure.

Introduction: Case study - 'Reach You' Music Video by Sam Winston
The Ideas Stage: The Treatment - A solid visual/written representation of your idea

requirements: No filmmaking experience needed—this course is perfect for beginners, film students and musicians alike.
A smartphone or basic camera capable of video recording.
Eventual access to video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or DaVinci Resolve, Capcut, imovie).
A willingness to learn, experiment, and collaborate with others.
courses.description:
Do you want to make music videos that look cinematic, feel emotional, and truly connect with your audience—even on a tight budget? Whether you're a musician, aspiring director, content creator, or just someone with a passion for storytelling, this course is your complete guide to producing professional-quality music videos from scratch.
Led by award-winning director Jake Wynne—whose credits include The Spice Girls, Robbie Williams, and indie artist Sam Winston—this course breaks down the entire process step by step. From developing a compelling concept to filming stunning visuals and editing with rhythm and style, you'll learn the techniques used by industry professionals in real-world productions.
This isn’t just theory. You’ll follow a detailed case study of a real music video ("Reach You" by Sam Winston), exploring exactly how it was planned, shot, and cut together. You'll discover how to get the most out of limited gear, natural lighting, everyday locations, and small crews.
If you’ve ever wanted to direct your own music video—or simply elevate your video content to a higher level —this course gives you the creative tools and insider knowledge to make it happen. No film school required. Just bring your ideas, your energy, and your desire to make something that resonates.
target_audience: Students passionate about music and visual storytelling, ready to turn ideas into cinematic videos.
Aspiring music video directors and videographers looking to build a professional portfolio.
Content creators and filmmakers who want to expand into music video production.
Musicians, singers, and bands who want to create their own music videos on a budget.

Recording the Voice-Over: How to Set up the Recording Environment
How to Talk to a Microphone
Enhance Voice-Over Audio in Audacity: Creating an Audio Preset in Audacity
Enhance Voice-Over Audio in Premiere Pro: Creating an Audio Preset in Premiere Pro
Premiere Pro Tips & Keyboard Shortcuts for Editing Audio
Levelling Voiceover With Background Music and Sound Effects

requirements: Audio editing software (Audacity (available free) + Premiere Pro)
A device with a microphone (could be a laptop or MacBook, phone, earbuds or a dedicated mic).
courses.description:
In this course, you'll learn how to record and enhance voiceover audio. I will walk you through my voiceover recording and voiceover editing process in Audacity and Premiere Pro.
You don't have to have any prior knowledge of voiceover and audio editing software because I will show every intricate detail and walk you through my voiceover enhancement process step-by-step.


Lessons in this course will cover topics on:
How to improve voice-over audio
How to optimize your environment for better voiceover quality
How to record voiceovers at home
Microphone location
Setting up audacity
Audio limiter
Audio compressor
Audio normalization
Noise reduction
How to export audio
Audacity tips and tricks
Parametric Equalizer
Graphic Equalizer
Hard Limiter
Editing voiceovers for YouTube videos
Balancing audio levels between background music and voice-over
Best audio export settings for YouTube videos
Premiere Pro tips and tricks for editing audio


Assignment:
Record and enhance an audio clip using the key takeaways from this course.
Steps:
Record a short audio clip with any microphone of yourself saying a few sentences in the environment that you’re in right now.
After the course, record the same thing but apply an edit in audacity, and an edit in Premiere Pro.
After you have 2 clips - one without any post-production and environment design and the other one with, you'll be able to compare the difference between the two voiceover clips and see the progress you’ve made.


The main thing I want to emphasize is that it’s very important to try out the new things that you learn yourself. Our brains are not designed for keeping information when we don’t put it to use.
That’s why I encourage you to open Audacity and Premiere and go along with me pausing the course along the way and enhancing your voice-over or trying the keyboard shortcuts, tips and techniques yourself as I showcase them.
That way you're going to improve your chances of actually remembering the things you learn when you need to use them in the future.


So whether you create YouTube videos, Instagram reels, or TikToks, this course will help you improve the audio quality of your videos.

Let’s get started! I can’t wait to see what you create!
target_audience: Podcasters looking to enhance their voice-over recordings on a limited budget

courses.description:
Unlock the full power of Runway’s AI video platform in this hands-on masterclass. No matter if you are a filmmaker, content creator, design enthusiast, or completely new to AI, you’ll learn to generate, edit, and enhance videos using generative AI, advanced editing features, and real-world project workflows.
You will start with the essentials - account setup, pricing tiers, and a complete website tour, then dive into core generative features like camera movements, inpainting, background removal, color grading, slow-motion, depth of field, motion tracking, audio generation, and even 3D tools.
Next, learn to craft prompts efficiently, manage your credits, and leverage ChatGPT to produce more lifelike footage. You’ll then explore each Runway tool in depth before putting your skills into action with two real-world projects: a short thriller and a 2D character animation. Finally, we’ll show you how to package and monetize your creations, and point you toward advanced camera-based workflows.
By the end of this course, you’ll have crafted two complete AI-powered video projects and mastered the skills to monetize your work. Join us and transform your video production process with Runway AI!


After taking this course, you will be able to:


Confidently navigate Runway’s interface and choose the right pricing plan
Generate cohesive multi-scene videos with consistent style and audio
Apply professional editing effects like color grades, slow motion, motion tracking directly in Runway
Integrate AI-driven audio and lip-sync for fully polished results
Build and deliver two complete video projects, ready for distribution or sale
Monetize your AI video skills through online platforms, client projects, or ad creative
target_audience: Filmmakers and video editors eager to integrate AI into their workflow
Content creators and marketers looking to produce eye-catching videos on a budget
Designers and animators curious about generative AI tools
Anyone who wants a fast, practical introduction to Runway’s capabilities

courses.title: Amazing Sunset Photography
courses.bio: This sunset photography course covers everything you ever wanted to know about How to Photograph an Amazing Sunset.
objectives: By the end of this program you will be able to photograph a sunset like a professional
The Right equipment needed to take on the shoot
Choosing the best location to photograph – things to consider
Using the HDR technique to capture a sunset image
Using the Long Exposure technique to capture the sunset
Tips and Tricks for tack-sharp images – even when it’s dark!
Download and create the HDR image from 3 separate images
How to edit these images to really make them stand out
More post processing tips & tricks
How to share these images for maximum impact and interaction
requirements: Digital SLR Camera
Essential Photography Skills Course (my basic digital SLR course)
courses.description:
How to Capture Amazing Sunset Images.
Come along with me and I”ll show you everything you need to know, to capture these amazing sunsets. Never miss another beautiful sunset again. Your friends and family will be so impressed by your creativity.
Capturing an Amazing Sunset can be Frustrating
Are you frustrated with the dull-looking sunset photos you are getting with you digital SLR camera? Have you seen an amazing sunset, photographed it and then when you got home were disappointed in the final images - that looked nothing like the impressive sunset you just witnessed?
"Where is the best place to photograph sunsets, what camera gear should I bring along, what camera settings are best & how do I edit these images so that they look awesome?" If you have ever asked any of these questions then this course is definitely for you.
I will teach you how to photograph an Amazing Sunset - my way, creating the most amazing, visually stunning images every single time.
My Sunset Photography System - it works!
Come along with me on a real sunset photo shoot, where I show you what works when it comes to photographing sunsets. Use my system to create amazing sunset images every single time.
This step-by-step video series covers the following: The equipment, location, techniques and tricks for capturing the sunset, HDR, Long Exposure, post processing and then sharing these images online – and getting a great response!
I have even included my original images from this shoot – download and edit along with me.
Short & Sweet Videos Lessons
Included are 7 short videos (average length 4-10 minutes), quiz's and original images that you can edit step by step with me.
Easy Self-Paced Learning
Take this course at your own pace, come back and re-watch sections  if you like, or watch the entire course in one-go. It's recommended that you watch one section at a time and then go out and practice what you have learned.
If you have ever wanted to know the secrets to capturing amazing sunset images, then this course is for you. I reveal all of my techniques here - nothing has been left out.

Recommend taking my Essential Photography Skills Course (Introduction to digital SLR photography) before taking this course, unless you already know the basics of how your camera works.
Who is Brent?
Brent is an award winning photographer who runs a very successful photography studio near the beach in Australia & has published a sold-out landscape photography book (included in this book are many sunset images).
Are you ready to take your sunset photography to the next level?
target_audience: Beginner Photographer
Intermediate Photographer
Pro Photographers who want to venture into Sunset Photography

courses.description:
KI-Videos schlagen immer größere Wellen! OpenAI kündigt z.B. SORA an und bringt ganze Industrien ins Staunen.
SORA soll laut OpenAI nicht nur für Videos super sein, sondern kann auch Physik verstehen! In Zukunft soll SORA als "Weltensimulator" für die Robotik dienen, und sogar die Spieleindustrie bewegt sich in diese Richtung. Ganze Branchen werden durch solche Technologien in Zukunft verändert. Sei vorne mit dabei und gestalte die Zukunft!
Willst du verstehen, welche KI-Video-Tools es aktuell gibt, wie du sie verwendest und wie du solche Videos erstellst?
Dann ist dieser Kurs für dich!
Stell dir vor, wie es sich anfühlt, mit KI-Videos zu erstellen, die das Potenzial haben, auf eine Kinoleinwand zu kommen oder einfach etwas Aufmerksamkeit auf Social Media zu generieren! Ich bin mir sicher, deine Freunde wären neidisch!

Diffusion Modelle, Loras, Seeds und Checkpoints

Fortgeschrittene Techniken und Tools für die KI-Videoerstellung wie Google Colab "Wav2Lip", FaceSwap mit Seaart, Stable Wrap Fusion und viele mehr
Alles zu Datenschutz, ethischen Bedenken und der Zukunft von KI und AGI

Viele Fallbeispiele und natürlich auch praktische Anwendung mit der Bearbeitung der Videos.
Wir werden uns sogar die Zukunft von KI, Datenschutz und ethische Bedenken dieser Technologie ansehen.


Mit vielen Bestsellern und Tausenden von 5-Sterne-Bewertungen ist bewiesen: Qualität und Hilfsbereitschaft stehen bei mir ganz oben.
Je früher du dich anmeldest, desto größer ist deine Chance, der Konkurrenz voraus zu sein. Zudem kann ich Fragen schneller beantworten – also zögere nicht!

courses.title: Creative In-Camera Video Transitions
courses.bio: Learn how to film and edit creative video transitions.
objectives: How to Plan a Creative Video Transition
Film a series of Creative Transitions
How to edit Transitions Together
Learn the Different Types of Transition Available to you
requirements: No previous filmmaking required. A basic understanding of how to operate your camera would be beneficial.
courses.description:
Do you want to add some creative flare in to your videos? Then try adding some creative transitions in to your work.
The transitions featured in this course can help bring life and character to your music and dance videos, travel films, corporate work and more. These transitions can be completed with any and every camera. This means that you can capture creative transitions on your iPhone, DSLR camera or TV/Cinema camera. Once you understand how these transitions work, you can transfer what you have learned to any camera, so the techniques listed in this course are not exclusive to what equipment you have now. The beauty with all of these transitions too, is that the hard work is all done in camera. This means that you don't need any fancy editing software. You can edit these in iMovie, Windows Movie Maker, Sony Vegas, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Rush, etc.
The transitions featured in this course include:
The Whip Pan
Foreground Slide
Lens Cover
Match on Action
Rotation Transition
Tilt up and Around
Screenshake / Earthquake
Push Forward
Sky and Back
Through a Screen
Walk By (This transition can be completed using two different methods. Either lean into completing this in-camera, or use editing to enhance the look of this transition. This lesson covers both methods)
Drop Down
Prism Transition
With that said and done, grab your camera and let's begin filming some awesome transitions.
target_audience: This course is intended for video creators looking for a way to add flavour into their videos.

courses.title: Documentary Filmmaking Secrets
courses.bio: From a 17xEmmy® Award Winner, learn the secrets to make a documentary film. From conception, to completion, and beyond
objectives: Examples and insight into the filmmaking process through my own experience making Emmy® Award Winning documentaries
How to find story themes and the message of your film.
Secrets to help you capture more authentic interviews, un-staged b-roll scenes, and edit faster
Gain insight into what thought processes professional TV documentary makers use to shoot, gather content and edit award winning video stories.
A glimpse into the creative process of putting together a documentary film. From Conception to completion and beyond!

Production / Filming Secrets: Secret Of B-Roll _ Filming Natural Scenes
Relationship Secrets To Book More Work

requirements: This course is for anyone who believes stories are too important not to be told!
Anyone who has a basic understanding of the technical parts of filmmaking
Filmmakers with an interest in documentary filmmaking - short or long form
courses.description:
Your story is important! It must be told!
Everyone has a story inside of them that needs to be told! As documentary filmmakers we have the privilege of bringing real, authentic, and inspiring stories to life. It can be incredibly rewarding!
- - -
My name is Shawn Vela and I am a 17-time Emmy® Award Winning Film Producer, Director, DP, and Editor. I founded a video production company Vela Visuals, which specializes in authentic storytelling that moves viewers to action.
Over the course of my career I've been blessed to work on projects for companies like Amazon, Kayak, SAP, Legoland California (and Florida) Resort, New Balance, Hillsong, University of Central Florida, and more.
I have also worked with broadcasters like BT Sport, FOX, as well as countless independent production companies and marketing agencies. I've directed, filmed and edited more than 50 documentaries for web or traditional broadcast (receiving 30 regional Emmy® nominations and 17 wins).

- -
This course is for documentary filmmakers, like me who push themselves to grow because the stories we tell are important!
In this course I explore some of the secrets I wish I knew about documentary filmmaking when I was first getting started.
Secrets like: how to find story themes, how to build a story arch, how to plan a production, how to conduct emotional interviews, how to build a crew, how to book more work, and more!
- -
My hope for you, is that some of the experiences I have had will stretch you and give you new storytelling tools that will enhance your productions and WOW your clients!
target_audience: Filmmakers who want to make better, more compelling and engaging videos, with an emphasis on storytelling.
Makers of documentary films. Short and long form. Corporate filmmakers will benefit from this as well.
This course is probably not for you if you want to learn about cameras, lenses or editing software.
If you are looking for a creative process and roadmap to telling better stories through video

courses.description:
Street Photography can be performed by anyone who owns a camera. It's available everywhere for everyone. But this does not mean that it is easy. You have to be a complete photographer with the knowledge of the technical skills, but also building up knowledge of human nature. You have to see things before they happen in order to be ready for the decisive moment.

In this video training I will show you what is important when we are on the street. You can learn from my experience which I built up during the last 5 years shooting in the big cities of this world and teaching workshops:
- You will learn how to approach people - You will see how I do it in some making of videos - You will learn about the right settings - I show you what to do in order to increase your social media success

courses.title: Creación de vídeos 101 - La enciclopedia Audiovisual
courses.bio: Todo Lo que necesitas saber - Preproducción, Grabación, Cámaras, Composición, Iluminación, Materiales, Sonido, Edición
objectives: Aprender las bases completas del vídeo, desde lo más simple hasta técnicas y consejos profesionales para lograr los mejores vídeos
Aprende a preparar, grabar, iluminar, grabar sonido, editar y distribuir tus vídeos
Aprende sobre los diferentes equipos, como usarlos y cuales escojer para tu proyecto
Más de 120 clases con ejercicios prácticos para poner en funcionamiento los conocimientos aprendidos
requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa, cubrimos todos los conceptos básicos, pero también es recomendable para gente que ya haya empezado, ya que profundizamos en temas que normalmente no se aprenden hasta niveles mucho más avanzados

Es útil contar con una cámara que nos permita grabar vídeo (en el curso te recomendamos diferentes opciones) pero no es necesario, podremos realizar la mayoría de los ejercicios con nuestra cámara del móvil, y los pocos que no, ponemos simuladores para poder experimentar con los conocimientos aprendidos
courses.description:
En este curso se condensan los conceptos fundamentales de la creación audiovisual, abarcando desde la producción hasta la edición, para que puedas empezar a hacer vídeos con una estética profesional y aprovechar al máximo tus proyectos. Ya sea que quieras crear vídeos para YouTube, redes sociales o trabajar de manera profesional como creador audiovisual, este curso te proporcionará las bases necesarias para ello.


Con más de 10 horas de clases, comparto contigo los conocimientos que adquirí durante más de 10 años de experiencia en el sector audiovisual.
A lo largo de esos años fui recopilando notas de los conceptos clave, y cuando decidí crear este curso, dediqué meses a estructurar y simplificar esa información para hacerla lo más accesible y directa posible.


Ya teniendo los conceptos bien estructurados, siempre me faltaba el tiempo para ponerme a grabar, En esa etapa, a parte de seguir haciendo vídeos para clientes también trabajaba en producciones muy grandes como tecnico de efectos especiales y especialista de cine, y entre una cosa y la otra empalmaba proyecto tras proyecto y nunca encontraba el momento de ponerme a grabar el curso.
Entonces llego el Covid y se paro el mundo, así que decidi aprovechar la oportunidad y usar esos meses en los que no se podia salir de casa y por lo cual se habian parado todos los proyectos para encerrarme en el estudio y ponerme a grabar este curso que tanto tiempo llevaba preparando. Dedique los practicamente 2 meses que estuvimos encerrados, más de 10h diarias a grabar y editar las más de 100 clases de este curso.


Este curso es una verdadera enciclopedia de los conceptos básicos más importantes para la creación de vídeo, no solo para quienes están comenzando, sino también para quienes ya tienen experiencia pero desean profundizar y aprender de manera estructurada. Aquí no solo escucharás hablar de conceptos que quizás ya conozcas, sino que los verás explicados de forma que puedas realmente interiorizarlos y aplicarlos con confianza.


Te invito a explorar el curso y descubrir todo el potencial que puedes alcanzar con lo que aprenderás aquí.
No quiero prometer milagros: sólo viendo un curso no te convertirás en un experto de la noche a la mañana. Igual que una carrera de arquitectura no garantiza convertirte en un arquitecto de renombre.
Este curso te proporcionará las bases necesarias. Con práctica constante y los ejercicios que proponemos, estarás en camino de crear vídeos espectaculares en menos tiempo del que imaginas.
target_audience: Personas interesadas en aprender a hacer vídeos que se vean profesionales por si mismos, sin necesidad de tener un gran equipo detrás ni invertir muchísimo tiempo buscando como hacer cada proceso. Este curso esta diseñado para que de la forma más rápida posible aprendas todos los conceptos básicos del vídeo y puedas empezar a desarrollar tu proyecto. No intentamos engañar a nadie, para convertirte en un profesional del vídeo, te harán falta muchas horas. pero con este vídeo empezaras con la base correcta para empezar haciendo las cosas bien y evitarte muchísimos errores y horas perdidas en fallos o en buscar informaciones no siempre demasiado correctas que podamos encontrar por internet
Emprendedores que necesiten aprender a hacer vídeos para poder desarrollar su proyecto sin tener que invertir mucho dinero en equipo.

courses.title: Masterclass da Voz
courses.bio: Voz Expressiva para Teleprompter, Locução e Publicidade
objectives: Torne-se mais expressivo.
Leitura de Teleprompter mais confiante.
Produção de Voice Over (locução).
Locução de textos.
Produção sonora de peças publicitárias.
Atuação.
requirements: Somente acesso à internet e celular.
courses.description:
É preciso ter expressão para ter uma comunicação muito melhor – esta é a base deste curso. "Masterclass da Voz: Voz Expressiva para Teleprompter, Locução e Publicidade" é voltado para quem quer entender e praticar o poder da voz ao se comunicar. Praticar as emoções transmitidas pela voz faz que sejamos capazes de tornar qualquer vídeo muito mais impactante, seja a voz utilizada como narração, ou sendo usada também com a imagem do narrador. Textos lidos, aulas, apresentações, vídeos e selfies sem expressão simplesmente ficam chato demais.
A voz carrega consigo uma infinidade de elementos que contribuem para sua efetividade. O tom, a entonação, a velocidade e a pausa são apenas alguns exemplos desses elementos. Eles são capazes de transmitir nuances de significado e despertar diferentes emoções no espectador. Uma voz suave e calma pode transmitir conforto e segurança, enquanto uma voz enérgica e dinâmica pode inspirar entusiasmo e motivação.
Este curso foi elaborado pela professora universitária e produtora Larissa Perfeito que trabalhou na rede de televisão norte-americana ABC e leciona em universidades desde 2006. Com linguagem fácil de entender e dinâmica o curso conta com 7 módulos, todos com exercícios práticos para que o aluno aprenda na pratica e perceba a sua própria evolução.
target_audience: Criadores de conteúdo, estudantes, apresentadores, locutores, atores, aspirantes de atuação, dubladores, storytellers, vendedores, pessoas que querem se entender o que a voz é capaz de fazer.

requirements: To enroll in the "CapCut MasterClass from Zero to Hero," there are no specific prerequisites. The course is designed to cater to beginners and those with some basic knowledge of video editing. All you need is:
A Mobile Device: The course is focused on mobile editing, so having a smartphone or tablet is essential.
CapCut App: Ensure you have the CapCut app installed on your mobile device. It's available for both Android and iOS platforms.
Basic Familiarity with Mobile Apps: While not mandatory, a general understanding of how mobile apps work will be helpful.
Enthusiasm to Learn: Bring your eagerness to explore and create. This course is tailored to make video editing accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
courses.description:
Mobile editing is gaining prominence, and here's why it's considered the future of video editing:
Accessibility: Almost everyone owns a smartphone, and these devices come equipped with powerful cameras and editing capabilities. Mobile editing makes video creation accessible to a broader audience, eliminating the need for expensive equipment or specialized software.
Convenience: With mobile editing, you can edit videos on the go. This level of convenience is unmatched, allowing content creators to capture and edit moments as they happen, resulting in more authentic and timely content.
Intuitive Interfaces: Mobile editing apps often feature user-friendly interfaces designed for touchscreens. This simplicity makes the editing process more intuitive, enabling users to quickly grasp and utilize editing tools without a steep learning curve.
Immediate Sharing: Mobile editing enables users to edit and share content instantly. This immediacy is crucial for social media platforms where timely and relevant content tends to perform better. It also allows creators to stay current with trends and engage their audience more effectively.
Cost-Effective: Investing in high-end computers and editing software can be expensive. Mobile editing eliminates the need for such investments, making it a cost-effective solution for individuals and small businesses looking to create professional-looking content.
Innovative Features: Mobile editing apps are continually evolving, offering innovative features and updates. Many apps, like CapCut, are designed to keep up with the latest trends in short-form video content, providing creators with cutting-edge tools for animation, special effects, and more.
Community and Collaboration: Mobile editing apps often have built-in features that encourage community engagement and collaboration. Creators can easily share their work, collaborate with others, and participate in online communities, fostering a sense of connection and support.
Global Reach: Mobile editing democratizes content creation, allowing individuals from various parts of the world to share their stories. This diversity of voices contributes to a richer and more inclusive global media landscape.
Continuous Improvement: Mobile editing apps are updated regularly, incorporating user feedback and technological advancements. This ensures that users have access to the latest features and improvements without the hassle of manual updates or upgrades.
Youthful and Trendy: The younger generation, often referred to as digital natives, is comfortable with mobile technology. Mobile editing aligns with their preferences and habits, making it a natural and trendy choice for the next generation of content creators.

Part 1 - Beginner Quick Start:

01- Quick Start in CapCut
Introduction to CapCut interface and basic navigation.
02- Canvas Size and Formatting
Understanding canvas dimensions and video formatting for various platforms.
03- Trim and Split - Simple Editing

04- Add Sound and Sound Effects
Incorporate audio elements to enhance your videos.

Introduction to overlay elements and blending techniques.
06- How to Add Text in CapCut
Explore text options, styles, and animations in CapCut.
07- Transform Tool
Master the transform tool for creative video adjustments.
08- Replace a Video between Edits
Seamless video replacement techniques for smoother edits.
09- Speed and Speed Ramp in Capcut
Control video speed and create dynamic speed ramps.
10- How to Add Transitions
Add flair to your edits with smooth transitions between clips.
11- How to Add Animation to Your Videos
Introduction to basic animations for added visual appeal.
12- How to Add Keyframe Animation
Dive deeper into advanced animation using keyframes.
13- Mask in CapCut
Learn masking techniques for creative effects.
14- Text to Speech
Utilize text-to-speech features for engaging voiceovers.
15- Green Screen
Master the art of using green screens for creative backgrounds.
16- Voice Effect
Explore voice effects to add character to your audio.
17- Match Sound Beats and Transitions
Sync sound beats with transitions for a seamless experience.
18- Master Color Correction
Enhance your videos with color correction techniques.
19- Remove Audio Noise and Enhance Audio Quality
Learn to improve audio quality by removing noise and enhancing clarity.

Part 2 - Advanced Project Section:

Dive into 10 hands-on projects where you'll recreate top TikTok and Instagram viral videos, step by step, applying the skills learned in the beginner section. Each project is a practical application of the techniques covered, ensuring you're ready to create your own viral content!


Why You Should Watch This Course:
Easy Start for Beginners: Whether you're new to video editing or looking to switch to a user-friendly platform, this course provides a quick and easy start in CapCut, ensuring you feel confident navigating the interface from day one.
Comprehensive Skill Building: From basic editing to advanced techniques, each lesson is carefully crafted to build your skills progressively. You'll not only learn the essentials but also delve into creative aspects like animations, keyframes, and masking.
Mobile-Focused Editing: Harness the power of your mobile device! Discover how CapCut, developed by TikTok, is tailor-made for short-form video creation, providing an advantage by having all the necessary features conveniently available on your mobile device.
Top-Tier Project Tutorials: The course doesn't just stop at basics. With 10 hands-on projects, you'll recreate the most trending TikTok and Instagram videos step by step. Practical application ensures you not only learn the tools but also gain the confidence to create your own viral content.
Efficient and Time-Saving: No need to waste time on complex tools. This course is designed to be short, sweet, and to the point. Learn only what you need to create amazing videos without unnecessary complications.
Unlock Viral Video Secrets: Discover the secrets behind viral videos, and learn how to match sound beats, apply transitions, and master color correction. Elevate your content to the next level with techniques that captivate audiences and keep them coming back for more.


CapCut MasterClass from Zero to Hero" is perfect for:
Beginners in Video Editing: If you're new to video editing or want to switch to a more user-friendly platform, this course is designed to provide a smooth entry into the world of video creation.
Content Creators on Mobile: If you prefer the flexibility of creating content on your mobile device, especially for platforms like TikTok and Instagram, this course tailors to the unique advantages and features of mobile video editing.
Aspiring TikTok and Instagram Creators: For those eager to create trending and viral content on TikTok and Instagram, this course guides you through recreating top videos, ensuring you're equipped with the skills needed to stand out.
Social Media Enthusiasts: Whether you're a social media enthusiast looking to enhance your personal brand or someone aiming to create engaging content for your audience, this course provides valuable insights and techniques.
Those Seeking Efficient Learning: If you want to learn video editing without unnecessary complexity, the course's short, focused, and practical approach ensures you gain essential skills without wasting time on irrelevant details.
Mobile Video Enthusiasts: If you love the idea of creating stunning videos using just your mobile device, this course maximizes the capabilities of CapCut, a tool designed specifically for short-form video editing.
Anyone Interested in Viral Content: If you've ever wondered how videos go viral and want to unlock the secrets behind their success, this course provides practical tips and techniques to make your content share-worthy.
target_audience: Beginners in Video Editing: If you're new to video editing or seeking a more user-friendly platform, this course provides a perfect starting point.

objectives: La genesi: come si sceglie l'argomenti di un documentario

requirements: Per seguire efficacemente questo corso il partecipante deve giá possedere conoscenze base di tecnica di ripresa e montaggio video
courses.description:
Di tutti gli audiovisivi esistenti, la produzione di un documentario risulta essere indubbiamente quella che comporta in genere un maggiore investimento in termini di tempo, di costo e di risorse. Fino a qualche tempo fa infatti la creazione di questo tipo di video era appannaggio esclusivo delle grandi produzioni televisive, che potevano contare su grandi budget per la loro realizzazione. Oggigiorno le cose sono cambiate. Grazie infatti agli strumenti e alle tecnologie che sono diventate sempre piú accessibili, affrontare la realizzazione di una tale opera é diventato molto più semplice per chiunque mastichi un po' di basi di ripresa e montattio, a patto però di seguire attentamente un iter costruttivo che tenga conto di vari elementi che compongono un documentario. Una storia da raccontare é giá un ottimo punto di partenza, e può costituire l'ossatura di tutto il video, che va poi composto con una sapiente alternanza di immagini di copertura e di interviste. Le location giocano poi un ruolo fondamentale: sapere scegliere il giusto luogo per la ripresa, e saper creare inquadrature suggestive sono altri due elementi importanti. Tutto ciò va poi a confluire nel montaggio: una vera arte del racconto nel quale alternare tutti gli elementi con lo scopo di "accompagnare" lo spettatore attraverso la storia che vogliamo raccontare.
In questo videocorso imparerai quindi come creare un documentario da zero, passando attraverso tutte le fasi che lo compongono, fino alla realizzazione finale.
target_audience: VideoMaker in erba, appassionati di videografia, ma anche professionisti del videomaking, troveranno molto utile questo corso

courses.description:
Do you want to master photo editing using the Lightroom Mobile and Photoshop Express mobile apps?
Then you've come to the right place!
The world is moving from desktop to mobile in nearly every aspect of technology and photo editing is no different.
For a long time the desktop apps by Adobe (Photoshop and Lightroom) have dominated the market but now the mobile versions are catching up very fast.
As you will find out in this course, the two mobile apps, Lightroom Mobile and Photoshop Express, have features almost as powerful as their desktop counterparts.
And that too for FREE!!
Yes, that's right!
Unlike the desktop version of these apps, these mobile apps can be used using the following the different options:
Use them always for FREE (some features are only for premium version)
Buy the premium version of just the app itself which is way less costly than the premium desktop app plans
If you already have the paid plan for the desktop apps (called the Creative Cloud Photography Plan), then you get access to all the premium features in the mobile apps too.
As you will find out in this course, the FREE features are also amazing and are enough for basic to semi-advanced editing and are perfect for beginners.
Once you've seen how to use the free features, you will also be seeing the usage of the premium features in the app so you can take a call later on if you want to go for the premium plan or not.
Some of the things that we will be learning in this course are:

Basic Editing like Cropping, Correcting White Balance, Straightening the Images, etc
Correcting the Exposure, Contrast, Highlights, Shadows, Etc
Playing With the Color Panel for both Color Correction as well as Color Grading
Learning How to Sharpen and Reduce Noise Without Affecting Image Quality
Learning the Usage of the Geometry Tool to Correct Distortions
Learning the Usage of the Masking Tool for Localized Editing
Learning How to Edit Multiple Photos in a Batch by Copying and Syncing Settings
Learning How to Create Cinematic Edits (like faded vintage edits and dark & moody edits)
And so much more.
These two apps are only getting better with each update and Adobe is putting a lot of work into them.
It's only a matter of time before they become as powerful as the desktop versions.
This really is the perfect time to learn and master their usage for photo editing.
Sign up right now and we'll get started straight away!
target_audience: This course is for people who want to learn how to edit their photos using the free features of Lightroom Mobile and Photoshop Express mobile apps.

courses.description:
KURS: BLENDER SKINNING & RIGGING
Das Arbeiten mit 3D Software ist in den letzten Jahren in den verschiedensten Bereichen immer wichtiger geworden. Egal ob im Bereich der Spieleentwicklung, visuellen Effekte, Architektur, Design oder "virtual production" – die Anwendungsmöglichkeiten sind vielseitig!
Mit der kostenlosen Open-Source-Software „Blender“ kann jeder und jede komplexe 3D-Modelle erstellen und animieren.
Nutzt du bereits Blender und möchtest deine 3D-Charaktere zum Leben erwecken? Mit dem Rigging und Skinning in Blender gibts du deinen Chrakteren ein virtuelles Skelett, das man im Anschluss animieren kann um Bewegungen zu erstellen. Was genau Rigging und Skinning ist und wie du so ein virtuelles Skellet erstellst, zeig ich dir in diesem Kurs. Anschließend werden wir eine Übungsanimationen machen, in der wir einen kleinen Character mit einem virtuellen Skelett ausstatten und ihn im Anschuss so animieren, dass dieser laufen wird.


Was sind die großen Kapital in diesem Kurs?
Armature Objekte
Bones Einstellungen
Vertex Weights
Manuelles und Automatisches Skinning
Basic Character Animation




Für wen ist dieser Kurs
Dieser Kurs richtet sich an alle, die Lust haben ihre eigenen 3D Charactere zu animieren und mit der kostenlosen Software Blender zu arbeiten. Das Programm Blender ist ein Open-Source-Programm und wird von einer großen Blender Community gestützt.


Der Kurs wurde in Blender 2.9 aufgenommen, jedoch lässt er sich problemlos auf die aktuelle Version von Blender übertragen.
target_audience: Blendernutzer die Skinning und Rigging lernen möchten

courses.description:
Are you trying to get the perfect black and white images but still something is missing?
You are in the best place to start. Get your skills to the next level and create outstanding black and white images in Photoshop.
In this course i will show you something that no one did. I will teach you how to make your images dynamic, clean and full of contrasts.
I am professional fashion and beauty retoucher as well as photoshop educator with well over 5 years of experience. I work with magazines, tv, websites, fashion designers, hairdressers just to make sure their images look great.
One of my favourite and most outstanding images are those in black and white. But it’s not so easy to master it. I know the right way.
We will start simple from raw conversion and I show you to what you need to pay attention from very beginning. I will also show you how to clean up you image.
After that we will jump to fun stuf! I will show you how to get the perfect contrasts - I will show you how to adjust the contrasts by simply working with masks. I will show you how to create and work with luminosity masks as well as how to use color range to work with lights and shadows, how to get the perfect selections and get amazing control over the light - which is criuical for bw images. You will be true PRO in working with masks.
This is not everything. Because I will show you work to work even with most detailed things like lips, eyes, ahir or part of the warderobe. After many travel videos on Youtube that earned me very little, a stock footage agency in Singapore contacted me to organize my video collection and sell it over the Internet. An Introduction to stock footage
Getting started - First I provide insight into what videos will sell. We cover camera gear, lenses, and accessories you will need.
Filming video - We do a live video shoot and teach you how to film video. We take it a step further and cover special techniques like time-lapse photography, action camera's, dolly shots, and aerial video.

courses.title: Introduction to 2 & 3D Drone Modeling With Agisoft Metashape
courses.bio: Building 2D & 3D Models with drone images and Metashape. Drone flight setups and basic modeling with Metashape
objectives: In this course students will learn about creating Drone Models and Maps with Agisoft Metashape
Students will be shown drone modeling capture applications
Students will be exposed to the process of autonomous drone flight for building 2D and 3D Models
Students will learn about Metshape's Standard and Pro versions and the differences between them
Students will learn about Digital Elevation Models, Orthomosaic Models, and 3D Models made with Metashape
Students will be able to practice their own drone models with several image sets included in this course.
Beginning students should develop a very good handle on the workflow process from drone to finished model in Metashape.
requirements: It would be most beneficial if students were already drone pilots. It's not required, but understanding drone flight will be beneficial
Students should have a copy of Metashape Standard or Metashape Pro to get the most out of this course. They can download a 30 day trial of the software
Students should have a working knowledge of legal drone flight in their location.
Students should be proficient drone pilots before they start this course. This course is not an introduction to drone flight, it is an introduction to drone modeling.
courses.description:
This course covers 2D & 3D Modeling with DJI drones and Agisoft's Metashape.  In this class students will learn about capturing images with their DJI drones for creating models.  Students will then walk through the process of generating 2D & 3D models with a software package known as Metashape, developed by Agisoft.
The basic principles of Drone Modeling will be covered in this course.  Capture images, import to a modeling program, aligning images, generating a point cloud, generating a 3D mesh, and generating a texture file.  Most programs for drone modeling follow this workflow.  So even if you're not a Metashape user, this class will still walk you through the basics of the modeling process.
A fair amount of the course will cover capturing drone images for 2D & 3D Models.  We introduce several capture applications and show flight setups for creating models.  If your initial flights aren't good, your model will most likely turn out poorly as well.  So focusing on initial image captures is very important in this course.
We will introduce Metashape Standard Edition and Pro Edition for your modeling process.  While other programs allow you to achieve similar results, their interfaces vary from program to program.  Metashape is easy enough for beginners to work with, and powerful enough for professional drone modeling applications as well.
Ground Control Points and Advanced Modeling Topics
This course on drone modeling with Agisoft's Metashape is designed for beginners who are interested in generating 2D & 3D Models.  While the course gives a brief over view of manual image alignment and Ground Control Points, it does not get into the great detail and complexity of utilizing Ground Control Points (GCPs).  If you're approaching the professional level of drone modeling you will require a more advanced class than this one.
Pilot in Command's Responsibilities
In this course we'll be discussing a lot of automated drone flight.  If you're intending on using a drone for the purposes of mapping and modeling you should have a basic understanding of your drone, the rules and regulations where you're flying, and your personal responsibility as a drone pilot.  This course does not cover basic drone flight principles nor flight regulations, and it's up to you to be aware of flight safety and legal flight requirements.
target_audience: Drone Pilots who want to grow their drone business
Drone pilots who understand the basics of drone modeling
Drone pilots who already understand drone flight basics, and the rules for drone flight in their country.
Beginning drone modeling students

courses.title: The essence of Producing and Directing
courses.bio: Discover the foundations required to become a great Producer and Director in Film, TV or Commercial Story Telling
objectives: Learn what makes producers and directors successful at a fundamental level
Get insights into how you can manage the most valuable commodity on set - your headspace
Discover how to build a healthy and passionate culture of collaboration within your team
Take a tour behind-the-scenes on a production and see the principles of sound decision making in play
Discover how to use the production process to diagnose and solve problems on your projects
Discover a pathway to your personal and professional development through pre-visualisation and fulfilment
Learn how to build a team passionate about improvement and refinement

Introduction: Introducing Geoff Young and The Essence of Producing and Directing
Process: a powerful tool at every film-m: Process Part 1 - there is power in understanding the how and why of process
Process Part 2 - using process as a tool for quality management & diagnosis
Decision Making: the fundamental job of: Decision Making - foundational to every project is good decision making
Collaboration: unleashing the potential: Collaboration - the key to success is in your team
Personal Development: growing your most: Personal Development - growing your ability as a Producer and Director

requirements: This course expects students to have a basic understanding of film-making. Students should already have a good understanding of what elements exist within pre-production (planning), production (shooting) and post-production (editing) in their area of interest.
courses.description:
The essence of Producing and Directing is designed to help you discover and apply the foundational disciplines required to become not just a competent Producer and Director, but somebody who excels in the craft.
This course is ideal for anybody interested in Producing or Directing for
TV
Documentary
Film
Commercial Story Telling
Short Film
Delivering a simple yet profound understanding of Process, Decision Making and Collaboration, this course provides the keys to Producing and Directing in any sphere, any format, with any size team. They are the disciplines you need, to become the best Producer and Director you can be.
This course does not cover things like story structure, screen language, creative development, but rather looks at the universal truths that under-gird the pursuit of creativity in these areas. Written so as to be applicable across the breadth of the production industry, this course avoids providing genre and category-specific instruction.
Rather, this is an intelligent discussion on what fundamentals actually provide a platform for success, irrespective of technology, form or function. Frank and to the point, this course will challenge you in how you think, how you act, and challenge notions of what is indeed important.


"In my 20-something years of Producing and Directing I've seen remarkable changes across the industry. When I first began I was shooting and editing on tape. Now, almost universally, those skills are completely redundant.
The speed of change is increasing. What you learn today, in terms of technical skills, will be superseded tomorrow.
In this course, what I want to teach you transcends technical skills. I have set out to show you what disciplines under-gird leadership in the artistic pursuits, timeless truths that will get you to the finish line, today, tomorrow, and 50 years from now. Skills that will enable you to thrive in any situation." - Geoff Young


Geoff Young has an interesting cross-section of experience, a combination of hands-on writing, directing and producing, then with executive producer roles with network programming and almost a decade of team building within his own production company.
Mentoring young producers and directors coming through the ranks has afforded Geoff a unique perspective on the craft. Rather than centering the conversation around the creative pursuit, he favors looking for the underlying disciplines, the character traits that allow creativity to flourish in any environment. The result, this course, is a series of incredibly practical learnings, insights that can be almost universally applied, irrespective of the specific area of application.
For anybody aiming for long term career success, this course is a must!
target_audience: Experienced Producers and or Directors wanting to explore the foundational principles behind success
People interested in Producing and Directing for the first time
First time documentary producers
Regardless of if you've been producing and directing for decades, or never at all, this course will help get your professional and personal development on track!

requirements: No Prior Experience Needed: This course is designed for beginners. No prior knowledge of film analysis or filmmaking is required.

Access to Films: While specific films, such as "The Godfather," are used as case studies, students will benefit from watching a variety of movies to apply the skills learned.
courses.description:
Welcome to the Film Analysis Masterclass: Themes, Visuals, and Sound. This comprehensive course is designed to deepen your understanding and appreciation of cinema by exploring the various elements that contribute to the art of film.
Whether you're a casual moviegoer, an aspiring filmmaker, or a student of media and communication, this course offers valuable insights and practical skills. We'll start by discussing the importance of film analysis and how it can enrich your viewing experience. You'll learn to look beyond the surface-level enjoyment of movies and discover the deeper meanings and messages that filmmakers convey.
In the section on interpreting themes, you'll gain skills in identifying central themes in films and understanding how character arcs and conflicts convey these themes. We'll also delve into the visual language of cinema, exploring elements like mise-en-scène, cinematography, lighting, and color palettes, and how these contribute to storytelling.
Additionally, we'll cover editing and sound design techniques, such as continuity editing and diegetic vs. non-diegetic sound, and how these elements enhance a film's narrative. You'll learn to combine various film elements to conduct comprehensive scene analyses and apply different critical lenses, such as gender studies, to your interpretations.
By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with a new set of tools and perspectives for engaging with the wonderful world of cinema, allowing you to appreciate films on a deeper, more intellectual level. Join us and transform your movie-watching experience with the Film Analysis Masterclass.
target_audience: Film Enthusiasts: Individuals who enjoy watching movies and want to gain a deeper understanding of the art form.
Aspiring Filmmakers: Those looking to develop their filmmaking skills by learning how to critically analyze and interpret films.
Students of Media and Communication: Students pursuing studies in media, communication, or related fields who want to enhance their analytical skills.
Lifelong Learners: Anyone interested in exploring the world of cinema and learning how to engage with films on a more intellectual level.

courses.description:
UNDERSTAND THE PARTICLE NODES IN DAVINCI RESOLVE 17
This course does assume some Prior Knowledge of Davinci Resolve and Fusion, please keep this in mind before starting. Prior Knowledge of particle systems is NOT REQUIRED.


Particles can be complicated to get working even for the pros! In this class you will learn how particle nodes work inside of Davinci Resolve 17, how to set them up correctly for rendering and then taking it even further.
This class will build slowly upon each new technique learnt, starting with text particles, moving to image based particles and then finishing with video footage driving the particle system. Whilst the techniques are very similar between them this tiered approach to learning how it works will make it easy for even the most novice Davinci Resolve User.
In the intro class we will cover how to create particle systems and what each of the different particle nodes accomplishes. From there we will take that basic knowledge and apply it practically to different scenarios using text, images and video footage.


LEARN THE FOLLOWING
- Particle Titles
- Thanos Snap Dissolve
- Image Dissolves
- Harry Potter Spell Effects
- How to film yourself for using particles


After this course you should be able to go out and start creating your own advanced particle effects!

courses.title: How to Shoot a Dynamic Timelapse and Hyperlapse
courses.bio: Learn how to capture visually dynamic timelapses and hyperlapses.
objectives: You will learn how to capture beautiful timelapses
Take advantage of slow shutter speed to add motion blur to your videos

Adding Movement to Your Timelapse: How to Shoot a Hyper Lapse
Editing: Editing your Photos in Adobe Lightroom Classic
Importing your Timelapse into Adobe Premiere Pro
Advanced Editing in Adobe After Effects

requirements: No previous experience required. A basic understanding of photography would be beneficial.
courses.description:
Adding time lapses into your project can elevate your project and add a splash of character, but what are they? And how do we capture them? Time lapses are visually dynamic pieces of video content that are meant to show the passing of time. You can have a simple, static time-lapse or you can mix it up a little and play with long exposure or even add movement to your time-lapse to create a motion time-lapse or hyper-lapse. Time-lapses can be beautiful! They just require a bit of work to get right and there are a few things that you need to look out for to avoid making common beginner mistakes.
In this course, I will first start off by talking about what a time-lapse is, how we can prepare for a time-lapse and what to look out for, then I'll run you through how to shoot a static time-lapse, add long exposure into the mix then add movement. The course will finish with the editing process. I will show you how to edit your image files in Adobe Lightroom Classic then import those image sequences into Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
So, grab your camera and let's capture some dynamic time-lapses!
target_audience: This course is perfect for those looking for a way to bring character to their video edits.

requirements: None
courses.description:
Do you love fantasy, science fiction, and horror art, but can’t afford (or don’t have the space for) prints or originals? Maybe you have a passion for collecting, but sports card sets just aren’t your thing.
Then perhaps the all-but-unknown area of fantasy art cards is for you. There are over 200 different card sets, with such famous names as Frank Frazetta and Boris Vallejo; and even one dedicated to the grandfather of fantasy art, Maxfield Parrish.
Because so few people are aware they even exist, fantasy art cards are an inexpensive hobby to start, or even complete, a collection.
This guide will give you the ins-and-outs of fantasy art card collection, from how to get started, to how and where to find the best deals, and closing with a comprehensive and complete list of all the available sets from the two major publishers of these cards.
So get your D-ring binders, 9-pocket pages, and top loaders with penny sleeves, and let’s get started!
About the Expert:
Steven Yoder is a published author, entrepreneur, business owner, and avid fantasy art card collector. He has turned his hobby of collecting art cards into a full-time business on eBay selling them under the trade name paperdragons, and has become one of the most recognized authorities in the world for this niche. He is considered to specifically be an expert in the identification of genuine autograph cards from Friedlander Publishing Group, and has contributed extensively to Jeff Allender’s House of Checklists with additions and corrections regarding these and other, fantasy art cards. Steven lives in Arkansas with his wife, cats, and over 400,000 fantasy art trading cards.

requirements: You should understand the basic color correction tools in the Color module in DaVinci Resolve.
You don't need to have any knowledge about HDR technology. I will teach you everything you need.

courses.description:
If you’re here, I probably don’t need to explain what HDR is or convince you that the sooner you learn to work with it, the better. New standards have permanently broken away from the previous era, and this process is irreversible. Almost a decade ago, Amazon and Netflix set this machine in motion, and this year, Brazil became the first country in the world to launch 3.0 television—television in HDR technology.


I’ve designed this training to be as practical as possible. I’ve been professionally involved in color correction in HDR since 2018, and I’ve tailored this training with professionals in mind. You won’t find techniques related to color correction itself, look design, or film emulation here. However, I will efficiently and, most importantly, effectively teach you the essential principles of HDR color correction in each of the currently used HDR standards: HLG, HDR10, HDR10+, HDR Vivid, and HDR Dolby Vision.


I’ll teach you how to prepare the timeline properly, create trim passes, and generate metadata—even the ones that can’t be exported directly from DaVinci Resolve but are regularly requested by content providers. You’ll learn how to export this data, how to generate mezzanine files, and how to prepare files for the end client or any external content provider.


I’ll demonstrate working techniques using real-world examples and entire scenes, not just isolated frames taken out of context. Additionally, I’ll show you how to set up a home studio for 100% reference work with HDR material at minimal cost!


After this training, you’ll be fully capable of professionally performing color correction in all HDR technologies and delivering it appropriately to either the end client or any HDR content provider. You’ll also gain access to our discussion group, where we continuously expand our repository of confirmed recipes for preparing materials and metadata specific to various providers in different countries. This channel will provide ongoing support, especially during your initial projects, so you can feel confident and at ease.


Be one of the first in your area to offer content delivery services in HDR standards. The investment in this training will pay off quickly!


Let’s get started!
target_audience: Cinematographers who want to add an HDR content delivery service to their offer.
Top professional colorists who want to quickly and efficiently learn to prepare fully professional content for providers such as Netflix, Disney+, Amazon Prime, HBO Max, Canal+, etc.

courses.title: Get the best out of people on camera.
courses.bio: How to plan and conduct effective interviews for brilliant films
objectives: Videography skills
Video interviewing skills
How to plan a video shoot
How to get the most out of people on camera
How to shoot great interviews
How to get great video content from interviews
Journalism

Introduction: Meet Julie and the problem with scripting
Planning your shoot: Getting the right postcode - Key messages

requirements: None.
courses.description:
You’ve got a brand new camera and bought a quality microphone.  The tripod is set, the lights are on and a nervous looking interviewee walks into the room and sits down on the perfectly placed chair.
You press record and…now what?
What do you say? What questions do you ask? What do you do if they aren’t comfortable on camera? What do you do if they’re nervous and can only manage you one word answers?
Often, the way people try to get around this is but scripting their videos. However tempting this can be, it can often lead to boring and inauthentic content as well as making the process such more stressful than it needs to be for everyone involved.
Thankfully there is a much better way which will leave you with quality content whilst making the experience an enjoyable one.
For eight years as a clinician in the bereavement and mental health sector, I was able to experiment with lots of different techniques to encourage normal people to talk openly and comfortably – skills that are vital if you’re a filmmaker – and I want to share those tips and tricks with you in this training.


What will be covered:


How do I plan a video shoot?
Should I script the video?
How do I get people to cover the key messages without scripting them?
What ways can counselling skills can help?
Creating (and using) open questions.
How to help people who are nervous.
How can I get the best out of people on the day of filming?
Using silence and awkwardness to your advantage.
target_audience: Videographers
Marketing and communications
Content creators
Charity and small business
Journalists

If you've ever aspired to become a content creator on YouTube or simply want to enhance your video editing skills for any purpose, this course is your gateway to unlocking the full potential of Adobe Premiere Pro. courses.title: Astrophotography: Planetary Imaging Workshop with Mars!
courses.bio: Get hands-on with FireCapture, Autostakkert, Registax and Photoshop to produce a sharp image of Mars, using real data!
objectives: Capturing videos of the planets with FireCapture
Evaluating, aligning, and stacking frames with AutoStakkert!
