Applying final touches in Photoshop
Tips and tricks for acquiring the highest quality planetary image data

Getting Ready to Image: Introduction to Planetary Imaging and Lucky Imaging
Planetary Imaging Gear, Collimation, and Planning
Focusing Tips, Software Installation, and Getting your Sample Mars Data
Planetary Image Processing - Hands On!: Selecting Frames, Aligning, and Stacking Planetary Data with AutoStakkert!
Sharpening, rotating, and edge rind processing with RegiStax
Final Planetary Image Touches with Photoshop
Learning More: Bonus Lecture: Learn deep sky image processing with Frank

requirements: We assume you know how to use a telescope
To follow along hands-on, you'll need at least 2GB of disk space on a Windows system, and the ability to download a 1.7GB file.
courses.description:
Welcome to Planetary Imaging 101: Processing Mars!
My name is Frank Kane, and I've spent years refining the art of planetary astrophotography. Even from light-polluted suburban skies, creating stunning images of Jupiter, Saturn, and Mars is something anyone can do with the right equipment and the right techniques.
Figuring out how to capture and process planetary images is a daunting task for beginners; there are specific techniques for capturing the best data, and processing it involves a hodgepodge of software including AutoStakkert, RegiStax, and Photoshop. Finding good information on how to do it properly can be challenging. This course will show you how it all fits together, and how to create images of the planets you'll be proud of and that will impress your friends.
We'll start with some background on how "lucky imaging" techniques work, and the equipment you need to do it. Then we'll go hands-on, and I'll show you how to capture data using FireCapture, how to align and stack it with AutoStakkert, how to sharpen it with Registax, and how to put the finishing touches on your image in Photoshop. If you want to follow along, we provide 1.7 GB of sample data of Mars so you can process the image yourself and learn by doing.
If you know your way around a telescope but are new to planetary imaging, this course is for you - and even if you've done planetary imaging before, you might pick up a few new tips and tricks. There are a lot of things you learn through trial and error, and I'll share them with you so you don't have to learn them the hard way.
Thanks for checking out this course - let's get started, and capture the wonder of our solar system together.
target_audience: Amateur astronomers interested in planetary imaging
Experienced planetary imagers looking for some new tips and tricks

Analyze Successful Films: You will dissect the story structures of iconic movies to understand what makes them resonate with audiences.
Learn Story Pacing: You will analyze how to maintain a rhythm that builds tension and releases it effectively over the course of the film.

courses.description:
All Killer, No Filler! In less than an hour, you’ll learn the fundamentals of storytelling for movies. This Screenwriting Crash Course will help you get on the fast track to understanding the art and craft of screenwriting. Whether you’re a beginner with no prior experience or someone looking to refine your storytelling skills, this course will give you the tools and techniques to bring your cinematic ideas to life.
Have you ever dreamed of writing a movie but didn’t know where to start? With this screenwriting course, you’ll dive deep into the three-act structure through real-movie examples; you’ll understand how to build tension, pace your story, and create emotional connections with your audience.
This course is designed to demystify the screenwriting process. You’ll learn how to structure your story beats, and create unforgettable characters. We’ll also cover practical tips for maintaining momentum, overcoming writer’s block, and editing your screenplay to industry standards.
By the end of the course,  you’ll also gain valuable insights into pitching your work and navigating the film industry as a screenwriter.
If you’re ready to turn your movie idea into a reality, join Jordan Imiola for this dynamic, results-driven crash course. Start your journey today and take the first step toward seeing your story on the big screen!

courses.description:
LERNE BLENDER
Das Arbeiten mit 3D Software ist in den letzten Jahren in den verschiedensten Bereichen immer wichtiger geworden. Egal ob im Bereich der Spieleentwicklung, visuellen Effekte, Architektur, Design oder "virtual production" – die Anwendungsmöglichkeiten sind vielseitig!
Mit der kostenlosen Open-Source-Software „Blender“ kann jeder und jede komplexe 3D-Modelle erstellen und animieren. Doch das Programm kann zu Beginn etwas überwältigend sein, da es unglaublich viele Funktionen bietet. Mit diesem Kurs zeige ich euch verständlich Schritt für Schritt die einzelnen Funktionen. Dadurch lernt ihr nicht nur die einzelnen Funktionen kennen, sondern versteht auch die Hintergründe, um Probleme selbst angehen zu können.


FÜR WEN IST DIESER KURS?
Dieser Kurs richtet sich sowohl an absolute Beginner, die das Programm zum ersten Mal öffnen, als auch an fortgeschrittene Anfänger. Wenn du schon die Grundfunktionen kennst, aber noch auf viele Fragen und Probleme triffst, ist dieser Kurs perfekt für dich. Du brauchst also kein Vorwissen, aber falls dir trotzdem schon ein paar Funktionen bekannt sind, kannst du diese überspringen und dir die nächste Lektion anschauen.


DIE GROßEN KAPITEL IM KURS
· Systemoberfläche und Allgemeine Funktionen
· Arbeiten mit Objekten
· Modellieren von Objekten
· Die Modifier (Generate)
· Rendering
· Licht
· Materialien
· Animationen erstellen


IMMER AUF DEM NEUSTEN STAND
Der Kurs wird passend zu den Updates weiter aktualisiert. Außerdem aktualisiere ich auch Lektionen mit Hinweisen, wenn zu einem Thema eine häufige Nachfrage auftritt.

courses.title: How to Create a Cinematic Map Animation
courses.bio: with Google Earth Studio & Adobe After Effects
objectives: Create professional-quality map animations from scratch using Google Earth Studio and Adobe After Effects
Master keyframe animation and camera controls in Google Earth Studio to produce smooth, cinematic movements
Import, edit, and enhance map footage in Adobe After Effects, including text animations, trim paths, and 3D tracking
Develop a complete workflow for designing, animating, and exporting maps for documentaries, travel vlogs, real estate, or commercial projects
Gain the confidence to use After Effects even as a beginner, applying its core tools to bring your ideas to life
requirements: No prior experience with animation, Google Earth Studio, or After Effects is required — this course starts from the basics.
A computer (Windows or Mac) capable of running Adobe After Effects and Google Earth Studio smoothly.
Access to Adobe After Effects (a free trial is available from Adobe if you don’t already have it).
A Google account to access Google Earth Studio (free to use once approved).
A willingness to learn and experiment, that’s all you really need!
courses.description:
Have you ever watched a documentary or travel video where the story seamlessly zooms across a map, and thought, “Wow, that looks amazing—I wish I could do that”? Good news: you can. And this course will show you how.
Whether you’re a filmmaker, vlogger, educator, real estate professional, or simply a storyteller looking to add depth to your videos, map animations are one of the most powerful ways to guide your audience, give context, and make your projects look cinematic. The best part? You don’t need prior animation experience to get started.
In this step-by-step course, you’ll learn how to create stunning map animations using Google Earth Studio and Adobe After Effects—two industry-standard tools that, when combined, give you incredible creative control. We’ll start completely from scratch and work all the way to exporting your polished video, ready to share with the world.
Here’s a glimpse of what you’ll master inside the course:
How to research and design your base map for storytelling impact
A complete Google Earth Studio overview, plus quick start projects so you can begin right away
Keyframe animation techniques to bring your map movements to life
Mastering camera controls in Google Earth Studio for cinematic zooms and pans
Exporting and integrating Earth Studio footage into After Effects
The essentials of Adobe After Effects (even if you’ve never opened it before)
Animation techniques like trim paths, text animation, and 3D tracking
Exporting your final project for YouTube, social media, or professional use
And plenty of insider tips, shortcuts, and creative ideas along the way!
By the end of this course, you’ll not only understand the software, but you’ll also have a repeatable workflow to design map animations for any project. That means you’ll be able to confidently create visuals that elevate your documentaries, impress clients in real estate or commercial projects, and captivate audiences in your travel vlogs.
This class is designed for absolute beginners—no prior knowledge of Google Earth Studio, After Effects, or animation is required. Each lesson builds on the previous one, giving you both the technical know-how and the creative confidence to apply what you learn right away.
So if you’re ready to transform your videos with engaging, professional map animations, let’s dive in. By the time you finish, you’ll have the skills to turn a flat location into a cinematic journey—and the best part? You’ll be able to do it anytime, for any project.
target_audience: Filmmakers, vloggers, and storytellers who want to bring their projects to life with cinematic map animations.
Professionals and educators who need engaging, easy-to-follow map visuals for presentations, real estate videos, or online content.
Beginners in animation or video editing who want a step-by-step, beginner-friendly introduction to Google Earth Studio and After Effects.

courses.description:
Do you have a cool/fun/interesting hobby you want to share with viewers from all over the world? Do you have a brand the gets people outside to connect, be healthy, and have fun? Do you love the outdoors and the unexpected interactions that can happen with strangers and friends? Are you looking to take your live streaming to the next level?  THIS IS THE LIVE STREAMING COURSE FOR YOU!
In this course, you'll learn how to stream live video from your adventures in the great outdoors. Whether you're hiking, biking, kayaking, or just exploring your backyard, you'll be able to share your experience with the world in real-time. You'll also learn how to set up your live stream, choose the right equipment, and engage with your audience to create a truly immersive experience. So whether you're an experienced streamer or just getting started, this course will give you the skills and knowledge you need to take your live streaming to the great outdoors!
I'm Jon (aka BikeCurious). I've been outdoor live streaming for 4 years and have over 8k followers on Twitch. I want to teach you how to make your own IRL live streaming backpack. This course will teach you everything you need to know in order to create an IRL live stream from scratch. By the time you complete this course you will have a professional quality live streaming backpack and a good understanding of how to make your live stream into a self-sustaining business.
There are many guides available on the internet for various pieces of a DIY IRL backpack, but this guide is the first comprehensive guide. Over the course of 6 hours of recorded lectures I cover the entire process all the way from your initial stream idea to functioning IRL backpack. I go into all the nitty gritty details so you can understand both the technical and artistic challenges you will face and feel equipped to solve them.
Buy this course and start your streaming journey today!
target_audience: People who want to create a professional looking live stream out in the world
People who want to build a sustainable hobby-sized business with their livestream or build on a brand they already own

Who is your instructor?

Mike Malone is a composer, music producer, and audio visual engineer who has extensive experience producing numerous International talking books series for publishers such as Scholastic and the Wright Group. His music composing and mixing interests have taken him to work in studios such as Paramount and Twentieth Century Fox on shows such as Star Trek Voyageur and The Simpsons. He loves to help students reach their creative goals through sharing his practical, real-world knowledge that he has learned throughout his extensive career.
This course "Recording Voice and Audio for Content Creators" is a fast and effective way to improve your audio.

Begin with learning the various paths to recording that your audio can take. You’ll learn about the affordable gear needed. Mike will show you how you can start with almost no extra gear and still get great audio! You’ll see examples and learn about all the most common types of microphones used to record, and in what circumstance to use each one. Mike will show you the actual gear used and how to use it on the various set ups so you’ll see all that you need to create your online courses, YouTube Videos or podcasts. Also you’ll be shown you how to mix and fix your audio separately and then how to sync it up with your video afterwards. In fact, a large part of this training is how to mix your voice and audio so that it sounds full and clear so that when people are listening to you in a less than perfect environment (like on their phone in a cafe, or while driving hands fee in a vehicle) that they can still hear you clearly and fully. Mike will show you the basics of loading an audio file, mixing it, basic editing and then exporting the file in 4 different Audio programs! Once you learn these examples you will be well prepared to figure out how to mix, edit and export in any other program you would want to use.
Our Satisfaction Guarantee

I want to make sure you are satisfied with your course. If there is anything I can do to make this course better, I’m always here to listen and hear your feedback. Are you ready to make professional films from scratch,  just like the pros in Hollywood and beyond?
Welcome to Filmmaking Masterclass: Script to Screen Secrets; a complete filmmaking course that takes you from concept to final cut. Unlike other theory-only courses, this is a hands-on, step-by-step filmmaking guide taught by a director with global experience in Hollywood, the UK, and Africa, and a Master’s degree in Film & Media Production from NYFA, Los Angeles.
I’ve collaborated with acclaimed actors like Eric Kofi Abrefa (BMF, The Book of Clarence), Wavyy Jonez (Young Rock, The Good Doctor), Michael Evans Behling (All American), and top African artists including King Promise, Darkovibes, Joey B, Sarkodie, and more.
This course gives you the real-world filmmaking skills you need to confidently write, direct, shoot, edit, and distribute your own films; whether short films, feature projects, or online content.
What You’ll Learn
Scriptwriting & Storytelling — how to write compelling, professional film scripts.
Film Production Planning — organize shoots efficiently, even with low budgets.
Directing & Working with Actors — communicate your vision and lead with confidence.
Cinematography & Lighting — capture cinematic shots with industry-standard techniques.
Sound & Audio Recording — achieve clear, professional sound design on set.
Editing & Post-Production — master cutting, pacing, color grading, and finishing.
Film Distribution & Marketing — share your films with global audiences.


Who This Course Is For
Beginners who want to learn filmmaking step by step.
Aspiring directors, producers, and cinematographers.
Content creators, YouTubers, and storytellers ready to elevate video quality.
Indie filmmakers looking for a complete roadmap from script to screen.
Creatives who want to work internationally with recognized talent.
Why Choose This Course?
Taught by a globally experienced director with NYFA Master’s credentials.
Learn industry secrets and workflows used in Hollywood and international film industries.
Get a complete filmmaking education; not just one skill, but the entire process.
Hands-on guidance with real-world examples and projects.
The only course that combines professional experience, academic training, and global industry insight.
Call to Action
Don’t just dream about filmmaking — start making films today.
Enroll now and gain the skills, confidence, and industry knowledge to create films that stand out worldwide.
Your filmmaking journey starts here.

courses.description:
Are you ready to dive into the world of Unreal Engine animation? Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to refine your skills, my new course offers a comprehensive, beginner-friendly workflow guide to creating stunning animations in Unreal Engine.


Course Overview:


In just 1 hour and 15 minutes, this course will take you through the entire animation process, showcasing the workflow to animate a full Gladiator cinematic from the initial stages to the final polished result. I understand that navigating the world of Unreal Engine and animation can be daunting, which is why I've condensed valuable, practical insights into this focused workflow program. (Note, this program requires that you already understand how to import Metahumans and Assets).


Introductory Offer:


This is a great opportunity to learn professional animation workflow techniques at an affordable price.

Course Breakdown:


1. Setting Up Sequencer
- Learn how to set up and navigate the Sequencer in Unreal Engine to kickstart your animation project.
2. Blocking The Action
- Understand the fundamentals of blocking action scenes to lay the groundwork for your animation.
3. Previs Animation
- Dive into previs animation techniques to visualize your scenes before detailed animation begins.
4. Previs Animation Continued and Retargeting Animations
- Discover how to retarget animations efficiently.
- Continue exploring previs animation with tips and tricks.
5. Adding Expressions
- Learn how to add expressions to bring your characters to life and convey emotions.
6. Adding Animation Layer
- Learn to add layering animations to create complex, dynamic animations.
8. Animation Polish
- Refine your animation with polishing to ensure a smooth and professional finish.
9. Final Result
- Witness the culmination of the efforts with the final animated Gladiator cinematic.


Let's elevate your animation game in Unreal Engine!
target_audience: This course is designed for aspiring animators, Unreal Engine enthusiasts, filmmakers, content creators and anyone interested in learning the fundamentals of animation in a professional context.

Welcome to the captivating world of Zero Budget Filmmaking! This 4 hour course is your ultimate guide to mastering the art of crafting remarkable films without spending a dime. We believe that there's never been a better time to tell your stories without breaking the bank. The instructor is award winning filmmaker Josef Cauchi M.A. (Melit.). and the course is aimed for up-and-coming filmmakers.
Throughout this comprehensive journey, you'll discover the secrets of turning constraints into catalysts for cinematic magic. We firmly believe that passion and innovation, rather than hefty budgets, are the keys to creating powerful and engaging films.
From concept to completion, you'll learn essential skills in storytelling, scriptwriting, storyboarding, casting, shooting, and editing with limited resources. Gain insights from a seasoned filmmaker who has successfully navigated the challenges of no-budget productions. We will also cover topics such as free software, submitting to film festivals, and analyzing movies.
But that's not all! This course goes beyond theoretical knowledge. We will collaborate on a real short film project and experience the thrill of putting theory into practice, creating captivating films without breaking the bank. The final short film is included as part of the course videos.
By the course's end, you'll be equipped with a diverse toolkit of creative solutions, enabling you to tell compelling stories that resonate with audiences worldwide. Join us now and unleash your filmmaking potential with a budget of ZERO

courses.description:
### Course Overview


**Unlock Free Lifetime Premium Access to KineMaster**


As a special bonus, enrolling in this course grants you free lifetime premium access to KineMaster, one of the most powerful mobile video editing applications available. This premium access will enable you to leverage all the advanced features of KineMaster without any restrictions, providing you with the best tools to create professional-quality videos right from your mobile device.


### Comprehensive Learning from Basic to Advanced Video Editing


This course is meticulously designed to take you from the basics to advanced video editing techniques, all using just your mobile device. Whether you are a complete beginner or looking to refine your skills, this course will guide you through every step of the process.


### Key Features and Tools Covered


1. **Green Screen Magic**: Learn how to utilize the green screen effect to superimpose subjects onto various backgrounds, adding a professional touch to your videos. This feature is essential for creating engaging content with dynamic backgrounds.


2. **Text and Titles**: Discover how to add and customize text and titles to enhance your videos. This includes everything from simple captions to elaborate title sequences, helping you convey your message clearly and stylishly.


3. **Effects and Transitions**: Explore a wide range of effects and transitions to make your videos visually appealing. You’ll learn how to seamlessly blend scenes together, add special effects, and create a polished final product.


4. **Advanced Tools**: Dive into the more sophisticated tools KineMaster offers. This includes multi-layer editing, blending modes, and advanced audio controls, enabling you to produce complex and high-quality video projects.


5. **Export-Import Techniques**: Master the techniques of exporting and importing media files. This is crucial for managing your video projects efficiently, ensuring that you can work with different media sources and save your work in the highest quality possible.


6. **Saving High-Quality Videos**: Learn the best practices for saving and exporting your videos in the highest quality. This bonus tip will ensure your final product looks professional and is ready for sharing on various platforms.


### Ideal for Aspiring Video Editors Without a PC


This course is particularly beneficial for individuals who are passionate about learning video editing but do not have access to a PC or cannot afford one. By focusing on mobile-based editing, this course opens up opportunities for many aspiring video editors to pursue their passion and develop their skills without the need for expensive equipment.


### Detailed and Comprehensive Learning Experience


While the course is designed to be accessible, it’s important to note that it is also thorough and detailed. You will not just learn the basics; you will delve into each tool and feature in detail. This comprehensive approach ensures that by the end of the course, you will have a solid understanding of video editing and be able to produce professional-quality videos.


### Conclusion


Enrolling in this course will be one of the best decisions for anyone looking to learn video editing without a PC. Do you also want amazing drone shots? Then you’ve come to the right place! In this class, you will learn how to film beautiful cinematic shots with your drone. I’m going to take you through each step and I’ll show you a lot of real-life examples! Let’s go!
What you’ll learn
The basics: in lessons 2 and 3 I will give you more information about the basic and most essential drone settings. We will go through the DJI GO 4 app and I’ll discuss all the controls and settings in this app. Once we learned about the basic settings, it’s time for action! We’ll go outdoors for our first test flight and I’ll teach you the basic maneuvers. Of course, I’ll give tips about what to do when flying your drone for the first time!

Cinematic shots: in lessons 4 to 8 you’ll learn techniques for making cinematic shots. You’ll learn about intelligent flight features, cinematography compositions, and how to make breathtaking hyper lapses! In the end, you’ll know at least 20 cinematic shots!

Essential tips: in lessons 9 to 10 I’ll share essential tips which will make your drone flying experience easier. For example, taking off and landing in your hands!

Color grading: managed to take some shots? Then it’s time for color grading! I’ll show you how to get the most beautiful output from your raw drone clips by using DaVinci Resolve.

courses.title: Photoshop AI vs Free AI Tools - Is Photoshop Needed Anymore?
courses.bio: Side-by-Side Editing Battles to See if Photoshop is Still Worth it—Or Can Free AI Tools do the Job and Save You Money?
objectives: Whether Photoshop is Relevant Anymore?
How Free AI Tools are Catching up to Photoshop?
Learning how to different types of edits using both Photoshop AI and Free AI Tools and seeing which one is better
Learning how using a combination of different free AI tools can do things that even Photoshop cannot
requirements: There are no pre-requisites. This course is perfect for complete beginners also.
courses.description:
Is Photoshop still the king of image editing—or have free AI tools finally caught up? This course dives into a head-to-head showdown between Photoshop’s advanced AI features and the latest generation of free AI-powered tools that promise pro-level results without the price tag.
Each lesson is framed as a “battle,” where we take a specific editing challenge—like object removal, background replacement, color changing, upscaling, retouching, or creating new AI-generated content—and execute it using both Photoshop AI and a free alternative. You’ll see the results side by side, with clear explanations of how each tool works, what it gets right, and where it falls short.
You’ll not only learn how to use these tools effectively, but also gain the insight to decide which ones make sense for your workflow. This course will help you find the right balance between cost, convenience, and quality.
Some of the free tools we explore include browser-based editors, open-source platforms, and emerging AI apps that are surprisingly powerful. No prior Photoshop experience is required—just a curiosity about how AI is changing the creative process.
By the end of this course, you’ll be able to confidently answer the question: Do you really need Photoshop anymore—or is it time to switch?
target_audience: This course is for people who are interested in the topic of AI image editing and want to find out if the free AI tools out there are good enough to replace Photoshop so they never have to pay again.

1.) A full business plan template for a Photography company. The document covers objectives, keys to success, marketing strategies you can use to get clients, how to use freelancers and outsource work to them, and much more. The lectures show you how to customize the business plan for your specific company.
2.) A complete financial model. An 11 tab Excel workbook, that covers everything from start-up costs, income, expenses, assets, and more is included along with lectures on how to insert your own numbers so you can have a budget and financial projection for your company. Sample numbers are included to help you along the way.
3.) A Pitch Deck. A slide presentation template, that allows you to make a professional presentation of your Photography Business to potential clients. You will learn how to customize this for your specific company, to include what services you want to offer and show clients why they should use you and your business for Photography services. When complete you can use this to send out to bid on projects and make presentations.
4.) A sample Wedding Photography Contract that you can use to sign clients up for Wedding Photography services. Lectures go through each page of the contract and explain where to insert specifics for your company and your client.
5.) A sample Portrait Photography contract that you can use to sign clients up for Portrait Photography services. Lectures go through each page of the contract and explain where to insert specifics for your company and your client.
When you finish the course and customize the documents, you will have a professional business plan that you can use for your company, a professional presentation you can use to solicit clients and documents to sign clients up for services.

requirements: No drone photography experience required, you will gain all knowledge about drone photography
courses.description:
Do you also want to try using a drone to help you with your photography? But let me tell you first, don't rush into it. If you are an inexperienced drone aerial photographer, you are likely to make many mistakes. Some minor mistakes can damage your drone, some can result in the drone being lost and never recovered, and some serious mistakes can even cause physical harm to you or others.
Therefore, to become a qualified drone aerial photographer, you need to master some safety knowledge for drone usage, drone control training, and routine drone settings.
My course will be taught in three parts as mentioned above
First: Safety knowledge of drones
I will teach you various safety knowledge about drones, introduce necessary checks and settings before drone takeoff, ensuring that your drone can take off safely without causing harm to itself or the people around it. I will instruct you on the precautions to take during drone operation, preventing your drone from crashing into obstacles or even getting lost.
Second: Control the flight and camera of the drone
I will teach you how to stably control the flight and camera of the drone, and I will also teach you how to successfully complete your desired shooting with minimal battery power. I will teach you how to control the drone for various camera movements. The course includes 8 simple camera movements, 8 simple combined camera movements, and 7 complex camera movements. When you can smoothly operate these 23 camera movements, you will be able to shoot your desired works with ease
Third: Various settings of the App
It will enable you to gain a more comprehensive understanding of the various settings of the app.

objectives: AIを活用したYouTubeショート動画の作成方法

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
■はじめに


こんにちは、講師の川添です。




私は現在起業して8年目。


これまで「人生の選択肢を増やす」事を理念に、
手段としてのメディア運営＆コンテンツビジネスを構築してきました。


そして個人・法人含め200名以上の方へコンサル経験があり、
年商1000万円超えの実績者を多数輩出してきました。




ビジネス経験0の素人からのスタートの方も多く、
0→1の達成の瞬間をお手伝いできることにやりがいを感じています。




YouTubeには2019年から参入し、
YouTubeでの総売上1億円を突破いたしました。


顔出しなし＆完全外注化のYouTube運営が得意で
銀盾保持者でもあります。


クライアントさんにも同様の内容をお伝えし、
月収100〜400万の達成者を輩出しております。






昨今、AIの進化がすさまじく、


「AIを使いたいけれど、どう活用していいか分からない」
「AIを使った副業をしたいけれど、何が一番最適なんだろう？」


と考えている方も多くいらっしゃるのではないでしょうか。






そんな方への最適解としてご提案したいのが
本コースのメインテーマでもあります


AI×YouTubeショート


となります。






本コースでは、大きく2つのことが学べます。




①AIの基礎を学びながら実践形式で活用方法を学び
AIを使いこなせるようになる


②AIをフル活用し、小コスト＆時短を実現が可能な
YouTubeチャンネルの運営方法が学べる






何かのスキルを取得する上で
「実践に勝るものはなし」とも言われる通り、


AIを学ぶのであれば
実践形式で学ぶことがベストです。






その対象をYouTubeショートにすることで


・AIのスキルも学べ
・YouTubeショートの作成方法も取得でき
・更にはYouTubeショートで収益化も実現する


まさに一石三鳥とも言える結果が得られます。








■AIとYouTubeはめちゃくちゃ相性が良い




実は、YouTubeを運営する上で
とても重要なパートである、


・企画
・台本作成
・動画撮影
・動画編集


これら全て、AIが作成してくれます。




本コースではAIをフル活用し
「台本を作成して」と指示を出すだけで


AIがわずか1分足らずでYouTubeショート動画の
台本を出力してくれるようになります。




そのために必要なAIのプロンプト作成についても
かなり細かく実践形式で解説しているので、


AI知識がほとんどない初心者の方でも
プロンプトの作成が可能です。




自分では1時間以上かかる作業を
AIを使えば1分もかからず終えてくれるわけです。


自分が作成したプロンプトで
台本が次から次へと作成される様は
かなり気持ちがいいものですよ＾＾




AI活用においてはプロンプトはとても重要なパートなので
本コースを通じて、プロンプトもぜひマスターしてください。








■こんな方におすすめです


・AIを活用した副業を探している方
・YouTubeで収益化をして稼ぎたい方（副業含む）
・YouTubeはハードルが高いが、AIの力を借りれるのならチャレンジしてみたい方
・YouTubeを効率的に学びたいと思っている人








■このコースは全7セクションで構成しています


1：はじめに
2：なぜAI×YouTubeなのか？
3：YouTubeショートの基礎知識
4：AIの基礎知識
5：AI×YouTubeの動画作成方
6：応用編
7：ボーナスレクチャー




全セクションにワークも用意しているのでアウトプットと合わせて進めてみてください。


ワークの時間も加味すると、全部で約3時間ほどのコースです。






■最後に


本コースに興味をもっていただいた方は、動画終了後に「コース登録」へ進んでください。
もっと検討したいという方はプレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、ぜひ講座を覗いてみてください。


それでは、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！
target_audience: AIを活用した副業を探している方
YouTubeで収益化をして稼ぎたい方（副業含む）
YouTubeはハードルが高いが、AIの力を借りれるのならチャレンジしてみたい方
YouTubeを効率的に学びたいと思っている人

courses.title: Creative Writing for the Screen
courses.bio: Master the art of visual storytelling by crafting compelling characters, authentic dialogue, and impactful scripts.
objectives: Learn the roles and responsibilities of a screenwriter
Identify methods for structuring your screenplay and defining a world
Identify strategies for pitching your script and getting your work noticed
Learn how to create compelling, multi-dimensional characters and story arcs
requirements: You'll learn the fundamental tools of story and character development, giving you the confidence to start working on your new screenplays.
courses.description:
Creative Writing for the Screen is a course with award-winning scriptwriter Cris Vleck, designed for storytellers who want to move beyond the page and into the visual language of film and television.
Writing for the screen demands more than just good prose—it calls for precision, empathy, structure, and a deep understanding of character. This course explores what it means to think like a screenwriter, where every moment matters, and every word earns its place.
Rather than focusing on formatting or industry trends, the emphasis here is on the foundational ideas that drive meaningful stories. You'll examine the screenwriter's role as both storyteller and philosopher—someone who observes the world, asks hard questions, and translates internal truths into external conflicts. Through thoughtful guidance in a series of lectures, you'll explore how characters are shaped not just by action, but by the worlds they inhabit, the choices they make, and the emotions they conceal or reveal.
Whether you're just beginning your screenwriting journey or seeking to reconnect with the purpose behind your writing, this course offers a deeper look at what it takes to create stories that resonate. You'll walk away not just with techniques, but with a renewed sense of why writing for the screen matters.
target_audience: Beginner screenwriters looking to gain knowledge of story, structure and character development
Established authors looking to make a shift into the world of screenwriting
Film professionals looking to make the transition from production to writing

courses.description:
Unlock the power of AI to create stunning, commercial-grade animations using cutting-edge tools like Midjourney, Runway, and Pika Labs. This course, led by a professional AI filmmaker, offers concise and impactful lessons that cover everything from the foundations of visual storytelling to advanced AI animation techniques.

By the end of this course you'll be equipped to produce AI-driven films, ads, and music videos that captivate audiences.

Here's a breakdown of what each lesson in the AI Animation Academy covers:
Introduction: Overview of the course and tools you'll be using.
Visual Storytelling Foundations: Learn the principles of storytelling and how to apply them in AI-generated animations.
Perfecting AI Image Generation: Techniques for creating high-quality images using AI tools like Midjourney.
Advanced Animation with AI: Dive deeper into complex animations using tools like Runway and Pika Labs.
Live Lesson (with sound design & upscaling): A real-time session focusing on enhancing animations with sound design and upscaling.
AI video and animation are rapidly evolving, transforming the creative industry by democratizing access to high-quality production tools. As AI technologies advance, they enable creators to generate stunning visuals and complex animations with unprecedented speed and precision. The future of AI animation includes more intuitive tools, real-time rendering, and deeper integration of AI in storytelling. This will lead to more personalized, interactive content and open new possibilities for creators to experiment with styles and narratives that were previously out of reach. This course provides everything you need to take your AI animation skills into a career in the AI era of animation.
target_audience: Beginner to advanced interested in 2D and 3D animation leveraging AI tools
Aspiring filmmakers, marketers, bands/musicians, content creators, business owners

requirements: This course is for Beginners to Audio Editing!

courses.description:
If you're looking to boost your audio quality for video or podcast, you're in the right place! Adobe Audition is a great digital audio workstation (DAW) that can help you clean up and enhance your audio quickly and effectively.
In this course, you'll learn how to do this in Adobe Audition's Waveform Editor and the Multitrack Editor! This class is for beginners who are new to Audition and those who have edited in Audition but don't fully understand the effects. Here's what you'll learn:


Best Practiced Before Editing
Optimize Settings: Learn about how to change the audio file settings for the greatest quality to file size ratio.
Microphone Technique: I'll highlight key points to how to record yourself with your microphone and tips on how to set up your recording space.
Change Audition's Workspace: Change your workspace to your liking before you start to edit.
Navigate Audition: I'll cover how to navigate Adobe Audition in an intuitive way so you won't be lost.
The Editing Phase
Create Favorites: I'll go through how to create favorites to speed up the process of applying effects.
Noise Reduction: Learn how to get rid of unwanted noise in the background without compromising audio quality.
Restoration: Learn how to fix issues like having too much reverb, sibilance, and clipping.
Dynamics & Compression: I'll go over one of the most essential elements of audio editing and explain the Dynamics tool in Adobe Audition.
EQ: Learn about the different frequencies and how changing them can affect your audio.
Limiters: Learn about how to prevent your final mix from clipping.
Loudness Optimization: Learn about the loudness standards for podcasts and videos.
Waveform Editor Essentials
Learn how to use the Waveform Editor to Edit Quickly
Diagnostics Window: Learn how to Shorten Silences Automatically
Learn how to Dynamic Link with Premiere Pro
Mulitrack Editor Essentials
Learn how to Record in the Multitrack
Become Efficient at Navigating the Editor
Learn a fast editing workflow for Multitrack
Essential Sound Panel: Find Out How to Use this versatile tool
Diagnostics Window: Shorten Silences in Multitrack Before Editing
Reduce Microphone Bleed
Create and polish your final mixdown
Learn how to Export the Multitrack Editor with Premiere Pro
By the end of the class, you will learn everything you need to be efficient at using Audition to edit and enhance voice-over and dialogue audio.
target_audience: Beginner Videographers or Podcasters who want to learn how to edit and enhance dialogue audio.

courses.description:

This course covers the entire AI video creation pipeline - from AI-assisted scriptwriting to generating mind-blowing visuals with text-to-video technology, creating incredibly realistic AI avatars and characters, and producing natural AI voice overs or even your own voice. you'll learn it all here!


Whether you're a YouTube creator looking to elevate your content game, or someone involved in video generation or video production for any purpose, Only now is the right time to learn AI, so you stay ahead of the curve as a content creator.

Whether you're a seasoned YouTuber or just starting out, this course will equip you with the tools and knowledge to revolutionize your video creation process and grow your channel exponentially. courses.title: Curso de Cinema - Como ser um diretor de Cinema
courses.bio: Tudo que você precisa saber antes de começar a fazer um filme
objectives: Este curso visa criar um repertório para clarear a cabeça de quem quer começar a fazer filmes.
Entender mais sobre o processo de produção em cinema
Como fazer um filme

Introdução: Cinema é a arte da paciência
O maior erro de quem faz filmes ou quer fazer filmes
Como entrar no mercado de trabalho
O papel do diretor de cinema
Qual é o melhor programa para escrever roteiros
Como fazer um filme de curta-metragem de sucesso
É o processo que faz o grande cineasta
Glauber Rocha - Cartas para o mundo
COMO você é mais importante que O QUÊ você conta.
Oscar de Melhor Filme 2023 - Uma breve análise
Bônus: Como construir uma carreira a partir dos festivais de cinema

requirements: Não há requisitos.
courses.description:
Hoje em dia, qualquer pessoa pode fazer um filme. Algumas pessoas fazem filmes com celular e câmeras semiprofissionais.  Neste curso você receberá muitas informações interessantes sobre o mundo do cinema que está bem próximo das suas mãos, fazendo com que você encontre uma porta aberta para iniciar sua carreira no cinema.


“O cinema é o modo mais direto de entrar em competição com Deus.”
Federico Fellini
“Se se ganha dinheiro, o Cinema é uma indústria. Se se perde, é uma Arte.”
Millôr Fernandes
“O cinema não tem fronteiras nem limites. É um fluxo constante de sonho.”
Orson Welles
“Os meus três P’s: Paixão, Paciência, Perseverança. Você tem que fazer isso, se quer ser um cineasta.”
Robert Wise

“O cineasta não deve fazer só filme, ele deve se interrogar sobre a sociedade em que vive.”
Jean-Jacques Beineix
“O cinema é um modo divino de contar a vida.”
Federico Fellini
“Fotografia é verdade. Cinema é verdade vinte e quatro vezes por segundo.”
Jean Luc-Godard


“Todas as vezes que vou ao cinema, é mágico, e não interessa que filme é que é.”
Steven Spielberg
“Cinema é a fraude mais bonita do mundo.”
Jean-Luc Godard
“Na vida real, a ficção parece coisa de cinema; enquanto, na ficção, a vida real é, realmente, coisa de cinema.”
Saint-Clair Mello
“O cinema é uma arte coletiva, o resultado final depende de todos que estão envolvidos no processo.”
Jô Marçal
“Cinema não é para entreter, é para fazer sonhar”
Win Wenders
“A Magia do Cinema acontece quando você atravessa a porta que diz saída, e continua acreditando no Mágico.”
Ruisdael Marques
“Num filme o que importa não é a realidade, mas o que dela possa extrair a imaginação.”
Charles Chaplin
“O cinema deve exprimir as linhas de força da existência e se preocupar menos em ser cópia da realidade.”
Claude Chabrol
“Para o cinema tudo se torna uma imensa natureza-morta, até os sentimentos dos outros são qualquer coisa de que se pode dispor.”
Federico Fellini
“O cinema não é senão o aspecto mais evolutivo do realismo plástico que começa com o Renascimento.”
André Malraux
“O Cinema não tem futuro comercial.”
Auguste Lumiére
“O cinema é uma velha prostituta, como o circo e variedade, que sabe dar muitos tipos de prazer.”
Federico Fellini
“Agora mais do que nunca nós temos que conversar uns com os outros, ouvir uns aos outros e entender como vemos o mundo e (o) cinema é o melhor meio de fazer isso”
Martin Scorsese
“Todas as vezes que vou ao cinema, é mágico, e não interessa que filme é que é.”
Steven Spielberg
“A única forma de me livrar de meus medos é fazer filmes sobre eles.”
Alfred Hitchcock
“O cinema só trata daquilo que existe, não daquilo que poderia existir. Mesmo quando mostra fantasia, o cinema agarra-se a coisas concretas. O realizador não é criador, é criatura”
Manoel Oliveira
“Existem duas coisas no cinema que têm um valor diferente dependendo de se as faz um homem ou uma mulher: os nus frontais e o ato de chorar.”
Pedro Almodóvar
“O cinema reflete a cultura e não há nenhum problema em adaptar a tecnologia, desde que não se perca a originalidade.”
Jackie Chan
target_audience: Amantes do Cinema

courses.title: Phantom & Mavic Filmschool 3 - 3D models, Focus, Follow
courses.bio: Master new editing skills, flying skills and learn new applications like Large format panos & 3d models with your drone
objectives: Master Focus mode & enjoy spontaneous autopilot flying
Learn new editing techniques like 4k zoom, editing to music and acceleration effect
Shoot, edit and print mind blowing Large Format Pano's
Create, edit and publish Aerial 3D Models, Orthomosaics, Digital Elevation Models and NDVI's (Plant health models)
Master Follow mode to do awesome tracking shots
Fly and shoot aerial videos with greater confidence

Large Format Panos: Auto method for Large format pano's - the Magic Bullet
Follow mode (Android only): Follow mode executing in the air

requirements: Must be able to fly a Mavic/Phantom/Inspire & Must have read the Phantom manual
Must know the rules and regulations & must know how to properly calibrate a Phantom
Must be able to measure height of obstacles in area to ensure that you set your missions above obstacle height
Must have a decent PC that can run Adobe Premier Pro or Final Cut or similar
Must have the Litchi app (camera settings in Litchi only supported on Android version)
courses.description:
**Compatible with all Mavic, Phantom 3/4 & Inspire models**
Michel Rivet

"wow..more awsome tutorials in this version 3 that complement the previous version 1 and 2. If you use litchi as a beginner (hobby) or an advanced professional film maker these course are a must. I highly recommand them.. I rate the 3 versions 10/10."

Gord Frost

"What an amazing course. Who would have believed, way back when we first bought our Phantoms that we would be able to do such things. Well presented and clearly explained lesson content that allows for "almost professional" results the very first attempt. I am Very sick and very old yet I was successful first time out. WOW! Words can't explain the excitement of seeing one success after the other as you work your way through this course. Laurence you are to be commended for such a well presented course, thank you for making my hobby just that much more fun."
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Phantom Filmschool 3 takes your drone skills to the next level. You will learn so many new skills and techniques in this course that by the end of it you will really have a lot of value you can add to your customers, or if this is a hobby you will really be able to do so much more!

You will learn new video editing techniques such as:
4k zoom: how to use a technique to zoom in on your subject to give greater effect and focus
Editing to music: take your videos to the next level by properly aligning your video and music tracks
Acceleration: a technique that allows your clips to speed up & rapidly slow down to add extra effect to blow your audience away
Then we will cover a new flying skill which is called Focus mode.  It is basically the ability to create awesome auto pilot shots on the fly without all the pre-planning usually required. Often you are up in the air and spontaneously see a new shot you would like to take but haven't created a mission.
Then we will teach you a new aerial photography technique called Large Format pano's. With this technique you will learn how to shoot Pano photographs which can be printed in a large format in some cases over 1.5 meters in length with stunning resolution and accuracy. You will learn how to shoot in AEB and how to do HDR merges as well as pano merges and editing. You will be able to shoot such stunning shots and create such beautiful art that you could very well turn this into a business and shoot these shots commercially with much success.
Then you will learn another awesome aerial photography technique based on the science oh Photogrammetry. You will learn 2 different methods to shoot, edit and create 3d models, Digital elevation models, Orthomosaics, volumetric measurements and NDVI (plant health models) and how to publish and share them. This could also lead to a new commercial venture as these are real skills required by real businesses.
Phantom Filmschool 3 teaches you new skills and techniques taking your abilities with your Phantom and Inspire to the next level. I hope you enjoy the course and also find ways to monetize these new skills and create a successful drone business with them.
After this course you will take to the skies with your drone with confidence and the necessary skill set to shoot awesome pro footage!
target_audience: Anyone looking to start a drone business in order to do large format prints, 3d aerial models, orthomosaics, digital elevation models, NDVI's or volume measurements
Anyone who wants to master aerial videography & shoot stunning pro cinematic videos
Anyone who owns a Mavic or Phantom 3/4 or Inspire
Do not take this course if you have a Phantom 2

Designer e fotógrafo formado no Brasil, Rodolfo Miró ministra cursos de animação, fotografia e edição de vídeo em centros de treinamento autorizados da Adobe e Apple há mais de 15 anos. Foi responsável pela formação técnica de pós-produção da TV Globo no Rio de Janeiro e teve diversas fotografias premiadas. Possui DRT como montador cinematográfico e diretor de fotografia. courses.title: Create 3D Property Tours w/ 360 Cameras + Matterport VR Tech
courses.bio: immersive 3D real estate walkthroughs, VR tours, blueprints to scale, architecture models, and 360 house scans
objectives: immersive 3D real estate walkthroughs and virtual tours
photo-realistic blueprints, architecture models, and property scans
traditional real estate photography for residential and commercial properties

Preparation: Matterport Account, Website Layout, and Storage Plans

The Process of Scanning the Property

requirements: Have access to an iPhone, Ricoh Theta, Matterport Pro, or Leika BLK360 camera
courses.description:
Great explanation on how to use the various camera technologies and I like the the suggestions on marketing. Excellent course! :-)
-Kate (verified student)


Very informative and well detailed. Definitely will serve me a purpose when I start my business. Worth the time and money.
-Emilio (verified student)


The year 2020 flipped the world upside down and the real estate industry was no exception. In record numbers, real estate agents & architectural professionals turned to non-traditional methods of showing properties to potential buyers. As contactless 3D Virtual Tours gained in popularity; builders, agents, and other industry professionals quickly realized that scanning properties with 360 Cameras through Matterport technology was more than just a quick fix to selling homes during the pandemic. It was a technological innovation that would permanently disrupt the entire industry of real estate photography.
And luckily for photographers, these interactive walkthroughs are incredibly lucrative. Whether you plan on making house scanning your side hustle or full-time gig, real estate professionals will pay over $70 per hour of work.
Homebuilders, property managers, construction companies, architects, builders, developers, and real estate ventures all have a use for these 360 house scans. And fortunately, unlike traditional real estate photography, this medium doesn’t require any expensive lights or complicated camera settings.
This course is geared toward anyone starting their 3D property tour photography journey. We will cover the following.


Setting up a new Matterport account
Selecting the 360 Camera that's right for you (iPhone, Insta360, Ricoh Theta, Leica)
Prepping the location before the scan
Capturing a property (single-family home, condos, townhomes)
Photographing traditional real estate photos
Editing your 3D rendering
Learning the Matterport digital interface
Marketing your Virtual Tour to industry professionals
Utilizing Virtual Reality technology (Oculus) in pitch presentations
Exploring other modeling platforms based on longevity (residential real estate vs. commercial, event spaces & rentals)
You will learn how to navigate the dashboard of Matterport, the industry leader in this growing photographic technology. There, you will master the website layout and select your storage plan. Alternate platforms will be discussed in detail as well, based on your own personal use case.
You will select your desired 360 Camera capture device. You will see firsthand the difference in quality and use cases for various market-leading products. Other professional gear to enhance your workflow will be discussed as well.
We will walk through the in-depth process of scanning a real estate property step-by-step through the Matterport app. This includes…


How to properly prep your location
How to professionally scan a sample property
How to troubleshoot your hardware
The post-production process on mobile and desktop
You will learn how your photography business can navigate this burgeoning industry, including industry-standard pricing tactics and how to network and grow your business. You will discover pricing strategy based on different use cases including clients who are flipping real estate, running a short term rental (AirBNB and VRBO), or promoting their commercial business.
As an additional resource, we will discover how to use the Oculus Headset to further market your 3D Property tour. We will also discuss other 3D home tour scanning options.
Want to learn more about this course? Click to watch the video above.
Enroll today! Just click Take This Course now so you can get started right away! And if you didn’t know, there is a 30-day, 100% money-back guarantee, meaning there is NO RISK TO YOU!
target_audience: Anyone curious about creating Matterport 3D home tours
360 camera owners who want to further monitize their investment
Real estate agents who want to impress their clients

courses.description:
I will show you how to create thumbnails in Adobe Photoshop and also on a free online site that is just like Photoshop, so no matter if you have Adobe Suite or not you'll be able to create amazing Thumbnails.


The Thumbnail is the most important part of a youtube video. If no one clicks, it doesn't matter how good the video is... no one will see. It is crucial.
Also, there is not a one-size-fits-all with thumbnails. Depending on both your niche and demographic of viewers, your thumbnails success with depend on several factors; so we'll start the course with research these and thumbnail theory.


First we'll discuss the theory of why the thumbnail is so important. then we'll enter Photoshop and you can receive your free trial (I'll show you how) to follow along and/or use photopea online for free (that's the next section).


As a bonus I talk about titles for YouTube, how these go hand-in-hand with thumbnails and the difference between search based titles and titles for intrigue/discovery.


We hope you enjoy the course and do let us know. This is a beginner course making a good but basic thumbnail; it is not an advanced course.

courses.title: Procesowanie i Retusz w Photoshop - Czarno & Biale Zdjecia
courses.bio: Jak Tworzyć Niesamowite Czarno Białe Zdjęcia - Nauka Procesowania Zdjęć w Photoshopie
objectives: Będziesz w stanie swobodnie posługiwać się photoshopem
Nauczysz się retuszu Dodge & Burn
Nauczysz się pracy z maskami
Będziesz miał o wiele większe zrozumienie światła
Nauczysz się tworzyć o wiele lepsze zdjęcia
requirements: Musisz mieć komputer w systemie Windows lub IOS
courses.description:
Próbujesz tworzyć idealne czarno & białe zdjęcia but wciaż im czegoś brakuje?
Jesteś w najlepszym miejscu by zaczać. Popraw swoje umiejętności i naucz się tworzyć wyjatkowe czarno & białe zdjęcia w Photoshopie.
W tym kursie przedstawię ci coś czego nikt inny do tej pory nie pokazał. Nauczę ciebie jak sprawić by twoje zdjęcia były dynamiczne, czyste i pełne kontrastów.
Ja jestem profesjonalnym retuszerem modowym i beauty, jak i również instruktorem pgrogramu photoshop z 6 letnim doświadczeniem w zakresie nauczania. Pracuję z magazynami, telewizja, stronami internetowymi, fryzjerami po to by ich kampanie wygladały idealnie.
Jedynym z moich ulubionych rodzajów fotografii jest ta w czerni i bieli. Ale nie jest to łatwe by robić to naprawdę dobrze. Ja znam odpowiednia drogę!
Zaczniemy bardzo prosto on konwersji raw - pokażę wam na co zwracać uwagę od samego poczatku. Następnie pokażę wam jak odpowiednia oczyścić zdjęcia w prosty, a zarazem najlepszy sposób.
Następnie wskoczymi na nieco głębsze wody i pokażę wam jak osiagnać perfekcję w doskonaleniu kontrastów - dowiecie się jak dopasować kontrasty poprzez selektywna pracę z maskami. Pokażę wam rówież jak tworzyć i jak pracować z maskami jasności jak i również wykorzystać zasięg kolorów do pracy ze światłem i cieniem. Jak tworzyć idealne selekcje i osiagnać niesamowia kontrolę nad światłem - co jest niezwykle ważne przy zdjęciach czarno białych.
Oczywiście to nie jest wszytsko. Ponieważ pokażę wam jak pracować nawet z detalami takimi jak usta, oczy, włosy lub część garderoby. Poza wszystkim co najlepsze w maskach oraz pracy z kanałami, pokażę wam jak wydobyć nawet więcej dynamiki przez doskonalenia procesu Dodge & Burn. Zobaczycie nad którymi miejscami powinniśmy pracować tak by nie przedobrzyć i nie zniszczyć zdjęcia!
Na końcu każdej sekcji pokażę wam moje finałowe kroki w programie camera raw, który jest niesamowicie pomocny przy pracy z finałowymi kontrastami lub przy pracy w skali czarno białej.
W ostatniej sekcji przejdziemy do zdjęć fashion na których pokażę wam mój szybki proces retuszu i edycji na zdjęciach otdorowych.
Chcesz poprawić swój warsztat i zostać topowym retuszerem? Ten kurs jest dla Ciebie!
Powodzenia!
Marcin
target_audience: Fotografowie

Escribirás un guion con formato profesional, crear una historia llena de creatividad para diferenciarse de historias más comunes.

requirements: Sólo ganas de rodar tu propio cortometraje ;)
courses.description:
Este es un curso muy práctico a la par que divertido. Desde Moviedron creemos que el aprendizaje siempre es mejor desde la diversión, es por eso que en nuestra metodología aprenderás todos los conceptos fundamentales y necesarios para realizar tu cortometraje de inicio a fin, a la vez que estarás pasando un rato en el que esperamos que lo pases genial.
¿Quieres saber qué programa utilizan los guionistas profesionales para escribir sus obras? ¿Quieres conocer técnicas muy sencillas pero que convertirán tus conceptos en ideas generales? ¿Te gustaría saber lo que es un travelling o realizar un retro zoom?
¡Seguro que sí!
En el curso encontrarás múltiples herramientas, ejercicios y ejemplos prácticos que te guiarán durante todo el proceso para que conozcas todos los pasos que comporta una producción y, cómo efectuarlos de manera profesional.
Aprenderás los secretos necesarios de una cámara, ya sea de cine, réflex o de tu teléfono móvil. Vas a adquirir algunos trucos para dirigir a tus actores y que interpreten exactamente cómo tú quieres.

courses.title: Your Complete Filmmaking Guide
courses.bio: Including how to manage and fund your independent documentary film projects
objectives: You will understand the fundamentals of storytelling, how to find the right story and the people to tell it, how to structure and create compelling content.
You will develop knowledge and understanding of equipment, confidence using cameras, lighting, sound, and editing software.
You will know how to plan and organise an independent film production, budgeting, scheduling, to confidently tackle the world of filmmaking on your own.
You will be able to explore different strategies for marketing and promoting your film, find and connect with distributors as well as fund your film projects.
requirements: No previous filmmaking experience required. This is an outstanding opportunity for first-time, budding and experienced filmmakers looking at building, expanding and updating their knowledge and skills base in independent documentary filmmaking.
courses.description:
Many aspiring independent filmmakers, beginners or experience, find themselves grappling with questions like:
· Can I self-fund my films without digging into the family fund?
· Do I have the ability to manage a documentary project on my own?
· Where do I even start?
· Can I even do this in my free time?
The simple answer is ‘YES!’, you absolutely can … and you can do it on your own!
With drive, motivation, willpower to see your vision come to life and the skills you learn in this course, the possibilities are almost endless. Most importantly, you don’t even need expensive gear to get started. If you have a smartphone capable of taking awesome videos, get ready to hit that record button!
This 4-hour straight-to-the-point course will get you equipped with the right skills but will also inspire you to start and finish your documentary film project. It is designed to build your knowledge in independent filmmaking through:
· Developing your ideas
· Building a story
· Giving you the tools and knowledge to project manage your film
· Enhancing your awareness
· Understanding your gear including technical knowledge
· Looking at overall affordability and viability of your film
· Setting up to film through planning and budgeting
· Completing post-production including software and computers
· Initial funding options to get your project off the ground
· Developing your cinematography style
· Creating artwork for various purposes for your film
· Approaching and submitting to film festivals
· Finding and dealing with distributors
· Funding and planning your future projects … just to name a few.
Unlock your creative potential in filmmaking and turn your dream of creating your own films into reality. This course will be your gateway to unleashing your artistic vision and providing the skills for you to grow as a filmmaker.
target_audience: Aspiring filmmakers with a passion for story telling who want to express their artistic imagination through film.
Film students who want to learn from a teacher who has current experience and knows what it's like to carve out your own independent creator space in the film industry.
Creative professionals who want to add video production to their professional offerings.
Amateur filmmakers who want to break out of the mold and start making an income from their films.
Content creators who are looking at creating cinematic style story-based content.
Anyone who wants to enjoy the pleasure of independently creating their own documentary films.

courses.description:
Compatible with all Mavic, Phantom 3/4 & Inspire models**
Mark Baxter
"I just started Phantom Filmschool 2 this morning but had to stop after only the first two lessons to come here and say how awesome this course is! I learned more about flying my phantom in a few minutes- just in these first lessons about heading and gimbal pitch- then I have since flying and searching online the past 9 months. Just the investment of time it would have taken to find this information on my own is by far much greater and, in monetary comparison, WELL worthy every penny I paid for the course! Excellent work"
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Michel Rivet

"This filmschool course 2 is a great add-on to the filmschool 1 both are amazing. The filmschool 2 teaches you how to do color grading in your videos and also you will teach how to do panorama 360 spherical and the possibility to send them to youtube, vimeo and others. if you Learnt from number one like I did you will love this new course, its so amazing. "

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Paul Lakenbach
"The first phase of Phantom Filmschool was excellent, But Laurence Seberini has outdone himself in Phantom Filmschool 2. Clear and concise information on how to take great video with the Litchi app. Great job and I hope Laurence produces more."

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This course builds on from everything taught in Phantom Filmschool 1 and you will learn even more skills and methods to get amazing footage from your drone.

The course begins with some in depth theory lectures on Heading, Rotation and Gimbal Pitch modes. Then we go into video editing specifically for aerial video and tackle color correction and exposure correction for those above the horizon bright areas. We have 5 new killer shots and then end off with the easy way to create edit and publish 360 pano's or photospheres.
After completing this course you will have new knowledge and skills giving you a greater level of confidence when flying and shooting video. Your audience will be blown away by your awesome pro cinematic shots which will look beautiful and well edited. You will also get more quality footage per battery and fly with a greater degree of safety saving your self hundreds of wasted dollars in repairs.

Here is the curriculum
- The theory of Heading, Rotation and Gimbal Pitch modes such as interpolate (useful concepts for mastering autopilot)

- Video editing for aerial: color correction & handling exposure issues specific to aerial video

- The Rise : Basic Rise, Lookdown Twist, Rise and Pan and Rise and Reveal (4 shots in this 1 shot)

- The Lookdown approach (a beautiful new approach shot)
- The Pan (overcome the challenge of trying to do a smooth yaw manually with the left stick - just use autopilot)
- The Selfie (as seen on the Solo - 2 methods to setting up with awesome shot)
- The Up and Over (a new shot aimed at rising above tall subjects like buildings, trees etc)
- How to create, edit and publish a Photosphere/360 Pano (the easy way to do this)

- The Pullback shot: an amazing shot that draws your viewers right in and gets them to say "wow"
- Aerial virtual tours: you can create an aerial 360 pano, but don't stop there: create a bunch of them together and join them together as an aerial tour. Add some voice over and its a guided aerial tour. I will teach you how!
You have a DJI Phantom 3 which is brilliant piece of technology. Come join this course and use your Phantom to create stunning pro cinematic video!

After this course you will take to the skies with your drone with confidence and the necessary skill set to shoot awesome pro footage!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to master aerial videography & shoot stunning pro cinematic videos
Anyone who owns a Mavic or Phantom 3/4 or Inspire
Preferable if you have completed Phantom Filmschool 1
Not for Phantom 2 owners

courses.description:
Introdução ao Capture One
Primeiramente, gostaria de agradecer a você por estar aqui comigo e também parabenizá-lo por escolher aprender através de um curso. É muito mais fácil seguir um curso como esse, do que ficar tentando descobrir por conta própria como fazer isso ou aquilo ou ficar na internet procurando por informações e não conseguir exatamente o que você precisa e no final das contas perceber ainda, que você perdeu muito tempo fazendo assim. Tempo é dinheiro. Precisamos fazer do nosso tempo valer a pena. Por isso, um curso é sempre é uma ótima opção.
Porque usar Capture One?
É o melhor e o mais completo programa de edição de fotos
Ele é muito rápido para importar fotos
Ele é muito rápido para editar fotos
As ferramentas de edição de cor são as melhores que eu já trabalhei, a cor da pele fica muito boa
Ele possui a melhor opção de captura de imagens ao vivo (tethered)
A interface do programa pode ser totalmente personalizada
Entre outros
Dificuldade de usar um software novo
No software que você já conhece, você já faz as tarefas corriqueira mais rápido
Você já conhece os menus, os comandos as teclas de atalho, a terminologia usada pelo programa
Adaptação
Por isso esse curso é importante para você
No curso você vai
Conhecer o ambiente de trabalho
Lidar com suas imagens de forma mais eficiente
Importar imagens para o Capture One
Organizar imagens para que você possa encontra-las facilmente
Conhecer a maioria das ferramentas necessárias para edição de imagem
Exportar imagens
Porque comprar esse curso?
Está totalmente no seu idioma
Você tem um passo a passo em como realizar as tarefas
Ele está ligado em unidades que têm uma progressão lógica e crescente
O tempo que você vai gastar assistindo esse curso, vai fazer você economizar muito mais tempo de edição em um programa que você talvez conheça pouco
O que você vai aprender aqui vai melhorar consideravelmente a sua rotina de edição de fotos
Eu, como instrutor, trabalho com fotografia, já usei outros softwares de edição de fotos e atualmente uso somente o Capture One.

requirements: nil
courses.description:
This course is a Workshop Plan for a workshop that is tailored for art therapy students interested in integrating video journaling into their therapeutic practices. The workshop is designed to be beginner-friendly, focusing on using smartphones for video creation. By the end of this workshop, participants will have a fundamental understanding of video journaling techniques, basic video editing skills, and how to use these tools to enhance their therapeutic practice.
The objectives of the workshop:


Understand the concept and therapeutic benefits of video journaling.
Learn basic video recording techniques using smartphones.
Explore creative ways to express emotions and thoughts through video.
Gain introductory skills in video editing using simple, accessible apps.
Create a personal video journal entry as a reflective practice.
The course is in three stages:
Stage 1 : outline of the workshop
Stage 2 : activities to take place as part of the workshop
Stage 3 : specific topics such as Communication, Reflection and Expression; Reflective questions and Emotional Exploration.
Remember: this course is a PLAN for the workshop; it shows you how to plan the workshop, who it is for, what should be in it.
This is a short course, allowing you to watch it in 1-2 sittings and then devise your own workshop. you then return to the course and submit suggestions, ask for advice and reflect on what your intended audience want.
target_audience: Art Therapy students thinking of running a workshop in videojournalling
Videographers thinking of running a workshop in videojournalling
Bloggers/writers thinking of running a workshop in videojournalling

courses.description:
This course is for intermediate Adobe Premiere Pro users.
Whether you want to learn how to edit and mix audio for youtube and the latest social media platforms, or start your video editing career, or simply you want to revise your knowledge about this subject, this course of Adobe Premiere Pro is what you are looking for.
The course includes 2 hours of video content, spread on 11 lectures. Everything you need to know to start mixing your audio with Premiere Pro is here.
WHAT YOU'LL LEARN:
Through the Essential Audio of Adobe Premiere Pro we’ll learn to understand the audio levels and audio channels, how to use the Clip and Track mixers, to adjust the volume of video clips, to add transitions, to record a voice over, to Optimise and Master the audio


IT WILL BE FUN!
We’ll work together on a complete project throughout the course (all material provided) by building a simple funny video.
At the end of the class you will also find a quiz and an exercise to complete on your own, and you'll be editing a mini documentary about ceramics. But do not worry, you will also find an exercise review where I complete the same exercise so that you’ll be able to double check your work.
MY PROMISE TO YOU
Once you'll have completed the course, you'll be able to understand the Essential Audio of Adobe premiere and to mix a project on your own, from start to end, with professional standards! Join me now and let's start learning and practicing.

courses.bio: Learn to understand cinema and articulate your takeways from your movie-viewing experiences
objectives: The principles of film appreciation

Week 1: Why do we watch films and why study Film Appreciation?
Lesson 2: Films to watch for this course
Why is the Director the most important person for a film?
How many times is a film made?
Week 2: Believability of a film's universe, The theme of Hugo (2011 | Martin Scorsese)
Breakdown of the opening scene of Hugo (2011 | Martin Scorsese)
Elements of Pre-production in context of Hugo (2011 | Martin Scorsese)
Week 4: The Science, Art and Commerce of Cinema
Breakdown of La Luna (2011 | Pixar Animation Studios)

requirements: Interest in Cinema and access to film viewing
courses.description: Most of us have at least one cinema-related story or a happy movie memory to share. In addition to that, we are also living in a world where audio-visual media is rapidly becoming the primary mode of communication. From WhatsApp forwards in the video format, to memes which convey an idea in one image, and now online classes and workspaces across the globe due to the Coronavirus pandemic, the need to deciphering the meaning behind visual representations is imperative. Going forward, it will probably be among the most important skills one can acquire to avoid being manipulated by images, videos, and films. Restricting our access to film and audio-visual media may work as a solution in the short term, but the long-term goal should be to enable children and adults to become discerning consumers of media. With this aim, we seek to introduce you to basic concepts and ideas in film appreciation, which will enable you to articulate your thoughts about the movies you watch. The course will also familiarise you with the thought process that goes behind creating an experience for the film viewer, which is a collaborative effort between the director, cinematographer, production designer, editor, sound designer, actors and the other members of the crew.
target_audience: Anybody who is interested in beginning cinema studies
Those seeking a deeper appreciation of films

courses.description:
Aggiornato a settembre 2024 con nuove lezioni!
Vuoi imparare ad utilizzare lo smartphone per realizzare bellissimi video? Vuoi imparare come sfruttare al meglio il potenziale del tuo telefono per creare video di alta qualità e dell'aspetto cinematografico?
Qualunque sia il tuo progetto, dal video di viaggio al video commerciale, o semplicemente la raccolta dei momenti migliori della tua vita quotidiana, questo corso ti aiuterà passo dopo passo a scoprire come utilizzare in a maniera perfetta lo smartphone in ambito video.
Impara la bellissima arte del videomaking : e' un corso adatto a tutti e che parte dall'esperienza dei miei corsi di video e fotografia che tengo in aula e che ho voluto portare online, creando un percorso formativo completo di tutti gli aspetti. Sono presenti lezioni teoriche e lezioni pratiche in grado di fornire tutti gli elementi sia per la parte di ripresa che per il montaggio e l'esportazione del risultato finale.
Grazie a questo corso imparerai tutti gli aspetti base della tecnica video, in maniera semplice e applicabili da subito, e in particolare:


Come impostare lo smartphone correttamente per l'ambito video di qualunque tipologia


Come sfruttare al 100% tutte le funzioni video dello smartphone, quali accessori utilizzare (cavalletti, gimbal, microfoni, luci, ecc), quali applicazioni scaricare per l'ambito video


Come effettuare correttamente le riprese per dare un look cinematografico ai tuoi video, attraverso movimenti di camera e l'applicazione di tecniche come i timelapse, hyperlapse, slow motion, ecc


Come creare correttamente un progetto per la realizzazione di un video, scegliendo formato, risoluzione, tipologia, contenuto


Come utilizzare in modo completo l'app "fotocamera" integrata sullo smartphone e utilizzare altre app con funzionalità di ripresa avanzate (Open Camera, Filmic Pro, ecc)


Come applicare la fondamentale tecnica fotografica per l'ambito video, per gestire correttamente la luce, i colori e avere pieno controllo di tutte le funzioni


Come montare un video sia da PC che da smartphone, attraverso applicazioni efficaci e di semplice utilizzo


Come inserire musica, colonna sonora ed effetti audio nei tuoi video


Come esportare correttamente il video per le diverse tipologie di visualizzazione (social media, TV, ecc)
... e molto altro ancora.
E' un corso che ha richiesto oltre un anno di lavorazione e che ho voluto rendere davvero completo, un corso unico nel suo genere nel panorama italiano e che si aggiornerà costantemente, per fornire sempre nuovi spunti e nuove lezioni tematiche.
E' il corso adatto a te se:
Vuoi utilizzare i video nel tuo lavoro o per la pubblicazione sui social, raggiungendo risultati di elevata qualità
Vuoi realizzare video di viaggio, reportage e creare dei veri e propri film dalle tue esperienze
Vuoi filmare con efficacia e qualità i momenti più importanti della vita quotidiana o della tua famiglia, per realizzare delle clip da condividere con le persone care
Vuoi realizzare video per far conoscere e promuovere la tua attività o il tuo prodotto, in particolare per le piccole imprese, attività locali e liberi professionisti.
Vuoi aprire un canale Youtube, creare un Vlog o utilizzare i video per le più diverse applicazioni
Vuoi aumentare le tue competenze nel settore della comunicazione, imparando a gestire con efficacia l'aspetto dei video (il corso comprende un attestato che puoi inserire/citare nel tuo curriculum!)
target_audience: Appassionati della fotografia o dell'ambito video

If you've been entertaining the idea of one day learning how to make and edit videos then this course will help you go from not knowing where to start and what to make videos about to being able to transform any idea in your head into video form in Adobe Premiere Pro.


Learn to edit fast


Video editing takes a long time.


It often takes more time than all the other parts of making a video combined.


And after editing more than 180 YouTube videos I got extremely efficient at it.


I picked up tips & tricks to create high-quality videos with Premiere Pro fast.


In this course, I'll be sharing all of it.


You'll transform from a procrastinator to a Super Sayan editor able to turn any idea into a video on demand.


Captivate attention without showing your face


Learn to flatten the viewer retention curve by using effecting editing techniques.


YouTube loves creators who can hold viewer attention.


But the competition is high.


Especially if you don't want to show your face.


I'll reveal all the strategies I use to keep viewers' eyeballs glued to the screen.


Learn to make videos from scratch (even in your pyjamas)


Become the Swiss army knife.


Learn to put any topic, idea, thought, or visualization into the world through video.


It's the most engaging format.


Stop wrestling with the idea of making videos and learn to do it effortlessly no matter where you are or what gear you have at your disposal.


Create high-quality videos without it overtaking your life


Making just one video can be such a headache.


There's so much that goes into it.


It could feel like preparing for a final exam when it's due in one week and you haven't even started.


So much pressure.


But to others, it's child's play.


After this course, you'll go from needing weeks to finish a video to putting one together in hours in Premiere Pro.
