Color Grading Course: 03 Analyse the footage for color grading

requirements: Davinci Resolve, with a basic Laptop that can run the program effectively
courses.description:
About This Class:
"From Zero to Hero" is your ticket to mastering color grading and the business side of filmmaking. This course takes you on a journey from the basics to pro-level skills. Explore DaVinci Resolve, learn to analyze footage, master node trees, create commercial looks, and dive into the secrets of color grading. This isn't just a tutorial; it's a pathway to elevate your filmmaking game. Get ready to unlock your creative potential and become a hero in the world of cinematic storytelling!
What You Will Learn:
This class equips you with the skills to become a skilled color grader and filmmaker. From mastering DaVinci Resolve to analyzing footage and creating commercial looks, you'll delve into the essentials of color correction and grading. Explore the art of crafting various film looks, understand the significance of shadows, and cap it off by creating power grades and Look-Up Tables (LUTs). By the end, you'll not only have technical expertise but also a solid grasp of the business side of filmmaking, making you a well-rounded professional in the cinematic world.
Why Take This Class:
Take this class for a unique blend of technical mastery and industry insights. Whether you're a beginner or aiming to enhance your filmmaking skills, "From Zero to Hero" provides a structured path to becoming a proficient color grader and filmmaker. Gain expertise in DaVinci Resolve, color grading, and valuable business insights. This course ensures you develop both technical skills and a well-rounded understanding of cinematic storytelling, making it the perfect journey to unleash your creative potential in the filmmaking world.
Who Is This Class For:
This class is perfect for beginners passionate about filmmaking and aspiring filmmakers looking to enhance their skills. Whether you're a content creator, videographer, or film enthusiast, "From Zero to Hero" offers a comprehensive and structured approach to mastering color grading and the business of filmmaking. Join if you're ready to unlock your creative potential and make your mark in cinematic storytelling.
target_audience: The classes are for both beginners and professionals.

requirements: Non è necessario nessun requisito
courses.description:
Io sono TazIo Massimi, oltre ad essere un videomaker sono soprattutto un libero professionista e titolare d’azienda.
Ho lavorando come regista per moltissimi spot (leroy merlin, ubi banca ecc ecc).
Creare contenuti social è importante perché è un modo per raggiungere i tuoi obiettivi di marketing e comunicare con i tuoi clienti. Può aiutare a massimizzare la visibilità del tuo brand, aumentare le conversioni, generare traffico verso il tuo sito web, aumentare le interazioni con i tuoi clienti e sviluppare la fedeltà del marchio. Può anche essere un modo di promuovere la tua azienda e ampliare la tua portata sui social media, grazie a contenuti interessanti che possono essere condivisi e commentati. Infine, creare contenuti social è un modo per costruire relazioni con i tuoi clienti, mostrare loro che sei un marchio affidabile e creare una connessione con loro.
Mi sono reso conto che molti video pubblicitari le aziende potrebbero realizzarli in autonomia, ottenendo un ottimo risultato.
Invece, per risparmiare o perché credono che sia difficilissimo non producono nulla.
Lo scopo di questo corso sarà quello di insegnarti a fare video per la tua attività, senza quindi andare ad analizzare aspetti del mondo video che a te non interessano, e farà di te un buon creatore di video.
Analizzeremo insieme le tipologie di video con più richiesta sul mercato e gireremo dei video in modo che tu possa replicarli per la tua attività.
La tabella di marcia che seguiremo sarà la seguente:
ti spiegherò quali sono le tipologie di video più adatte alla tua attività.
Analizzeremo quali sono gli strumenti fondamentali e indispensabili per poter realizzare ogni singola tipologia di video.
Passeremo poi alla base del montaggio, dove capirai come poter assemblare le clip che hai ripreso, ottenendo un risultato professionale e soddisfacente.
Realizzeremo quattro video insieme per guidarti in tutti i passaggi che dovrai affrontare da solo.
Infine ti darò informazioni utili su come migliorare il processo di pubblicazione sui social.
Pronti ? iniziamo subito allora.

For who is this course?

What is the Lumetri panel ?

A series of tools that will allow you to change and correct video for things such as
White Balance

courses.bio: Learn how to setup, balance and use your gimbal to capture a variety of beautiful different shots.
objectives: You will learn how to balance your gimbal

And learn how to pull focus and monitor when using your gimbal

Introduction: What are the Benefits of using a Gimbal?
Outro and Summary: Top Tips when using a Gimbal

requirements: No previous experience required.
courses.description:
Gimbals are everywhere! And it seems like almost every video creator will tell you at some point to buy a gimbal but is it as easy as just throwing your camera onto the gimbal and running around? Well... not exactly. There are quite a few important lessons that you need to know before you start filming with a gimbal.
This course is aimed at anyone that is new to the world of gimbals. I start off by talking about why you should use a gimbal, then I cover the setup, balance and calibration process. I then explain how to hold your gimbal to get the best shots and then run you through a list of camera moves that will give you dynamic shots. Then we're jumping into gimbal accessories (focus and monitoring) before finishing up with top tips when using a gimbal.
It's tempting to buy a gimbal, throw your camera on, power it up and get outside, but just taking half an hour to watch this course and spending a few hours practising and troubleshooting at home, you could end up dramatically improving your footage and saving yourself a massive headache when something goes wrong.
So, grab your camera, grab your gimbal and let's get into it!
target_audience: This course is aimed at those looking to step up their filmmaking and capture beautiful shots with a gimbal.

courses.description:
Kein anderes Haustier ist so beliebt wie die Katze.
Allein in Deutschland gibt es schätzungsweise 30 Millionen Haustiere, wovon 14 Millionen Katzen sind.
Das ist fast jedes 2. Haustier!
Und natürlich möchte jeder Katzenbesitzer auch schöne Fotos von seinen Schützlingen haben. Aus diesem Grund habe ich diesen Kurs entwickelt. Denn die stetig steigende Zahl der Katzenbesitzer ist ein eindeutiges Indiz für die Beliebtheit von Katzen als Haustiere!

Mein Name ist Tobias Gawrisch und ich bin selbstständiger Fotograf. Ich arbeite seit 2015 hauptberuflich als Fotograf und bringe über 10 Jahre Fotografieerfahrung mit. Und ich bin seit 8 Jahren tagtäglich von mindestens 3 Katzen umgeben. Da war es nur naheliegend, dass ich mich sehr intensiv mit der Inszenierung von Katzenfotos auseinandergesetzt habe.
Ich habe einen Kurs entwickelt, der dir zeigt, wie du mit einfachsten Mitteln hochprofessionelle Aufnahmen von deinen Katzen fotografieren kannst. In diesem Kurs wirst du alle nötigen Infos bekommen, die du für perfekte Fotos deiner Schützlinge brauchst. Vom Equipment über den Umgang mit den Tieren bis hin zur Bildbearbeitung sind alle Aspekte in diesem Kurs abgedeckt. Behandelt wird u.a.:
Welche Ausrüstung wird benötigt
Wie sollte deine Kamera eingestellt werden
Wie setzt du Systemblitze richtig ein
Auf was musst du achten beim Umgang mit Katzen
Wie kannst du selbst mit scheuen und ängstlichen Katzen perfekte Fotos machen
Wie erlangst du die Aufmerksamkeit der Katzen
Was kannst du in der Nachbearbeitung noch aus deinen Bildern herausholen
Wie erstellst du einen epischen Bildlook für deine Katzenportraits mit Photoshop
Außerdem erhältst du noch eine vollstände Liste der von mir in dem Kurs verwendeten Ausrüstung, falls du dir noch unsicher bist, was du benutzen solltest. Damit deckt dieser Kurs wirklich jeden Aspekt des Fotografierens von Katzen ab und gibt dir die Möglichkeit, selber professionelle Aufnahmen deiner Tiere zu erstellen.
Dieser Kurs richtet sich an Fortgeschrittene in der Fotografie. Du solltest bereits wissen, wie du deine Kamera manuell bedienen kannst, um diesem Kurs perfekt folgen zu können. Der Einsatz einer Kamera mit Wechselobjektiv und Blitzschuh (bspw. DSLR oder Systemkamera) ist bei diesem Kurs von Vorteil.

Ich freue mich darauf, dich mit meinem Wissen in der Fotografie nach Vorne zu bringen!
target_audience: Amateurfotografen, die lernen wollen, Katzen professionell zu fotografieren.
Hobbyfotografen, die gerne Tiere wie Katzen professionell fotografieren wollen.
Katzenbesitzer mit Kameraausrüstung, die gerne professionelle Bilder Ihrer Haustiere machen möchten.
Profifotografen, die gerne Katzenfotografie Ihren Kunden anbieten möchten.

courses.description:
Olá, meu nome é Mauricio Pires Kalfelz, tenho mais de 15 anos de experiência em edição de imagens, tanto de PhotoShop quanto LightRoom, e por mais de 8 anos fui fotógrafo social, o que me ajudou sobremaneira em melhorar minhas edições.
Esse curso é para todos, iniciantes e profissionais da área de edição de imagens, mas, principalmente, para quem é fotógrafo ou edita para fotógrafos e tem um dia-a-dia corrido, precisando de uma edição rápida e com qualidade profissional.
Tempo é dinheiro, por que no diário de um fotógrafo ou de um profissional de edição não temos o tempo hábil para passar horas para editar uma foto, na verdade não podemos nos dar ao luxo de passar nem 10 minutos em uma foto, tempo é dinheiro e o fluxo de imagens é sempre enorme.
No curso usarei o PhotoShop CC 2021, todavia se pode utilizar qualquer versão do PhotoShop da CC 2018 em diante para o curso sem problemas algum.
NewBorn, tratamento completo desde as diferenças de tom na pele até a remoção das bolinhas, manchas. Iremos deixar as fotos como um sonho.
Gestante, eu mostrarei técnicas de como diminuir ou aumentar partes do corpo, bem como tratamento de estrias e manchas, além de tudo o mais para deixar a foto sensacional.
15 Anos e Casamentos, principalmente sobre cor, luz, sombras, HDR e formas de valorizar cada cenário, levando as fotos ao seu potencial máximo.
Configurar o Photoshop, os atalhos, os actions (que nada mais são do que uma sequência de passos previamente gravados que podem ser executados a qualquer momento, em qualquer imagem).
HDR, técnicas de como usar sem abusar, contudo forçando a imagem ao seu máximo.
Recortes, tanto de corpo quanto de cabelo; chega de procurar, darei a ferramenta definitiva.
Câmera RAW do Photoshop, com imagens em JPG ou RAW, a poderosa ferramenta.
Seleção de objetos e os truques para ser efetivo.
Ferramentas novas do Photoshop CC 2020 e 2021.
Vamos trocar Trocar o céu de fotos, adicionar gaivotas em Book na praia, adicionar efeito de luzes desfocadas em fotos
Veremos muito mais coisas no decorrer do curso.
Você vai aprender mais de uma forma de edição de pele, de remoção de manchas, de remoção de espinhas, clareamento de dentes, diminuir e aumentar medidas corporais, efeitos de sombras para dar volume, devolver foco em imagens desfocadas, tratamento de cor, tratamento de luz e sombras, recorte de cabelo, criar actions.

courses.bio: Vrewの編集ソフトを使えばアナログな人でもプロが作ったような動画編集が簡単にできるようになります。そしてワンクリックで字幕、翻訳までできちゃいます。
objectives: PC苦手なアナログな人でも簡単にプロ並みの編集ができるようになる
ワンクリックで字幕が付けられるようになり、動画にインパクトがつく
動画をテキスト化して編集するので編集時間が大幅に短縮できる
字幕は日本語、英語などにも簡単に翻訳できるのであなたのビジネスが世界を視野することができる
requirements: 超アナログな方向けですので難しい専門用語もないので安心してください。
courses.description:
この動画は超アナログでPC苦手な方向けに作ったものですので超アナログな方以外は見ないでくださいね
この動画は私自身が超アナログで何度もチャレンジしたけど出来なかった悔しい思いをして他ので動画発信したいけど私と同じように困ってる方が沢山いるのではいないかと思いこの動画を作りました。
ですので、難しいこと、専門用語も一切ないです。わかりやすい言葉で説明していますのでどうぞ安心してくださいね


動画編集ってプロがやる事で素人は難しくて出来ないイメージがありますが、最近では驚くくらい簡単に編集が出来て、さらに効果的な演出もできるアプリが沢山あります。
私も携帯で簡単にできるアプリを見つけ前回の自撮り動画の編集をしてましたが、今回は使うVrewは私が今まで使ってたアプリ以上に簡単な操作で編集ができるので作業時間が大幅に短縮できます。これは嬉しい事です。短縮した分他の動画を作成する時間に使えるようになりました。しかもAIが動画の字幕まで作ってくれて英語などの外国語に翻訳がワンクリックでできちゃいます。これは画期的！経済的！　今まで翻訳するには専門家に依頼しなければ出来なかったので高額な費用が掛かっていましたが、ワンクリックで翻訳ができちゃいます。


今まで、動画を作って発信したくてもアナログで難しいことが出来ないと諦めていた方
もう諦めなくて大丈夫です。
超アナログな私でも出来たのであなたも絶対にできるようになりますので、じっくりゆっくり諦めずに動画を見て真似していくだけで簡単に編集できるようになります。
編集ってできるようになるととっても楽しくって没頭しちゃいます。
イメージを膨らませてこんな素敵な動画を作りたいってワクワクしながらやってると想像以上に素晴らしい動画が完成して、これが自分ができたのかと感動してしまいますよ
楽しい編集作業時間になることをお祈りしてます。
target_audience: アナログでPC苦手だけど自分で動画編集して発信していきたい方

courses.title: Advanced Hollywood Screenwriting for Professionals
courses.bio: Learn how to make your good story great!
objectives: Understand the purpose of Theme in Story
Understand how Characters move Story
Understand how Plot builds Story
Understand how to get people to read your Story
requirements: Knowing the fundamentals of screenwriting and screenplay format
courses.description:
This course is about the advanced screenwriting process. These lessons are intended for writers who already understand the basics of screenwriting and story telling, and want to enhance their skillset beyond the fundamentals. This course does not require any specific software or product, and these lessons can be applied to any type of writing for visual media. We will discuss are the philosophies and concepts that make a story work, and the tools you need to tell the story well. We will cover the concept of story, and how it differs from plot. We will talk about your story’s theme, and how you can make it universal. We will cover characters, and discuss what gives them dimension, and how you can give them rich inner lives. We will discuss points of view, tragic flaws, and how you can make your characters into roles that actors will want to play. We will discuss how you can build your story around a plot framework, how to build stakes into your plot to raise tension and excite your audiences, and how you can introduce and use the concept of failure to make audiences invest in your story with every scene.


Finally, we will talk about exhibition, and how we can get your story in front of people. The industry and technology move and change quickly, but there are certain principles that remain the same, and we will discuss how you can use them to get your screenplay in front of the right people to put it on screen and in front of audiences.


In the end, this course will better equip you to create a good story, and tell it well.
target_audience: Intermediate and advanced writers interested in writing stronger screenplays

courses.title: Drone - da zero alle riprese con movimenti cinematografici

objectives: impareranno a volare con i droni da 0 fino ad un livello professionale
impareranno movimenti di volo da applicare alle riprese cinematografiche
requirements: tutti possono imparare a pilotare un drone
courses.description:
Qualsiasi volo andrete a fare, sia per divertimento che per professione, dovrà avere una caratteristica imprescindibile; la registrazione video e quindi il filmato risultante dovrà essere bello da vedere e dovrà creare emozione.
Questo percorso permetterà la conoscenza del drone, dal suo approccio iniziale, connessione con l'APP di riferimento, gestione delle batterie, esercizi pratici di allenamento, sicurezza del velivolo fino ad arrivare all'analisi dei movimenti importanti nel mondo cinematografico.
Quindi lo scopo finale sarà di farvi imparare a volare e realizzare video con approccio e gusto cinematografico.
Imparerete da zero a gestire il volo sia dal punto di vista tecnico che artistico.
Imparerete i movimenti base su cui si costruisce una ripresa cinematografica aerea.
Si analizzeranno i filmati reali e verrà descritta la tecnica di realizzazione in modo semplice, così che possiate allenarvi per replicarli.
Solo così chi guarderà il vostro video finale, i vostri amici o i vostri committenti, saranno pienamente soddisfatti del risultato.
Ricordate che sempre di più il drone viene utilizzato nel cinema, eventi sportivi, spot pubblicitari, cultura, documentari ed in campo industriale.
Saper volare con competenza e professionalità vi farà divertire e vi darà una soddisfazione che non potete immaginare.
Con questo corso imparerete tutto questo con esempi pratici e semplicità.
Quindi pronti per iniziare la vostra nuova avventura!

courses.title: Mastering Composition: Create Visually Stunning Shots
courses.bio: Composition Beyond the Frame
objectives: Understand Composition Fundamentals
Effectively Frame Subjects
Master Distance and Perspective
Use Leading Lines and Compositional Flow
Aspect Ratios for Creative Impact
Light and Color for Stronger Visuals

Identify and Fix Compositional Distractions

Beyond the Frame: Use the Background to Your Advantage
Bringing It All Together: Breaking Down Composition: Photography Examples Explained

requirements: A camera, smartphone, or digital drawing tools
courses.description:
Great composition isn’t just about what’s inside the frame, it’s about how you guide the viewer’s eye, create emotion, and tell a compelling visual story.
Composition is the foundation of every great shot. It’s what makes a photograph, painting, or film frame feel powerful, balanced, and engaging. No matter how advanced your camera or artistic skills are, strong composition is what truly sets great visuals apart.
This course is a complete guide to mastering composition for photography, video, and art. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced creative.
We will cover everything from where to place your camera, the best angles to use, and how to frame your subject, to thinking beyond the frame itself.
You’ll learn how to:
- Position your camera or eye to instantly improve your shots.
- Apply essential composition techniques like framing, leading lines, and focal length distortion.
- How to use light to enhance your shots.
- How to use color to enhance your shots.
- Master movement and depth to create dynamic and engaging visuals.
- Identify and fix distractions for cleaner, more compelling compositions.
- Understand the emotional impact of angles.
- Balance negative and positive space to create more harmonious and intentional visuals.
- Experiment with different aspect ratios and understand their unique effects.
- Think beyond the frame. using elements outside the visible scene to influence perception and storytelling.
- Develop your creative eye and train yourself to see composition in everyday life.
At the end I personally added a lot of real-world examples with detailed explanations to help you understand composition in action.
By the end of this course, you'll be able to confidently compose stunning visuals across any medium, from photography and film to painting and digital art.
target_audience: Photographers
Filmmakers
Artists
Content creators
Video storytellers

courses.description:
TV news reporting is one of the most glamorous jobs in journalism, offering you the chance to witness history first-hand and to rub shoulders with those who create it.
It can be a genuinely exciting profession which could see you covering a terrorist attack one week and reporting on a war the next. In fact, it’s one of the few jobs in the world which makes you feel privileged and honoured to be doing it.
However, TV news reporting is also demanding, tiring, high-pressured and it carries a huge weight of responsibility.
This course will teach you what mindset you need to be the next John Simpson or Laura Kuenssberg. It will also teach you the editorial and technical skills you need to succeed in this most high-profile yet demanding of jobs.
This course would be suitable for anybody looking to break into TV news with a traditional local, national or international broadcaster. It would also be suitable for anybody who would like to make professional videos for their websites or social media pages.
The most important requirements for this course are a love of current affairs, a positive attitude, a willingness to learn, and good English language ability. By the end of this course, you will possess the skills and knowledge to harness the power of AI to create captivating films with ease and efficiency.

courses.description:
Fast jeder macht heute digitale Fotos oder verwendet sie in irgendeiner Form. Sei es für Fotobücher, Grußkarten, Webseiten, Präsentationen und vieles mehr.
Doch manchmal stören Kleinigkeiten auf einem Foto oder man möchte etwas auf einem Bild hervorheben. Da kommt dann die Fotobearbeitung ins Spiel. Früher nur etwas für Profis, kann heute jeder Laie Fotos bearbeiten. Dieser Kurs bietet speziell für Anfänger eine umfassende Einführung in dieses spannende Gebiet.
Dazu wird das unkomplizierte und kostenlose Windows Programm Paint.NET verwendet. Im Kursverlauf wird zuerst das Programm allgemein kurz vorgestellt. Danach werden aber alle grundsätzlichen Funktionen und Werkzeuge anhand von konkreten Fotobearbeitungen demonstriert. So kann man tatsächlich ganz entspannt, Bild für Bild in die Bildbearbeitung einsteigen.
Die Fotos werden alle zur Verfügung gestellt und ermöglichen das genaue Nacharbeiten der Lektionsinhalte.
Wer also an der Fotobearbeitung interessiert ist, findet mit diesem Kurs einen leichten und sehr praktischen Einstieg.
target_audience: Dieser Kurs richtet sich an Anfänger ohne Erfahrung in der digitalen Fotobearbeitung.

objectives: Understand the fundamentals of screenplay formatting for spec scripts in the film industry.

requirements: Basic understanding of storytelling: It's important to have a foundational understanding of storytelling principles, character development, and plot structure.
Familiarity with screenplay format: While we will cover screenplay formatting extensively in the course, having a basic understanding of industry-standard screenplay format is recommended.
Access to screenwriting software: You will need access to any screenwriting software such as Final Draft or Celtx to complete exercises.
Writing proficiency: A good command of the English language, including grammar, spelling, and punctuation, is necessary for effective communication and scriptwriting.
Commitment and dedication: This course requires active engagement, participation, and the ability to meet deadlines. A strong work ethic and perseverance are essential.
courses.description:
The Best Screenplay Formatting Course
Save the Format, Kill the Errors


In the competitive world of filmmaking, proper screenplay formatting isn’t just a technicality—it’s your first step toward industry recognition. A poorly formatted script can sink your chances before a single page is read. But with "The Best Screenplay Formatting Course," you’ll master the essential skills to present your story like a pro.


Taught by Goran Zivanovic, an experienced screenwriting instructor, this course simplifies industry-standard formatting into practical, step-by-step lessons. Whether you're new to screenwriting or refining your craft, you’ll learn how to:


Format scene headings, action lines, and dialogue like a professional.
Use visual storytelling and subtext to strengthen your script.
Avoid common formatting mistakes that frustrate directors and producers.
Adapt your screenplay for film, television, and streaming platforms.
Stay ahead of modern industry trends to give your script a competitive edge.


This course is the perfect companion to The Best Screenplay Formatting Book (official release date 7th of April 2025), offering hands-on exercises and real-world examples that bring formatting principles to life.


By the end, you’ll have the confidence to format screenplays that stand out, sell, and survive the brutal submission process.


Ready to format like a pro? Enrol now and take your script from amateur to industry-ready!
target_audience: This course is specifically designed for aspiring screenwriters and individuals interested in the film industry. Whether you're a beginner who wants to learn the foundations of screenplay formatting or an experienced writer looking to refine your skills, this course is for you. We focus specifically on spec script writing, providing valuable insights and techniques to help you create a compelling screenplay that captures the attention of industry professionals. No matter where you are in your screenwriting journey, this course will empower you to master the art of screenplay formatting for spec scripts.

Sure they want to help, but they just don't have the time to sit you down and tell you all the stuff you really need to know in order to create a great video to represent your company. courses.bio: Learn how to start with underwater photography and take beautiful photos.
objectives: Basic knowledge of light physics in the context of underwater photography with drawings and easy explanations
How do I choose the optimal equipment for underwater photography? What features are important? How do I prepare my kit for work?

courses.description:
In this course you will learn everything about underwater photography from the beginning.


First, I'll tell you what the difference is between water and air and why underwater photography is difficult. How vision and colors change and what distortions are introduced by the water-air environment.
In the following steps, you'll learn how to properly select underwater photography equipment: housings, cameras. What features it should have, and what's important.
I will also talk a lot about lighting, because it is one of the most important elements of underwater photography.
I will also tell you how to prepare your equipment for underwater work to ensure the optimal set-up.
Some topics are expanded on because I believe they're important in underwater photography, and many beginner photographers aren't aware of them. I went through this myself once, learning from my mistakes. I hope your path is easier.


The course includes many original drawings and photos illustrating the topics covered.
English is not my primary language, so I sometimes make mistakes, but this makes the course understandable to everyone :)
If you have any comments about the course or topics you'd like me to cover, please let me know.


All photos published in course are taken by me :)
target_audience: For scuba divers and free divers who want to share their passion by showing photos of the underwater world

courses.bio: Your perfect introduction to your first independent film

How do I and my film become visible?

How do I find ideas for my scrip / film

Einführung: How do I find an outstanding idea?
How do I write my script?
How do I calculate correctly and find investors?
Which actor / actress is the right one?
The outdoor shoot and the shoot in the studio
How do I publicize my film?

requirements: You have to have a desire to achieve big films
courses.description:
Do you struggle with funding your film project? Uncertain about budgeting? Wondering how to cultivate that Hollywood-ready idea?
This masterclass is the key to unlocking these questions and more. Let's dive right in.


Crafting Your Story
Ever wondered how to come up with a compelling story? We'll explore the creative process behind story development, helping you discover the narrative gems that will captivate your audience.


Organizing Your Screenplay
Screenwriting is a critical element of filmmaking. Learn how to structure your screenplay effectively, ensuring that your vision translates seamlessly to the screen.


Navigating the Challenges
Shooting outdoors and in-studio both come with their unique sets of challenges. We'll guide you through the potential pitfalls and provide insights on how to overcome them.


Mastering Post-Production
Post-production can be a complex labyrinth. We'll demystify this phase and offer tips on how to make it a smooth and successful process. Learn how producers and influencers can discover and promote your film.


Realizing Your Dream Film
Every filmmaker dreams of creating their magnum opus. But you don't have to wait until you have millions in the bank. With just tens of thousands of euros, you can bring an independent film or a high-quality pre-production teaser to life. This teaser can serve as a powerful tool for attracting investors for your grand cinematic vision. Discover the unique steps involved in this approach compared to traditional film production.


Is Now the Right Time?
Timing is crucial. Evaluate whether you have the right contacts, sufficient funds, and adequate knowledge. Are you ready to take the plunge? It's a philosophical question as much as a practical one.


Embrace the Role of a Lifelong Learner
As a filmmaker, I wear two hats: the expert and the perpetual student. Even as a seasoned professional, I acknowledge there's always more to learn. Sometimes, practical experience surpasses book knowledge. Take, for example, my pre-production teaser project, 'Gotterdammerung.' It taught me invaluable lessons, and I meticulously documented my successes and setbacks for future reference.


Define Your Filmmaking Identity
Before embarking on your feature film journey, define your film's purpose. Is it pure entertainment or an inspiring piece of art? Or perhaps something in between? This is where the beauty of independent filmmaking shines. You're not bound by industry trends or commercial pressures; it's all about the story you want to tell.


Embrace the Challenges of Independence
However, freedom comes with its own set of challenges. The path of an independent filmmaker is a relentless struggle that never truly ends. It's a journey that demands the heart of a poet and the skin of an elephant, as they say. External factors will test your resolve, and even your team members may challenge your vision. As a director, it's your duty to preserve and nurture your story, no matter what.


Join us in this masterclass, where we'll equip you with the knowledge, skills, and resilience needed to turn your filmmaking dreams into reality. From idea to execution, we're here to guide you every step of the way.
target_audience: To all filmmakers who want to achieve something really big with their films.

courses.description:
Der Hund ist eines der beliebtesten Haustiere in Deutschland. Da liegt es doch auf der Hand, dass du als Hundebesitzer auch gerne das perfekte Foto deines besten Freundes schießen können möchtest. Dabei ist es gar nicht so leicht, den Vierbeiner auf seinen Touren perfekt abzulichten. Einfacher ist da die Studiofotografie, in der du eine kontrollierte Umgebung für hochprofessionelle Aufnahmen schaffst. Und das Beste: Du brauchst nicht einmal ein eigenes Heimstudio für professionelle Studioaufnahmen!
Mein Name ist Tobias Gawrisch und ich bin selbstständiger Fotograf. Ich arbeite seit 2015 hauptberuflich als Fotograf und bringe über 10 Jahre Fotografieerfahrung mit. Die Tierfotografie war für mich schon immer ein sehr persönliches Thema, da ich mit 3 Hunden aufgewachsen bin und aktiv den Tierschutz unterstütze.
Aus diesem Grund habe ich dieses Videotraining zum Erstellen von Hundeportraits im Studio entwickelt. In diesem Kurs bringe ich dir alles bei, was du für professionelle Portraitaufnahmen deines Vierbeiners wissen und können musst. Danach wirst du in der Lage sein, dramatische und emotionale Aufnahmen deines Hundes mit kontrolliertem Blitzlicht zu erstellen.
Ich zeige dir u.a.:
Welches Equipment du benötigst
Wie du die Kamera und die Blitze richtig einstellst
Wie ein einfaches aber sehr effektives Studio-Setup aussieht
Wie du die Aufmerksamkeit deines Hundes auf deine Kamera richtest
Wie du die entstandenen Aufnahmen in Lightroom organisierst
Wie du den Hintergrund des Portraits nach Belieben austauschen kannst
Wie du dein Hundeportrait anschließend perfekt mit Photoshop bearbeitest


Zusätzlich bekommst du von mir eine genaue Liste aller verwendeten Ausrüstungsgegenstände mit dazu. So kannst du dir genau ansehen, womit ich in dem Kurs selbst fotografiert habe und welches Zubehör ich eingesetzt habe, um diese Ergebnisse zu bekommen.
Gib dich nicht länger mit Schnappschüssen von deinen Hunden zufrieden, hebe deine Aufnahmen auf das nächste Level mit diesem Videotraining!
target_audience: Hundebesitzer, die gerne hochwertige Portraitaufnahmen ihrer Vierbeiner haben wollen
Fotografen, die in die Tierfotografie mit Blitzen einsteigen wollen
Alle, die Spaß an hochwertigen Tieraufnahmen haben
Photoshop-Begeisterte, die mehr über die Bearbeitung von Tierfotos lernen wollen
